legs ldan nag po mahA kA la zhes bya ba byin gyis brlabs te bka'i srung mar gzhag go/ de'i tshe sras rdo rje drag po rtsal gyis/ dpal chen po la zhus pa/ kye yab cig rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku//
bdag gi gdul bya gang na mchis// gdul ba'i thabs ni ji ltar bstan// zhes zhus so// dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa// thugs kyi sras mchog drag po rtsal/ khyod kyi gdul bya bstan pa ni//

ma 'ongs dus na sprul pa'i sku// shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa 'byung// sprul sku mya ngan 'das pa dang// de ma thag tu rgyal ba'i tshab/ khyod kyi sprul pa rnam brgyad 'byung// bdud po bsgral ba'i rnam shes rten//
ri rab lhun po'i rtse mo nas// dum bu brgyan du 'phangs pa las// gsang sngags bstan pa'i gnas brgyad 'byung// gnas der gsang sngags bka' gnas brgyad tshugs/ khyod kyi sku las gshin rje gshed//

'jam dpal bshes gnyen bya ba 'byung/ khyed kyi gsung las rta mgrin rgyal// dge slong klu zhes bya ba 'byung/ khyod kyi thugs las he ru ka/ huM chen ka ra zhes bya 'byung/ khyod kyi yon tan che mchog sku//

paN chen bi ma mi tra 'byung/ khyod kyi 'phrin las kI la ya// pad+ma 'byung gnas zhes bya 'byung/ khyod kyi drag po rdo rje 'chang// shin+ti gar+b+ha zhes bya 'byung/ khyod kyi sprul pa brtul zhugs can//
'jam dpal phyi ma 'bir bar 'byung/ khyod kyi rig pa rdo rje sems// shrI sing ha zhes bya 'byung// de ni mchog gi sprul pa brgyad// thugs kyi sras mchog nges pa yin// de las sprul pa rnam pa brgyad//

de las yang sprul rnam pa brgyad// de yi byin rlabs dbang phyug brgyad// 'dzam bu gling du 'byung bar 'gyur// gdul bya'i zhing ni de tsam mo// 'dul ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ste// sku yi gdul byar gyur pa la/

khros pa rdo rje gzhon nu'i thugs// gsang mtshan rdo rje drag po rtsal// nyam nga bag tsha med par ston// gsung gi gdul byar gyur pa la// bde gshegs ma lus kun gyi gsung// rdzun 'phrul sdud byed yi ge hUM//

drag po hUM dgu'i ting 'dzin ston// thugs kyi gdul byar gyur pa la// kun gyi spyi mes kun tu bzang// de yi thugs kyi snying gi bcud// rang byung rang shar lta ba ston// spros la dga' ba'i gang zag la/ khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ston// blo dang mi ldan gang zag la// che mchog rdo rje gzhon nu
ston// shin tu bsdus la dga' ba la// sras mchog thugs kyi sgrub pa ston// drag po sngags kyi rigs 'dzin la// sgrub pa'i man ngag bcu gsum ston// rtsa khams rlung gsum dgag pa la/

khros ma nag mo'i sgrub pa ston// nga yi bstan pa bsrung bya'i phyir// legs ldan nag po'i sgrub pa ston// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa'i thugs gsang ba sku'i rgyud las/ gdul bya'i zhing dang thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////

de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes dgyes pa'i gar dang bcas te 'di skad ces zhus so// kye dpal rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku/ khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i// sgrub thabs bdag la bstan du gsol//

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje srin po zhes bya ba/ khrag 'thung nga yi sgrub thabs ni// bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs mod kyang// gcig tu dril na 'di lta ste// ri phran mang po 'dus pa'i spyi//

ri bos bskor ba'i lcug phran tshal// ri mtho sa gtsang nags tshal ldan// shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// sa yi gnad la dkyil 'khor brtseg/ sa bdag zhi ba'i cho ga bya// phyogs bzhir mtho brtsigs rgyal chen bskyed//

thig tshon cho ga legs par bya// dkyil 'khor gru gsum ni shu gcig/ sgo bzhi ra ba ldan pa bri// lha grangs tshangs pa'i phur bu dgod// sman rag gtor ma rnam gsum dgod// rab gnas ldan pa'i lha sku dgram//
bdag nyid byang du kha bltas la// 'phrin las ting 'dzin rim pa bzhin// ma yengs pa yi ngang gis bya// dus bzhir 'dzab dang mchod pa dbul// bdag nyid rdo rje srin po'i sku//
mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga dang// me dpung kha T+wAM phur pa 'dril//
zhabs bzhi ru dra pho mo brdzis// glang chen zhing dang stag lpags gyon// thal chen khrag dang zhag gis brgyan// dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes/ khrag 'thung rigs lngas dbu la brgyan//
sprul dang rin chen thod pas brgyan// mdun du 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog 'thing// rgyan dang cha lugs yab dang mthun/ khrag 'thung bzhi bcu zhe bzhi'i 'khor//

bka' nyan srung ma bcu gnyis dang// pha bdud nyi shu rtsa gcig bsam// gtso bo'i thugs khar ye shes sems// rgyan med yab dang tshul mthun pa// mtshon gang ba gcig bsam par bya// de yi thugs khar phyag mtshan gyi//

rdo rje rtse dgu nas tsam bsam// de yi lte bar gsung gi rtags// hUM sngon spu yis bris pa tsam// de yi mtha' mar snying po ni// gsang ba'i yi ge bcu bzhi pa// gser mdog spu shad tsam gyis bskor// de ltar thugs kar bsgoms nas

kyang// thugs kyi sngags las 'od 'phros pas// stong gsum thams cad 'od kyis gang// srid gsum gdug pa rdul du rlag/ gsal stong ngang nas sngags 'di bzlas// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/
ting 'dzin de las ma yengs par// thun gcig lha yi sku la lta// thun gcig yid kyi yul du bsgom// thun gcig mi dmigs ngang du gzhag/ de ltar nyin mtshan 'khor yug tu// ma nor rim par bzlas par bya//

sa ya drug 'bum bsnyen pa'i tshad// de rdzogs nas ni rtags 'di 'byung/ khrag 'thung nga yi zhal mthong zhing// phyag mtshan phur bu gar du 'khrab// gtor ma rak+ta bdud rtsi khol// de nas sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam//
zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur bu'i thugs gsang ba sku'i rgyud las/ khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnyen pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so//
kye kye khrag 'thung chen po'i sku// che mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// bsgrub pa'i rim pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gong ltar bsnyen pa'i rtags rdzogs nas//
drag po'i bsgrub pa'i gnas btsal ba// sa gzhi nag la gting zab pa// gnam sa gnyis ka drag po'i gzugs// brag nag ngo rgya gdug pa ru// drag po'i sa ru maN+Dal bya// dbus su gru+u gsum tha ma ru//
zla gam gsum gyis bskor ba dang/ khyams sgo rta babs la sogs te// dkyil 'khor rgyan rnams rdzogs par bri// phyi ru mtho brtsigs mtshams kun gcad// dbus su bsnyen pa'i phur pa gzugs//

sku gsung thugs kyi phur pa gsum// sku shar gsung lho thugs ni byang// zla gam gsum la bkod par bya/ khyams la dmar nag sde gsum gyi// phur bu bcu gnyis bkod par bya// sgo bzhir las kyi phur bu dgod//

sman dang rak+ta gtor ma bsham// gzhan yang drag po'i rdzas rnams bsog/ mar khu khrag zhag 'o ma bzhi// dkyil 'khor khyams par dag tu gzhag/ de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa ni// bdag nyid stong pa'i ngang nyid las//
che mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad la// zhabs brgyad dregs pa'i lha brgyad brdzis// spyi bo mgrin pa snying kha ru// rang 'dra'i ye shes sems dpa' gsum//
dkar dmar mthing ka'i mdog can du// stong gsal 'od kyi phung por bsgom// de yi mtha' ru sras mchog mchog gsum// stobs chen dkar po shar du bsgom// rta mgrin dmar po lho ru bsgom//

bdud rtsi ljang nag byang du bsgom/ khyams la dmar nag ma mo rnams// bka' nyan las byed pho nyar bsam// sgo bzhir khro mo bzhi pa bskyed// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// sgrub pa'i sngags 'di bzlas pa bya// oM badzra kI li kI la ya ka taM ka te
ya te ka ra i nan/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ dza ye bi dza ye ku ru ka ra i nan/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/

tsit+ta badzra a pa ra tsit+ta ma ma trag ma taM nyag ka ra i nan/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ ces pa rtsa ba'i snying po gsum// 'bum phrag rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya// bsnyen pa'i rtags ni 'di ltar 'byung//

stong gsum zhabs kyis brdzis pa dang// nyid zla khong du mid pa dang/ ri rab lag gis bskor ba dang// rgya mtsho hub kyis btab pa dang// dngos sam nyams sam rmi lam du// bsgrub pa'i rtags de nges par 'byung//

de nas bdag gi rtsa ba'i zhal// g.yas dkar gshin rje dkar po dngos// bsen mo'i klad khrag 'dren par byed// g.yon dmar rta mgrin rgyal po dngos// sho na'i mgrin srog 'dren par byed// dbus mthing bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dngos//

nag mo'i tsit+ta 'dren par byed// sras mchog gsum po gsal btab la// dam can rnam gsum las la bkol// sha ba khu yis non pa bzhin// 'dar zhing bka' la nyan par bsam// drag po'i sngags 'di bzlas pa bya//

oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ ka taM ka te ya ye ta ka ra i nan/ dza ye bi dza ye/ ku ru ka ra i nan/ a tsit+ta a pa tsit+ta ma ma pa shaM ku ru trag ma taM nyag/ ka ra i nan/ d+ha ti ma ma karma shri traM/
kaM ka rar nye yaM/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ grangs ni 'di ni stong phrag gsum// bzlas pa las kyi rtags 'di 'byung// gcan gzan khu yis 'ded pa dang// bud med las la bkol ba dang//

gcan gzan 'phar la rbad pa dang// gyi ling mang po ded pa dang/ khrag zhag mar khu 'o ma bzhi// mtsho la 'o mas btab pa dang// de tshe sgrub pa'i rtags rdzogs pa'o// dam rdzas kun la dngos grub blang//

bsnyen pa'i phur bu lus la bcang// de nas las sbyor brtsams par bya// mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa na// rdo rje drag po rtsal nyid sgrub// thun mong drag po'i las 'dod na// dmar nag sde gsum las la bkol//

ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa'i thugs gsang ba sku'i rgyud las bsgrub pa chen po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu la gus pas 'di skad ces zhus so//

kye ma dpal chen khro bo'i sku// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa de ltar na// yang dag byang chub 'dod pa yi// las sbyor ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi// dpa' bos yang dag bshad du gsol// dpal chen gtso bos bka' stsal pa//

nyon cig lag na rdo rje can// las 'phro dag pa'i gang zag gcig/ yang dag byang chub sgrub 'dod na// thugs kyi sras mchog drag po rtsal// ma yengs pa yi ngang gis grub// dkyil 'khor dam rdzas bsten mi dgod// bde ba'i stan la
'dug nas kyang// ting 'dzin rim gyis mi bskyed par// dran rig tsam las lha yi sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// g.yas pa gnam lcags rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa gser gyi dril bu 'dzin//

rin chen sprul dang thod pa dang// dur khrod chas kyis legs par brgyan// ru dra pho mo'i gdan stengs su// yab 'dra'i mthing nag khros pa'i gzugs// spyan gsum gzi mdangs ldan par bskyed// shin tu drag po'i ngang rgyal can//

ya nga bag tsha med pa la// drag po rang byung ting 'dzin sgom// de la rig pa yengs gyur na// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thog 'bab ltar// hUM sgra brtsegs ma ngar ldan bzla// hUM gcig chos nyid dgongs pa yin//

hUM gnyis thabs kyi dgongs pa yin// hUM gsum sku gsung thugs kyi sgra// hUM bzhi 'gro don phyogs med bzhi// hUM lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// hUM drug ye shes drug dang ldan// hUM bdun tshangs pa'i dbyangs skad yin//

hUM brgyad khro bo gdangs sgra brgyad// hUM dgu srid gsum dbang du sdud// hUM bcus log 'dren thal bar rlog/ de nas hUM gi dgongs pa ni// mkha' la char pa bab pa bzhin// rang gi lto ba khengs par dgang//
de yi bdag du 'dzin pa sbyangs// me las 'od zer 'phros pa bzhin// snod kyi 'jig rten hUM gis gang// de yis yul gyi snang ba sbyangs// mkha' la gza' skar shar ba bzhin// snang ba hUM du sal le bsam//

g.yu 'brug sngon mo'i skad bzhin du// stong gsum hUM gi sgra ru bsam// mkha' la nyi zla shar ba bzhin// rig pa gsal stong ngang du gzhag/ ting 'dzin de la sam yengs par// bdun gsum nyer gcig brgyad du bzla//

de tshe grub pa'i rtags 'di 'byung// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad la// zhan pa med cing chags pa med// mkha' la nyi zla dus gcig shar// 'jig rten 'od kyis gang ba dang// rang byung ye shes rjen par 'char//

de tshe thugs kyi dngos grub thob// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa thugs gsang ba sku'i rgyud las/ drag po rang byung rang shar ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye dpal chen gtso bo'i mchog/

rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// phag mo'i sgrub pa ji ltar lags// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// stong pa nyid kyi don 'dod pas// rdo rje phag mo bsgrub par bya// shin tu dben pa'i gnas song la//

mnyam gzhag rdo rje phyag rgya bca'// rang gi lus 'di stong pa'i gnas// sha rus khrag dang nang khrol med// sgyu ma lta bu'i 'od kyi lus// dmar gsal mdangs dang ldan par bsgom// de yi lte 'og nyi ma'i stengs//
yi ge ma las phag mo'i sku// dmar mo yungs 'bru tsam gcig bsgom// de la rig pa gnas tsha gzhag/ de las
'od phros phag mo'i mthar// yi ge ha ri ni sa bzhi// nyi ma'i 'od zer 'phro bar bsam// 'od de rims kyis spar ba las/ khog pa lha yi pho brang ste// lte ba'i stengs na phag mo'i sku//

gser mdog mdangs dang ldan pa la// mkha' 'gro sde bzhis bskor bar bsgom// snying gi dkyil na phag mo'i sku// mthing nag 'od dang ldan pa la// mkha' 'gro sde bzhis bskaur bar bsgom// mgrin pa'i gnas la phag mo'i sku//

dmar gsal mdangs dang ldan pa la// mkha' 'gro sde bzhis bskor bar bsgom// klad pa'i dkyil na phag mo'i sku// dkar gsal mdangs dang ldan pa la// mkha' 'gro sde bzhis bskor bar bsgom// de la rig pa gnas tshad gzhag/
'phro na rang lus mkha' 'gro ma/ khros ma nag mo 'jigs pa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis stang stabs can// g.yas pa gri chen dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// spyan gsum zhal bgrad dbu skra brdzes//
spyi gtsug phag zhal dur sgra can/ kha T+wAM rtse gsum mchan khung bcug/ dbu gtsug tshangs pa'i gnas su bsleb// sku yis gzugs khams thams cad khengs// sku smad rgya mtsho'i gting du bsleb//

zhabs kyis 'byung ba rlung brdzis pa// shin tu gzi brjid ldan par bsam// de la rig pa gnas tshad gzhag/ 'phro na gtso mo'i ljags stengs nas// rang 'dra'i phag mo yungs 'bru tsam// mkha' la char pa 'bab pa bzhin//

rang gi yul dang gling bzhi dang// snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang// nam mkha'i mtha' la thug gi bar/ thams cad ma lus khengs par dgeng// thams cad gar dang phyag rgyar ldan// de la rig pa gnas tshad gzhag/
'khro na mkha' la 'brug ldir ltar// snying po 'di nyid bzlas par bya'o// oM ha ri ni sa hUM hUM hUM/ oM ha ri ni sa hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ oM ha ri ni sa hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/

de ltar ting 'dzin ma yengs par// bdun gsum nyer gcig bsgrubs pa yis// snang srid thams cad dbang du 'dus// stong khams thams cad zil gyis gnon// stong nyid ye shes rgyud la 'char// chos sgo bye ba dpag med shes//

gdul bya sna tshogs mtha' rgyas 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa thugs gsang ba sku'i rgyud las/ rdo rje phag mo sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so//

kye kye dpal chen khros pa'i sku// drag po'i sgrub pa ji ltar lags// dpal chen gtso bos bka' stsal ba// dur khrod dam grog dben pa ru// maN+Dal gru bzhi rim pa gsum// zangs lcags 'khar gyi phye ma la/
khrag rgod bsres la byug par bya/ drag po'i shing la zur gsum brtsig/ nyer gcig srin mo'i 'gros su bskor// rnams shes tshangs pa'i ling ga bri// sngo dmar skud pas bcings te gzhag/ bdag nyid
che mchog ting 'dzin gyis// dam can rnam gsum las la bkol// 'dus pa'i snying po 'di nyid bzlas// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ d+ha ti ma ma karma shi traM kaM ka kar nye yang//
sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT// d+hu ti 'dus pa'i snying po 'di// stong phrag gsum du bzlas pa dang// dam can dngos su 'du bar 'gyur// de tshe dgug pa'i cho ga bya// e las gru gsum mthing nag nas/

khro bo nyer gcig 'phros pa yis// dgra bgegs dngos su bkug par bsgom// nri tri gang rung zhabs 'jug rung// badzra aM ku sha dza// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i sngags rgod 'di// zhag gsum bzlas na khugs par 'gyur//
che ge mo trig nan/ klad pa'i dkyil 'khor du'o// che ge mo myags thum ril/ mgrin pa'i rtsa la'o// hUr thums rbad/ srog rtsa la'o// na sha ya rbad/ lte ba la'o// mA ra ya rbad/ yan lag bzhi la'o/

zhes pa'i sngags rgod rnams pa lnga// drag po'i rdzas la bstim bya ste// gzas pa'i gnad la brdeg par bya'o// mgor stangs ling byas sems can gsad// grong khyer me yis bcom pa dang// ha ha gad mo 'debs 'gyur na//
nges par 'grol ba'i rtags yin pas// ling ga rnam pa gsum du dgod// cha gcig dug shing me la bsreg/ cha gcig klu la gtad par bya// cha gcig gtor stegs 'og tu mnan// dam can mchod pas mnyes par bya//
zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa thugs gsang ba sku'i rgyud las/ drag po las kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so// kye bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo'i sku//

ru dra bsgral ba'i rnam shes 'di// dpal gyis bsrung bar bka' bsgos nas// 'di yi sgrub thabs ji ltar lags// dpal chen gtso bos bka' stsal zhu// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal ba// lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/

'di nyid shin tu dregs pa ste// de yi gnyen po nga nyid yin// bde gshegs kun gyis 'di btul bas// gsang sngags kun gyis bka' srungs yin// rdo rje phur pa'i bka' srungs che// legs ldan bdud du bsgrub par bya//

dar nag 'phan la srog rten gyis// dam rdzas g.yag rog khrag la gyis// snying po gsang sngags 'di nyid do// oM shr-I mahA kA la tri yaM dza dza/ rno myur las kyi mgon po yin// bsnyen pa'i dus su khro bo'i tshul//

stangs stabs ber nag gyon pa bskyed// sgrub pa'i dus su rgyal po'i tshul// rtsal chen seng ge zhon pa bskyed// las sbyor dus su pho nya'i tshul// dpa' bo stag la zhon pa bskyed// 'di ni dam can pho nya ste//
bsnyen dang bsgrub pa las sbyor dang// sgrol dang spogs pa'i las rnams kun// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis ston// bskal pa dpag med sngon rol nas// gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang/ mgon po
'di yi gnyen po ste// de phyir sgrub thabs zab par ston// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa thugs gsang ba sku'i rgyud las/ bka' nyan pho nya'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////
de nas dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nus 'di skad ces gsungs so// nga nyid rdo rje phur pa'i sku/ nga yi thugs kyi rgyud yin te// bskal med rnams la gsang bar bya// de yang phyi nang gsang ba gsum//

phyi ltar sku yi rgyud yin pas// thugs la gsang ba sku yi rgyud// rdo rje hUM las khro bo rnams// rang las byung zhing rang shar bas// de yi sgrub thabs bstan pa des// drag po rang shar rang byung rgyud//
de phyir rdo rje phur pa yis// rang byung rang shar rgyud ces bya// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa thugs gsang ba sku'i rgyud las/ rgyud kyi mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////

dpal chen gtso bos bka' stsal pa// phur bu sku yi gsang rgyud 'di// gdul bya rnams kyi don phyir du// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis ston// bka' srungs legs ldan nag po yis// nga yi rgyud 'di gnas pa'i sar//
bar chad byed pa'i dgra bgegs thul// bstan pa yun du gnas par gyis// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa thugs gsang ba sku'i rgyud las/ gtad rgya'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// gsang ba sku'i rgyud rdzogs so//

sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya//// rdo rje phur pa'i rgyud 'di brag ri dug sbrul spungs pa 'dra ba'i lho gser mdzod ser po nas// rigs 'dzin rgod kyi ldem phru can gyis gdan drangs pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/

badzra g+hu ya tsit+ta tan tra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun bzangs rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dbus med pa nas/

rgya phyogs su ma chad pa/ gzhi tshad med pa ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ phyi nang med par gsal ba mnyam pa'i gdan la// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun bzang rdo rje 'chang/ sku mdun rgyab med pa ngo bo stong pa

rang bzhin gyis gsal ba dang/ mkha' skye ba med pa 'gro/ 'gag pa med pa'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor// seng ge dang//

glang chen dang/ rta dang/ rma bya dang/ shang shang dang/ rin chen khri dang/ nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la/ rnam shes rdor sems dang/ gzugs rnam snang dang/ tshor ba rin 'byung dang/ 'du shes mtha' yas dang/

'du byed don grub pa dang// btsun mo nam mkha' bzang mo dang/ sa sangs rgyas spyan dang/ chu mA ma kI dang/ me gos dkar mo dang/ rlung dam tshig sgrol ma dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba sa'i snying po dang/ thos pa phyag na rdo
rje dang/ snom pa nam mkha' snying po dang/ myong ba spyan ras gzigs dang/ btsun mo reg lA s+yA ma dang/ sgra mA le ma dang/ dri gir ti ma dang/ ro nir ti ma dang/
sems dpa' mthong byed byams pa dang/ thos byed sgr-ib pa sel dang/ snom byed kun du bzang po dang/ myong byed 'jam dpal dang/ btsun mo 'das pa d+hU pe ma dang/ da ltar puSh+pe ma dang/
'byung ba A lo ki ma dang/ ma 'ongs gan d+he ma la sogs pa de dag kun kyang/ mthing kha dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang khu'i mdangs su gsal bar thabs cig tu bzhugs so//

thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor reg shes gshed po dang/ reg bya stobs chen dang/ reg byed rta 'grin dang/ reg pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang/ btsun mo rtag pa ma yin dang/ chad pa ma yin dang/ bdag ma yin dang/

mtshan ma ma yin dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// 'jig rten drug 'dul ba'i brgya byin dang/ thags bzangs rigs dang/ shag thub dang/ shag seng dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa pad+ma'i gdan la thabs cig tu bzhugs so//

de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun bzang rdo rje 'chang la gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan kun bzangs rdo rje 'chang chen po/ 'jig rten drug na nga dang bdag 'dzin pa rtags pa la mngon par zhen pas yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba rnams/
thugs rjes yang dag pa'i lam du bsgral du gsol zhes zhus pas/ de nas kun bzang rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang//
skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes tsam nyid na skye ba med// zhi bas phan par ma gyur te/ khro bo de bzhin gshegs bskul mdzad// ye nas sangs rgyas yin mod kyang//

rtogs pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba las// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ 'jig rten drug gi bdag po dregs pa can rnams 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir/

chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las ma 'gags pa'i thugs rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/ rigs lnga yab yum gyi thugs las/ khro chung rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/

hUM bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug g.yos 'gul du gyur te/ 'jig rten drug gi bdag po mthu chen dregs pa can thams cad brgyal bar gyur to// de nas hUM b+h+yo e a ra li dza dza/
zhes brjod pas/ dregs pa can de dag gi chung ma dbang mo thams cad dbang du bsdus so// oM AHhUM badzra A be sha ya a la la ho/ zhes brjod pas/
dbang mo rnams hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyi pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas/ yab yum gnyis su med pa 'khril ba'i dgyes par thim nas/ byang chub sems kyi sprin las/
bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba khrag 'thung he ru ka zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa yum dang bcas nas/ zhabs bzhi dur khrod chen po'i gnas na rak+ta'i rgya mtsho//
keng rus kyi ri rab kyi steng na/ dbang phyug la sogs dur khrod kyi bdag po khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhugs so// dri za gshin rje srin mo gnod sbyin la sogs khyo shug gi gdan la/

khrag 'thung rigs bzhi yum dang bcas nas bzhugs so// zhing re re'i gdan la ke'u ri brgyad dang/ sing nga ma brgyad dang/ lcags kyu ma zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu ma bzhi dang/ khro bo bcu ngo mtshar du 'thon par gyur to//

ma mo thams cad bka' bsgo las la lag tu rdo rje byin nas bkye'o// rdo rje gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi gleng bslang bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ kun bzang rdo rje 'chang la gsol ba/
'dod khams na gnas pa'i lhag pa'i rnal 'byor rigs 'dzin gyi gral du bsnyeg pa rnams kyis ji ltar bslab par bgyi zhes zhus pas// de nas kun bzang rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/
kye gsang ba'i bdag po de phyir ngas/ khyod la legs par bshad par bya/ khyaud ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// phyi nang chos dbyings rnam dag las// thugs rje'i 'phrin las 'gro ba 'dul//

brjod mi lang gi dkyil 'khor kun// legs par brtags pa'i sa gzhi la// gtor ma'i las la 'jug par bya// las dang bya ba ting 'dzin gyis// ri rab chos 'byung gzhal yas khang// 'khor gyis gtso la gsol ba btab//
lta ba stang stobs rdo rje 'gros// phur pas gdab cing dbang ltor chud// gzhal yas mtshan nyid sbyang dang bcas// mnga' gsol mnyam par tshad dang ldan// nyon mongs ye shes khang du bslang//
pho brang yid bzhin lhun gyis grub// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs par gnas// ngo bo ma 'dres so sor gsal// tshad med bzhi ldan rgyan gyis mdzes// ces gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/

gzhal yas spros pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bkod pa 'di gsungs so// ma lus dkyil 'khor bsam yas kun// rgyan dgod rnam rtog dag par gcad// lha tshogs gzhal yas mchod pas mdzes//

dam tshig dkyil 'khor sems sgo dbye// sgo gsum bsod nams rdzogs par dor// ma rig rang gsang thabs kyis gcod// sus kyang ma bcings 'dzin pas 'khrul// gnyis med ye shes chen por bshags// mngon sum ye shes byin gyis
brlab// phung po sangs rgyas yan lag lnga// lus nyid lha yi gzhal yas khang// de tshe sku lnga ye shes rdzogs// rang rig sku lnga rdzogs par gsal// ye shes rang snang rjes su 'jug/ ces gsungs so//
rdo rje gsang ba'i thugs kyi rgyud las/ dam tshig dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsam pas 'grub//
mi dmigs spros med de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin 'od gsal kun tu snang// hUM nyid rgyu las dkyil 'khor 'byung// thams cad bskyed pa'i sa bon rgyu// phyag rgya brkyang ba'i hUM nyid las//
'phros pas gnas su sa bon bskyed// e yaM khaM su ra kaM raM bruM/ paM maM a tir baM/ gzhal yas rim brtsegs gdan dang bcas// ting nge 'dzin sa bon rkyang pa las// chu las nya ldang tshul du bskyed//
hUM muM/ oM laM sa maM aM pyaM haM taM k+shi hUM/ traM traM d+hi d+hi dzi a me dza th+l+haM hUM hUM baM mUM ho oM a mu ne hUM phaT hUM phaT hUM phaT hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/

he he he he he he he he/ ha ri ni sa ra tsa hri ya/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/

hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ ting nge 'dzin thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// phyogs bcu dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// sku gsum dkyil 'khor spyan drang ngo// oM badzra gu ru/ e h+ye hi b+hag ba na/ ma hA ka ru ni ka dri sha ho/

dzaHhUM baM ho/ sa ma a oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ DA ki hi b+h+yo sa ma ya ti sta lhan/ bde gshegs lha tshogs brjod mi lang/ gnyis su med par gsal bar bzhugs// ces gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/

ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya spros pa 'di gsungs so// phyag rgya chen por dam tshig ldan// bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgyar gsal// oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ sa ma ya staM/

sa ma ya ho/ sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// rigs kyi gtso bos dbang bskur ro// oM AHhUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa A/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbang bsgyur mchog/ kun bsgyur dbang gis sbyin pa spyod//

dpal gyi dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la/ gus pas phyag gi tshogs mchog las// sgo gsum dkyil 'khor spro bar thim/ rgyu 'bras dam tshig rnam par dag/ bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras// ye shes rgyu 'bras dbyings su thim// di bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi sras//

ces gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ ye shes phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas mchod pa'i sprin bkod pa 'di gsungs so// kun 'byung mdzes par rin chen 'bar// dbyibs legs kha dog rgyan gyis spras/ na bza' bla re rgyal mtshan
gdugs// 'dod yon zhal zas sil snyan gyis// dbyings nas lha tshogs spyan drangs mchod// mnyes nas dngos grub dam tshig mchog/ rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ bdud rtsi nyon mongs kun sel mchog/

spyad nas mnyam pa'i don rtogs 'gyur// bdag mchog kun mnyes gnyis med rol// lta ba bla ma mi spang bskur// bsgom pa yi dam lha mi 'bral// sngags spyod phyag rgya rgyun mi 'chad// 'bras bu yang dag lam du zhugs//

sku gsum mchog gi snying po 'grub// chos dbyings rnam dag yangs pa'i snod// 'dod yon ma 'gag gtor ma'i mchog khams gsum nyon mongs khrag chen po// 'dod chags bde bar rnam dag cing// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrubs pa yis//

'jig bral med pa'i rdo rje'i tshe// 'dod yon lnga ldan mchod pa'i sprin// bsod nams tshogs rdzogs mi mthun sel// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub thob// ces gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las//

mchod pa'i sprin bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bsnyen cing dgyes par bstod pa 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs bsnyen pa'i// gsang chen 'bras bu 'di yin no// hUM badzra d+h+rig/ oM dzi na dzig/
swa rat+na d+h+rig/ aM a ro lig/ ha pra dzA d+h+rig/ muM d+hA tu shwa ri/ laM te sha ra ti/ maM mo ha ra ti/ pyaM rA ga ra ti/ taM badzra ra ti/ oM bo d+hI tsit+ta ma hA su ka/ dz+nyA na d+hA du a/

ma lus gsal bar bsnyen pa yis// sangs rgyas sras su dgongs par 'gyur// gsang chen rol pa'i tshig brjod pas// 'bar ba'i khro bo khro mos gang// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM ha ri ni sa ra tsa hri ya hUM/

mi bzad 'bar ba'i mkha' 'gro 'phro// bsnyen pa sangs rgyas sras su 'gyur// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes par bstod// dgyes pa chen po gad rgyangs che// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/

bsnyen cing dgyes par bstod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas tshogs bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// 'dod yon lnga ldan gzhal yas su// bza' btung dam rdzas byin brlabs nas// rgyan dang rol mo ldan gnas su//

tshogs la dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// zhi rgyas dbang drag 'dod yon gyis// ye shes lha tshogs dgyes par mchod// rkang stabs lag gar glu dbyangs sgyur// bdag nyid rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis//

snying rje gnyis su med pa rab bsgral bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ bkug nas rdo rje phur pas gdab// rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbul//
'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la// 'phros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/
tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'phrin las spros pa 'di gsungs so// slob dpon mnyes byas dbang rnams thob// nyan byed kun la gsang thub cing// spros la mi dad bsgom brtson la//

dbang gi yan lag rdzogs par sbyin// slob dpon ma mnyes dbang ma thob// tshig spros 'bras bu rlag par 'gyur// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs kyi rten// rab gnas ting 'dzin mchod pa 'bul// e yi tshogs chen dkyil 'khor rnams//

me ltar dbang sgyur mchod par bya// 'gro ba gnas sbyang skyabs su gsol// dbang bskur ngo sprad gnas lam bstan// bkra shis smon lam don du bsngo// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/
'phrin las spros pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas rgyud yongs su gtad pa 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ rgyud kyi brjod 'brel dgongs pa dang// rang bzhin ngo bo yon tan rnams//
legs par gtad do thub par zung// sgro skur dam med don las dreng/ don med lung du ma bstan la// don du mi 'gyur gsang bar bya// dad brtson gtong phod don la lta// yid ches thugs sras de la sbyin//
de na nges par lung bstan yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// rdo rje gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud rdzogs soha////

'phags pa rtogs pa'i rgyal po/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spy-i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ gsang ba'i snying po kho na nyid nges pa'o//
rgya gar skad du/ g+hu ya garba ta a ti ya ti/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'o// de la le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje 'dus pa/
thugs gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud le'u bcu pa'o// slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis// mnga' bdag rgyal po nyid la gnang// mi spel phyi rabs don du gter du sbas// gshin rje dmar nag gnyis la gtad//
mig dmar khyod la gtad do// rgya/ stag lo pa gcig dang phrad par shog/ gtad rgya/ ga ka ma ca khAtre:gter rgya// AglarkaT+wa/ n+wa/ n+wa/ D+ha:sbas rgya/ tha/ rba/ khAgya/ rbA/ :rgya rgya/

anAkhasar+k+raT+warwa/ bdag 'dra pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi// ting 'dzin nyams len dgongs pa mthar phyin kyang// bde gshegs bka' dang mi 'gal ba'i// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i lha tshogs la// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bka' rgyud la//
sgrub thabs man ngag mngon rtogs dang// dbang dang rab gnas dkyil 'khor dang// drag sngags bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang// gnas lam sbyin sreg la sogs dang// lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam

tshig/ 'phrin las bsgrub pa'i las rims kyis// gsang sngags rgyud kyi dbye ba bzhag/ brjod 'brel dgos pa yang dgos// 'brel dang ma tshang med pa'o// pad+ma dag gi gdams pa yin rgyal po'i jo mo'i thugs dam mdzod//
phyis kyang gter du sba bar bgyi// skal ldan cig dang phrad par shog/ gter rgya/ bka' rgya/ gtad rgya/ a rgya/ sprul sku ye shes khyung grags kyis/ g.yag snying rong gi brag las gter phyung ba'o////

rgya gar skad du/ badzra kI la ya g+hu ya tsit+ta karma tan tra na ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i snying po 'phrin las kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das las kyi khro bdag chen po rdo rje gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo//

'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phrin las kyi bdag nyid chen po de/ 'og min gyi gnas gsang chen rol pa'i dus khrod chain po na/ rdo rje 'phrin las rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
'dus pa'i 'khor ni khro bo dang// khro mo dang/ za byed dang/ gsod byed dang/ gshog pa can dang/ mche ba can dang/ sder mo can dang/ sha zan dang/ khrag 'thung gi tshogs dregs pa sde brgyad la
sogs mi bsrun dregs pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas bskor te bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi stan las langs te/
phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas nas/ 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad la phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ rdo rje'i gad rgyangs cher bsgrags te/ he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho/
gsang ba las kyang chen gsang ba// de nyid bdag cag 'khor rnams la// yang dag par ni bstan du gsol// gsang ba bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// cho ga'i rim pa gang dang gang//

stod smad las kyi mtha' sdud cing// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ces gleng gzhi dang/ gling bslang ste zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rol pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/
kI la ya yi sgra dang rdo rje'i gad rgyangs stong gsum khengs par bsgrags nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa kun tu rgyal// ngas bshad bi to 'bum sde'i rgyud//

de las yang gsang rgyud 'di yi// yang dag rim pa bshad par bya// brag nag khros 'dra gru gsum sa// tsher chen shing skyes gcan gzan gnas// de la mgo phur dar ba la// sa brtag blang gzung dkyil 'khor brtsig/
phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams kyang gcang// bsgrub phur rten dang rdzas sogs bsag/ sta gon rim sogs sngon 'gro bas// bsgrub pa'i khog chen gzhi yang gzung// dbang dang las rim rgyas mod
pas// phur pa bcu gnyis 'byung rgyud ltar// rig pa 'dzin pa nga sprul gyis// legs par brtags te rjes su snang// zhes bka' stsal to// gsang ba'i snying po'i 'phrin las kyi rgyud las//
ji ltar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// gsang ba'i bdag pos yang gsol baHe ma ho/ las kyi khro bdag he ru ka/ ji ltar bsgrub pa'i las rim rnams// de nyid gsang ba yang dag stsol//
he ru ka yis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje khros pas zhes sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar// srog gi sgo ru shor ba dang// snying gi sgo ru bsgom par bya//
snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rje stams byas te// rnam par shes pa'i rdo rjer bsgom// oM badzra kI la kI la ya/ sarba b+hig nan baM hUM phaT/

rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa'i rdo rjer bsgrubs mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo sgrub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las//

'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/ thabs kyis spyod pa'i 'gro don du/ byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir stsol cig/

oM badzra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po hUM ka ra dang// yum ni rdo rje sgra 'byin ma// sprul pa yi ni 'phra men ma// g.yag gi de ni mgo can dang// dmigs bu yi ni mgo can no//

oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya ha na ha na hUM phaT/ khro chen rnam par rgyal ba dang// yum ni rdo rje snyems ma ste// sprul pa yi ni 'phra men ma// stag gi de ni mgo can dang// bya rgod kyi ni mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha nI lam tan tra hUM/

da ha da ha hUM/ khro bo dbyug pa sngon po dang// yum ni rdo rje sder mo nyid// sprul pa yi ni 'phra men ma// g.yag gi de ni mgo can dang// bya rog gi ni mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha ya man ta ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/

khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po dang/ yum ni rdo rje dur khrod ma// sprul pa yi ni 'phra men ma// sha ba'i de ni mgo can dang// 'ug pa yi ni mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha hUM phaT/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dang//

yum ni rdo rje gtun khungs ma// sprul pa yi ni 'phra men ma// gzig gi de ni mgo can dang// khwa yi de ni mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya g+h+ri ba hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang//

yum mchog rdo rje phag mo dang// sprul pa yi ni 'phra men ma// byi la yi ni mgo can dang// pu shud kyi ni mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra tsi ta hUM// taSh+Thi taSh+Thi hUM phaT/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa// yum ni rdo rje 'da' snyems ma// sprul
pa yi ni 'phra men ma// spyang ki yi ni mgo can dang/ khra yi de ni mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kun d+ha li hUM/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang//

yum ni rdo rje rlung 'byin ma// sprul pa yi ni 'phra men ma// seng ge yi ni mgo can dang// pha wang gi ni mgo can no// oM trai lokya bi dza ya hUM/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal dang//

yum ni khams gsum gsod byed ma// sprul pa yin ni 'phra men ma// don gyi de ni mgo can dang// sre mo'i de ni mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ spo ta spo ta hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po stobs po che//
yum ni rdo rje skyod byed ma// sprul pa yi ni 'phrin men ma// dred kyi de ni mgo can dang// byi la'i de ni mgo can no// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir//

ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// phur pa yang gsang snying po'i rgyud las/ lha bskyed pa dang dam bca' ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o////
gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa/ las kyi khro bdag he ru ka/ bskyed pa'i lha rnams mngon rdzogs nas// srung ma lha rnams ji ltar bstan// rbad pa'i las kun ji lta bu// he ru ka yis bka' stsal pa//

dam can srung ma'i bskang rdzas bsags// sman rag gtor gsum sha khrag dang// 'o ma zhag dang mar khu sogs// mthun rdzas bshams nas bshugs pas 'bod// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab//
phyag brnyen chen po'i dus la bab// sho na mu kha'i dus la bab// bdag nyid chen po'i dus la bab// sa bdag chen po'i dus la bab// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// mthu rtsal 'byung ba'i dus la bab//

byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung gsob pa'i// rigs 'dzin bdag rnams la ni// gnod cing sdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang// dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tshe ba rnams/

khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir khug la// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang// lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// oM laM/ hUM laM/ stam pa ya nan/

mo ha yA b+hag ban/ shri tri b+hi tri/ badzra hUM ka ra hUM phaT/ badzra kI li kI la yA/ sarba b+hig nan dzaHhUM baM haM/ badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ badzra hUM ka ra a a/ dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs//
gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// rtogs cing grogs dang bral bar gyis// rings par khug las smrar chug cig/ phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// nga

yi dbang du gyur nas kyang// bsgo ba'i bka' ni nyan par gyis// hUM pa ra big stan hUM phaT// tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT// b+hin d+ha b+hi d+ha hUM phaT/ g+h+ri na g+h+ri na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/

b+han d+ha b+han d+ha hUM phaT/ ta tha ya ta tha ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ya ra hri d+ha na hUM phaT/ shi tri a sa na ya hUM phaT/ dza la pa ma/ dza la pa ya hUM phaT/ a b+he sha ya/ a b+he sha ya hUM phaT/

b+hin d+ha ya b+hin d+ha ya hUM phaT/ bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs/ khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji ltar khas blangs pa// sngon spyod 'phrin las myur du mdzod// ha na ha na badzra/ d+ha ha d+ha ha badzra/

pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ ka tang ka ye badzra ye bi dzA ye/ a tsi te/ a pa ra tsi te/ ma ra sa na/ pra ma ta na ye hUM phaT/

rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dran tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed pa//

ma ma ba shaM ku ru/ ma tang dz+nyA na ka re/ i dan 'da' re/ ma ma kar ma shri traM ye swA hA/ gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung// nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par mdzod//

sarba a pa na hUM phaT/ ta thA ga ta ya hUM phaT/ rdungs cig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun/ bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// rdo rje'i me 'bar snying bsregs nas/ lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du lhogs/ khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du//

rdo rje'i tho bas brdungs byas nas// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur/ kha thaM/ kha thaM/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT// badzra yag sha kro d+ha kha hi kha hi/ ha ha ha/ hUM hUM hUM/ phur pa gsang ba'i snying po 'phrin las kyi rgyud las/

dam can las la bsngags pa dang/ sngags kyi 'de'u thung bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// gsang ba'i bdag pos yang gsol ba// dbang gi bdag nyid he ru ka/ rnal 'byor bla med bsgrub pa yi// gsang sngags sgo ni dbang yin pas//

dbang gis smin par ma byas na// mnyan pa lag skya med pa ltar// gru yis pha rol bgrod mi nus// dbang bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas// gsang ba dam pa bsgrub bya'i phyir// dbang gi rim pa bstan du gsol//

he ru ka yis bka' stsal pa// smin byed dbang gi rim pa ni// chun tshogs lnga yis gzhi gzung ste// sa brtag gnas gzung sngon 'gro'i rim// gong du bsgrub khog lta bur bya// phyi nang mtshams gcad dkyil 'khor bri//

dbang chas mkho ba'i yo byad bsag/ sta gon rim bdun sngon 'gro bas// dal du lha la cod pan dor// dam tshig rdo rje lce la gzhag/ ye shes dbab bstim brtan par bya// bum pa'i lha dbang rdzogs par bskur// nyan

'chad bsgrub pa'i bka' yang gtad// dkyil lha dang phur pa bskur/ khro bcu lha dbang rdzogs pa dang// phur pa rdzas kyi dbang yang bskur// bsgom zhing bsgrub pa 'phrin las dbang// phyag mtshan la sogs dpe dbang bskur//
sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las dbang// dpal gyi chas brgyad sgrol dbang bskur// bka' gtad rgyal thebs las kyi dbang// mtha' rgyas bkra shis zhal zas gtad// gsang dbang rig pa'i rtsal dbang sogs//
dbang rnams rdzogs nas gsang sngags 'grub// oM AHhUM/ badzra ka pa te shud d+he hang/ badzra sa sing+ng+ha stiM/ g+h+ri na ho/ oM badzra us kha khra ta ya hUM/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT//

dz+nya na pan tsa ya ri sha a b+hi sh+tsin hUM/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ bruM rad na/ badzra kA ya a b+hi sh+tsin oM/ wA' ga a b+hi sh+tsin AHtsit+ta a b+hi sh+tsin hUM/ sarba a b+hi sh+tsin hri/

oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ A li kI li/ dz+nyA na pan+tsa a b+hi sh+tsin hUM/ oM kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ a b+hi sh+tsin maM/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha/ sarba a b+hi sh+tsin hUM/ oM AHhUM/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/

ka la ru pa a b+hi sh+tsin hUM/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ b+ho d+he tsi ta ma hA su ka si d+hi ho/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ kA ya a b+hi sh+tsin oM/ lwAg a b+hi sh+tsin a/ tsit+ta a b+hi sh+tsin hUM/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/

dzaHhUM baM ho/ su tra pra b+he sha ya phaT/ sarba a b+hi sh+tsin hUM/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ oM AHhUM/ A b+hi sh+tsin hUM/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ badzra dz+wa la raM/ tri sho sarba a b+hi sh+tsin a/ oM kI li kI la ya/

badzra rag sha ka ra ma/ tri sha ho/ a b+hi sh+tsin ho/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba b+hi ga nan b+haM hUM phaT/ dza hUM a/ oM aHhUM/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ ma tra ru dra ma ra ya phaT/

A b+hi sh+tsin hUM/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ dgra bo rni ti sha hUM/ mu ti g+h+ri na ma ra ya hUM phaT/ 'khor dbus su phur sgrom lam// yang gtso phur gcig la brten// dpal gtor la sogs bsham// ting 'dzin rnam gsum lha yang bskyed//

ye shes dgug bstim thugs srog gzung// bung ba tshang zhig sgra ltar du// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba b+hig nan baM hUM phaT/ yig 'bru bcu gsum rtsa ba'i sngags// 'bum 'bum bdun 'bum nyi khri dang// mtha' 'dul 'bum lnga 'bum la sogs//

bstan drod ma yal rtse gcig bzlas// bdag dang dkyil 'khor gtso bo yis// zhal dang lte ba 'khor lo la// sngags ni mgal ba'i me ltar bskor// de tshe rtags kyi rim pa yang// brtan la 'od 'phros sngags sgra dang// lus gos me 'bar dgra bgegs 'chi//
pho nya'i wa spyang skad la sogs// 'jig pa'i zhud yang 'byung ba'i 'gyur// de nas gtso dang 'khor du bcas// dam chen bzhi snying gcig dril ba'i// sngags rgod drag po 'di nyid bzlas// oM
badzra kI li kI la ya/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ ka tang ka ye/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a tsi te/ a pa ra tsi te/ ma ra sa na/ pra mar ta na ye/ sarba b+hig nan baM ho hUM phaT// de ltar bzlas tshe go cha gyon//

'khar zangs 'dzin dang mtshon rnon thogs// brag gshags lings byed rbab gtong dang// lha srin bka' gnyan bran byed dang// gsos btab ru dar phyar sogs byung// de tshe tshogs dang 'brang rgyas bsham// mchog gi dam rdzas dag la brten//

dbang dang dngos grub blang bar bya// gsang sngags mtha' mi sngon par bya// de yi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// phur pa gsang ba snying po 'phrin las kyi rgyud las// nang dang gsang bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o////

kye rgyud gsum dang 'brel las tshogs kyi// rim pa yang dag bstan par bya// 'phrin las drag por bsgrub pa'i phyir// dben gnas brag phug dur khrod du// dkyil 'khor mda' gang dbus su e/ khrag dang chang gis chag chag gdab//
rta kan rim gsum gan du dpag/ mtha' skor rdo rje me ris bskor/ kha khyer rtsang dmar bsnol mar bya// ro sol dug snas nang du byug/ ro ras dag la tsa kra ni// rtsibs brgyad nyis rim nang du bstan//

dbus su ling ka dbang po tshang// ming rus bla dgas bcas pa bri// dza yi zer bstab sngo dmar bris// dgra bo dgug gzhug yang yang bya// pho nya bskul zhing bla srog bstim// dong du gzhug ste sgo yang gcad//
gan rkyal gzhag ste rgya ram mnan// de steng e yi gdan la ni// lcags sam seng ldeng phur pa yang/ khru gang la sogs sgrub khog ltar// zhal gsum rgya mdud chu srin khar// me yi rbal dang ldan pa'o//

mthing nag dar gyi cod pan btags// spyir ni khro rgyal stobs 'dul las/ khyad par sras mchog dngos su bskyed/ dpal gtor dam can la sogs pa'i// mthun dang sgrub rdzas kun kyang bsham// dkyil 'khor de yi byang shar du/

khrag zhag 'o ma la sogs pa'i// phur srungs mchod pa'i rdzas kyang bsham// byang shar du ni re ma ti// shun dang nal bu'i dur khrod du// thod ngan nang du thun rdzas bsham// lcags phye zangs phye nyung kar nag/

ske tshe shang tshe gri khrag sbol// nga rgyal drag pos lhar rdzogs nas// dus bzhi nyin gung mtshan gung du// pho na sngags cing las la bskul// bdag nyid rdo rje gzhon nu yi// dkyil 'khor gsal ba gsum lhan bya//

phur pa sras mchog me sbal du// gsal ba'i 'od zer 'phro 'du yis/ khro rgyal ma lus stobs 'dus pa'i// mthu dang nus pa dpag med bsam// gnam lcags rdo rje'i thog 'dra ba'i// spu gri'i tshig shur 'd-i la 'bad//
oM kI li kI la ya/ ma rag mo yag mo// ka la ru pa/ karma raM raM/ che ge mo'i srog rtsa la yaM yaM/ snying rtsa la phril
phril// srog rtsa la chum chum/ tsa tra sog la dun dun/ snying khrag shad dza/ thums ri li li/ snying rtseg rtseg/ 'ur 'ur/ shig shig/ 'dul 'dul myag myags// sod sod/ d+ha di ma ma/
karma shi krang ka ra ye/ ma ra sa na/ pra ma ra rta na ye hUM phaT/ dgra bgegs srog la rni tri ma ra ya rbad rbad sod sod/ de ltar ma yengs drag tu bzlas// skabs su phur pa thun gyis brab//

gang zag dbang po'i khyad par gyis// bdun nam bcu bzhi nyer gcig gis// dam nyams dgra bo gang yin pa// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan yang sgrol// de tshe rtags kyi rim pa yang// phur pa rten la me 'od 'phro/

khyi spyang wa dang 'phar ba'i skad// phur srungs las la tshud pa dang// gla ba ra dang bya sogs skad// dgra bo'i bla khug 'gyur med rtags// de nas ling ga bsreg dgug btab// mnan sreg 'phangs gsum las gzhung bsdu//
zhes bka' stsal to// phur pa gsang ba snying po 'phrin las kyi rgyud las/ drag sngags spyi dril khro rgyal stobs bsdus su bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis//

rgyud kyi las tshogs rim pa gang/ khro bo chen pos gsung du gsol// de nas khro mchog he ru kas// rdo rje 'dzin la bka' stsal pa// thabs kyi spyod pa'i 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba//

las tshogs rim par bstan pa ni// bdag gzhan srung ba'i 'khor lo yang// dar ram gro ga shog shog la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bzhi// lte bar bsrung bya mu khyud la// kI la ya'i snying po bri bar bya//

rtsibs brgyad bzhi snying dril ba bri// rtsibs chen la bsrung sngags 'di'o// sarba ru tri hring hring dza/ sarba du Sh+tan b+h+yo/ tri rak+Sha b+h+yo/ de yi phyi rim khro bcu dang// rten 'brel snying po la sogs bri//

rab gnas legs byas mgul du gdags// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rnams dang// mi mthun phyogs rnams kun thub ste// bsrung ba'i mchog gyur 'di nyid do// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sde brgyad rang la gnod pa'am//
pha rol sbyor bas rbad pa dang// rang gi chos skyong 'khu bzlog na// sbyor ba 'di yis gnad la dbab// gro ga dug shog dag la ni// gnag pa'i gzugs la ling ka bya// rtsibs brgyad rtse mo nang la gtad//

rtsibs brgyad spu gri'i sngags rnams bkod// rtsibs mchan la ni gzir sngags 'di'o// sarba du Sh+tan tig nan/ e hur thums dza ma ra ya rbad rbad/ phyi la bzhi snying sngags kyis bskor// dril te tshon skud sna lngas bcings//

thod ngan nang gzhug bsgrub khung stsal// lcags sam seng ldeng phur pas bzir// sngags ni bzhi snying gcig dril lo// de tshe rtags kyi rim pa yang// ri nyil chu 'khrug dmag dpung bsdus// phyag 'tshal las byed bsgo ba

nyan// de ltar byung nas 'khor lo phyung// 'o ma rtsi sman dag gis bkru// chos skyong bskangs so gtor ma mchod// des ni gnod 'tshe 'khu mi nus// phyi nas bsgo ba'i bka' nyan 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//

rnal 'byor byang chub sgrub pa'i tshe// bar chod dam srid dgra bgegs gsum// rnal 'byor pa yi bdud du che// de dag sgral ba'i thabs bstan pa// dug shog ro ras dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas//

dbus su gang gnod ling ga bri// rtsibs brgyad la ni sngags 'di'o// dgra bgegs dam sri rnir tri shad truM hur thuM dza ma ra ya rbad/ dgra bgegs dam sri ma ra ya rnir tri rbad thuM/ zhes bri dgug gzhug drag tu bya//

lha dang srung ma pho nya bskul// rdzas ngan du bas bdug cing gzir// mgo nas dril te yug skras bcing// sgrub khung sum brtsegs nag por gzhug/ lcags sam seng ldeng phur pas gzir// nyungs kar nyungs nag thun gyis brab//

lta ba'i gdeng ldan phaT kyis bskrad// de tshe rtags kyi rim pa yang// stong gsum me yis khengs pa dang// rang lus me 'bar sems can gsad// ling ka bton nas hom la sreg/ thal ba mchod rten 'og tu mnan//

phyis nas gnod cing 'tshe mi nus// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bar chod 'byung po'i bgegs gzhom na// dug shog dag la 'khor lo yang// rtsibs brgyad bris pa'i dbus su ni// 'byung po gang gnod ru pa bri//

rtsibs brgyad spu gri'i sngags kyis bskor// rtsibs chen la ni sngags 'di'o// tri ra tsa shag dun/ ma zhung tri ma ra ya rbad nan sod/ de la spu gri'i sngags bzlas shing// phur pas gdab cing thun gyis brab//

zhag gsum song nas thul rtags 'byung// mchod rten rab gnas can gyi 'og/ gru gsum brus te mnan par bya// de steng ri rab gzugs kyis mnan// rdo rje'i bros mnan ldang mi srid// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//

gdug pa'i klu ni gnod byed na// klu rigs lnga ni 'dul bar bshad// dur khrod ras sam shog shog la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// dbus su klu gnyan gang gnod bri// rtsibs la spu gri'i drag sngags la//

rtsibs mchan klu yi gzir sngags bri// badzra kI li kI la ya/ na ga du na tsan d+he tsan d+he/ mi li mi li/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ nA ga ni swA hA mu khyud mtha' la gzir sngags ni// na ga ra tsa ling has phob/

na ga dum ba le le/ na ga ra tsa shag dun/ na ga phe laM/ gnod byed nA ga'i lus ngag yid gsum chings chings/ de nas ling kha sgrub khung du// skyer phur sor bzhi brgyad la brgyang// bskyed rim gsal bas drag sngags bzlas//
klu'i dgug bstim yang yang bya// lcags sams seng ldeng phur bus gzir// nyungs kar nyungs nag gu gul dang// mu zi
nag po'i thun gyis brab// sngags ni bzhi snying dril ba la// na ga glu yi gzir sngags gdags// de tshe sngags kyi rim pa yang// chu bo skems dang nya sbrul bsad// ba dmar glang dmar bdas pa dang//

yul khams mes khengs lha khang sreg/ de tshe 'khor lo dril nas bcings// tsha tsha 'am mchod rten nang du gzhug/ lha khang mchod rten 'og tu mnan// klu nad mdze yang sos gyur na// phyis nas klu la brtsams pas mchog/

de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bskyed rim nga rgyal ldan pa yis// smyon pa 'dul zhing gso ba yang// dur khrod ras sam shog shog la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// rtsibs brgyad dbus su smyo 'dre bri//

rtsibs la bzhi snying sngags bris te// rtsibs mchan// ra tsa sra ma na ra tsa shag dun kha ling dza ya rbad/ rag sha ra hu la/ ke ste ra hu la/ a ya ma du ru tsa sha na rbad// ces bris de yi phyi rim la//

smyos 'dre gang gnod pa tri hur thums dza ma ra ya rbad/ ces bris sngon dmar byad du gzhag/ bsgrub khung nag po'i nang du bsgrub// smyon pa'i ske la thag nag gdags// phur pa la rtod rgyangs nas gzugs//
phur thun brab cing drag sngags gzir// zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig na// smyon pa thul bar the tsom med// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// pha rol rbod gtong bzlog pa na// dur khrod ro ras dug shog la//
'khor lo rtsibs bcu ldan par bri// dbus su rang gi ming rus la// de yi phyi rim kI la'i sngags/ rtsibs bcu la ni khro bo bcu// de yi phyi rim mu khyud la// hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo/ hri ta ya mo ha ya/

pra ha ra na hUM phaT/ sa ma ya a ti pra ma ni/ pa ra ni b+h+yo/ a la la b+h+yo/ a la la b+h+yo/ a la la b+h+yo/ e ya b+h+yo bzlog bzlog bzlog/ nang gi rtsibs chen dag la yang// ka ya glongs log bzlog bcu mtshan bri/

drag po'i gnas nas sa blangs la// mchod rten nag po khru gang bya// dgra bo'i rus pa nya'o bya// snying khar mchog phur sor brgyad gdab// bsgrub khung khru gang nang du gzhug/ de stengs mchod rten nag po la//

bum par bdag 'khor g.yog bcas kyi// ming rus srungs cig bcas pa bri// gzungs thag bum pa'i nang nas drang// drag po'i sngags rgod thog ltar bzlas// oM badzra kI la ya hUM hUM hUM/ bdun tra ma ra ya rbad nan/

kha la dza ma mi rbad nan// ra tsa dun ling shag rbad nan/ shig shig/ duM duM rbad nan/ tshal ba tshal ba rbad nan// khroM khroM b+h+yo rbad nan/ rmug rmug rbad nan/ tir tir rbad nan/ tshal tshal rbad nan/

skabs su mchod rten gshus pa'i 'og/ phur pa la sogs thun gyis brab// ma nyes spang gzung gshed du sbas// rtags kyi rim pa gang yin pa// dmag dpung bcom dang grong khyer 'joms// rgyal po'i pho brang bshig pa dang/ mtshon cha kha
mar dum bor bcad// rang phyogs dmag rgyal dar phyar dang// gsos 'debs rbab gtong brag gshog sogs// byung nas nya bo ling khar bcas// phur thun brab cing tha mar bsegs// thal

ba ling ro dgra phyogs sam// nye na nyams pa'i khang rmangs mnan// gtor ma thun sogs dgra phyogs 'phangs/ kho nyid phung ste rtsa ba chod// zlog pa'i thar thug 'di nyid do// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rgyal
gsen gtum po ma rung ba// gzir zhing 'dul bar 'dod pa na// lcags rdor nag po'i lte ba la// sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor nas kyang// nad pa'i steng nas gzir bar bya// gu gul du bas sna nas
bdug/ srin lag g.yon bsdams sngags kyis gzir// sngags ni spu gri'i sham bu ru// gnod byed 'byung po'i srog la rnir hur thums dza ma ra ya sod/ tri hur thum dza ma ra ya rbad sod/ ces bzlas phur thun
sogs kyis brab// 'dren ngan skad ngan tser re 'bros// gdon bgegs thul bar the tshom med// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// zho chang srung ba'i las mthal ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad sngags bcas

bkod// lte bar srungs dang ming spel gzhug/ rtsibs la bzhi snying drag po dril// rtsibs chen la ni 'di nyid bkod// dur ti nag po sod/ dur ru nag po nan/ 'chang 'dre/ dkar 'dre kha ching sa/ za 'dre kha

chings/ phyi la bsrungs bya gang 'os bri// rab gnas legs byas sbal par gzhug/ sngags ni khri ru bzlas nas kyang// sbal pa la ni yang yang bzlas// zho chang gang bsrung steng du gzhag/ rtsa sngags rde'u dkar

nag la/ khr-i stong bzlas la zho chang gzhug/ des kyang thub par the tshom med// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mdze dang gag lhog 'brum bu 'bras// gnyan sogs 'joms par bya 'dod na// gu gul nag po mu zi

nag/ shu dag btsan dug rgya phag tshil// mi dang rta kyang tshil dag dang// dri chen dri chung rwa gzhob sbre// rwa nang sbyar la sngags kyi gtso// rlangs ma shor ba dam du gcad// byang chub sems dpas 'grub par
'gyur// phur pa gsang ba snying po 'phrin las kyi rgyud las/ las tshogs bye brag tu bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// he ru ka la 'di skad gsol// drag po'i las ni
bzlog pa dang// bsrung ba'i go cha'i rim pa gang// lan du 'jigs byed bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor ma traM rtsibs brgyad dbus// 'bru zan dpal bshos khru gang la// dpal dgus bskor te bya khyung
gzugs// sha khrag dmar dang srung ma'i rdzas// zor dang thun rdzas yongs rdzogs nas// lha tshogs bdun cu rtsa gnyis la// bzlog pa'i 'phrin las drag po bcol// spu gri tshig shur drag sngags
kyis// dgra bgegs nya'o phur thun bsgral// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// gsang bdag khyod kyi mthu 'jig cing// ri gzar rbab kyang bzlog par nus// yul khams gnas gsum bdag bsrung na// gtor ma'i

sbyor ba gang nyid la// zor kong nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// dug khrag tshe dang zangs zor bya// dbang mo'i sngags bzlas phyogs mtshams brdeg/ thal rgyas gdab cing b+h+yo zor gdab// gtor ma dgra bgegs stong du

brdeg/ gnas srungs dar mar ras shog la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// lte bar bsrung bya ming rus byas// rtsibs bcu khro bo bcu yi sngags// phyi rim spu gri'i sngags kyis bskor// b+h+yo zlog dmod

mo rig pas sbyar// rab tu gnas te dril nas kyang// rdza yi rus sbal nang du brub// de 'dra bzhi ni gnas 'chang gi/ zur bzhir mi mngon sbas nas gzhag/ nang pa phyi rol mu stegs kyi// sbyor ba ngan pa thams

cad thub// shwa dang chu dmag bzlog na yang/ sbyor ba gong ltar nges pa la/ khro bcu dang ni bzhi snying dril// sngags bri tsha tsha'i nang du gzhug/ spu gri dang ni dbang mo'i sngags// bzlas te shwa rbud steng du brdeg/ 'di

lta bu yi sbyor ba ni// rgya mcho'i rlabs kyang zlog par nus// ces bka' stsal to// phur pa gsang ba snying po 'phrin las kyi rgyud las/ bsrung bzlog las kyi med kha bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas

gsang ba'i bdag po yis// he ru ka la gsol ba ni// legs so che btsan khro bo'i rgyal// gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba'i// rgyud kyi don ni gang du bsdu// gtad rgya ji ltar gzung bar bgyi// he ru ka yis

bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzin// bla med gsang ba'i rgyud 'di ni// bi to'i yang snying zhes par zung// 'phrin las thams cad 'dus pa'i tog/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud du zung// gsang ba bla

med 'phrin las rgyud// snying po 'rgyud du 'di zung zhig/ rgyud don chos kyi dbyings nyid las// 'gag med rtsal las dbyings kyi ngang// phur ni chos kyi dbyings nyid de// pa ni rig pa'i ye shes so// dgra

bgegs lnga phur tshar gcod phyir// 'debs pa'i phyir ni phur pa'o// oM badzra kI li kI la ya// sarba b+hig nan baM hUM phaT// bdun nam nyer gcig brgyad bzlas so// rdo rjes khros pa'i rtsa ba'i ngang// chos nyid
don gyi bden pa'o// gnag pa'i las ni bsgrub pa'i tshe// dkar nag mtshams su btab par bya'o// 'phrin las rnam bzhi 'grub pa'i don// 'dul pa'i 'khor gyis shes par gyis// ces pa'i bka' stsal pa
dang/ 'khor thams cad yi rangs te// 'phrin las mngon spyod drag po'i las la spyod par gyur to// de nas las kyi khro bdag chen po he ru ka nyid kyang/ gsang chen dbyings kyi mkha' la thim
par gyur to// bi to ta ma la 'bum sde'i rgyud las/ gsang ba 'phrin las kyi rgyud ces bya ba khul du byung ba rdzogs so//// gsang ba'i rgyud mchog bla med 'di// u rgyan pad+ma bdag nyid kyis// bod yul

dbus su snang bar byas// ye shes mtsho rgyal nyid la gtad// da lta spel dus ma bab pas// dang lung ldang la'i brag la sbas// ma 'ongs lnga bcu kha ral dus// thugs kyi sras dang phrad nas kyang// 'gro don

bstan pa mthar rgyas shog/ gter rgyaH sbas rgyaH zab rgyaH gsang rgyaH gsang rgya'oH rgya rgya rgyaHH rgya gar skad du/ badzra kI la ya nA ma tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud
kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs sgrol byed kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung

dang/ thugs gsang ba'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ pho brang lhun gyis grub pa dur khrod chen po'i gnas na/ khro bo chen po yon tan sdud pa zhes bya ba dang/ khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang/ khro bo chen po

dbyug pa sngon po zhes bya ba dang/ khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed ces bya ba dang/ khro bo chen po mi g.yo mgon zhes bya ba dang/ khro bo chen po rta mgrin zhes bya ba dang/ khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba

dang/ khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil ba zhes bya ba dang/ khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang/ khro bo chen po stobs po zhes bya ba la sogs pa btsun mo dang bcas/ bran dang bcas/ bka'
nyan dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su bkang nas bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpal sku gsung thugs sgrol byed kyi

rgyal po/ yum 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma dang gnyis su med par gyur to// de gnyis su med par gyur nas kyang/ gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ros khyab par gyur to// de'i tshe khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil
pas gnyis su med pa'i ngang las stan las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi bdag po la gsol pa btab bo// e ma'o bde ba chen po'i sku// ye nas dag pa'i
dbyings nyid las// skur gyur sems can kun sgrol phyir// gsang ba'i de nyid bshad du gsol// zhes gsol te/ de skad ces gsol ba btab ma thag tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
pos sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs srung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ bdud thams cad sel bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba de nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las

phyung ngo/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzrA nAn u tsa ta ya hUM hUM hUM phaT/ 'di phyung ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin
dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ yi dgas dang/ brjed byed la sogs pa snga mar gyur pa thams cad phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad rab tu byer ro// de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phye ma sbyor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bdud 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku

dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya ba ka tsit+ta badzra nan tsakra oM bruM/ tsakra hUM bruM/ tsakra ha bruM/ 'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang klu la
sogs thams cad la/ 'khor lo'i thog dang/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang// ral gri la sogs pa'i thog gi char bab par gyur to// thams cad kyang bred sha thon nas/ phyogs mtshams su mig rtsa
bgrad de cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/ khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ma rungs 'jigs pa can/ khyod
mthong bas ni bdag 'jigs na// lha dang klu la sogs pa rnams// 'jigs par gyur pa smos ci dgos// drag cing gdug pas rab bsgrubs pa'i// drag po'i gtum po khro bo yang// khyod gzugs mthong bas

skrag par gyur// sgra skad thos pa smos ci dgos// zhes gsungs so// de nas khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil bas// lha dang klu la sogs pa blangs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bde gshegs kun gyis dbang bskur

ba'i// las kyi khro bo bdag nyid kyang// drag po'i sku ni mthong bas sreg/ gzhan pa'i sgra sogs smos ci dgos// lha dang klu la sogs pa'i tshogs// gsang sngags 'di las gang 'da' ba// a dz+ha ka yi dog pa
bzhin// mgo ni tshal bar 'gas par 'gyur// zhes bsgo bas thams cad nyan par gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las// bdud thams cad 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po////

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang po khro bo 'jigs byed chen pos/ bde ba chen po gsang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'dus pa chen po 'khor rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ thams cad gsang ba kun gyi bdag/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo
sgyur// gang du gsang ba'i don 'byung ba// de nyid bcom ldan bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi bdag po
khro bo 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ don chen po dang rab ldan pas// thams cad gsang ba'i don gsol ba// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod legs so// gang du gsang ba bde ba'i

don// ngas ni khyod la bshad par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// 'gyur dang bstan pa'i bdag nyid can// rnam snang gnas su de nyid bsgom// dbang po lnga las 'od byung bas// rnal 'byor dbang po kha

dbye bar// gsal ba'i sku lnga bsal bar bsam// gang du 'gro dang 'ong ba kun// mchod dang bstim pa'i tshul du gnas// gang tshe gnas par gyur pa'i tshe// 'ong ba'i tshul du gnas par bzhag/ snang mdzad sum

cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// 'od bzhi rtsa ba'i 'od dang ldan// de nyid bsgoms kyis dngos grub gnyis// thogs pa med pa rdo rje bzhin// snang ba mtha' yas gnas dag tu// bde chen snang ba mtha' yas bsam// dbang

po'i 'od las rtser bzung nas// mchod dang dngos grub gnyis kyi tshul// 'gro dang 'ong ba gnas par bya// mtshan mchog rtsa gnyis 'od ldan pa// 'od bzhi rtsa ba'i 'od dang ldan// yon tan dngos grub de bzhin
no// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas dag tu// de bsgoms dbang po sbyong ba dang// rin chen gnas kyang sbyang bar bya// gang du gcig cig sogs pa yi// rtags lnga rim skyes mtha' mar ni// bde gshegs dngos grub
'byung bar 'gyur// gang tshe gsang ba'i don ldan pa// de yi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i mchog/ yid bzhin nor bu rab bsgoms pas// rnal 'byor pa ni grol bar
'gyur// thab sa dang shes rab gsang ba yi// rin chen nor bu rab bsgoms pas// rnam rtog thams cad bzlog pa yin// dngos rtogs sems can thams cad la// bla med byang chub yod mi 'gyur// gsang ba'i
yi ge la gnas pa// rnal 'byor de ni grol bar 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi sngags kyi mchog/ rdo rje phur pa'i rgyud las rnyed// 'di ni bcom ldan thams cad kyis// ma gsungs gsung bar mi 'gyur ro// bskal pa
grangs med thams cad du// thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa// shes rab mig dang ldan pas 'grub// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las// gsang ba chen po'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs dang/ thugs rdo rje bdag pos kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos/ yongs su dag pa'i sbyor ba rdo

rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ 'dus pa chen po 'khor thams cad kyis/ chos thams cad yongs su dag pa'i sbyor ba'i ngang du sangs
rgyas par mthong ngo// de'i tshe khro bo chen po mi g.yo mgon stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ e ma ho bde ba chen po'i sku// gsang ba bde ba chen po nyid// yongs su dag pa sbyor ba'i
mchog/ bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bka' stsal pa// bde ba chen po rab bsgrub phyir// gsang ba'i don zhus khyod legs so// gang phyir gsang ba chen po'i don// ngas
ni khyod la bshad par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// dngos por snang ba'i chos rnams kun// ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu stong// chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// cir snang sems kyi snang bar

'dod// kun nas 'khrul pa'i dbang dag tu// sna tshogs snang ngo rang bzhin med// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// 'khrul pa yin phyir so sor snang// dper na chu zla smig rgyu bzhin// sems ni thog ma tha ma
med// 'das dang ma 'ongs phyi nang med// snga phyi ltos pas gang yang med// rang bzhin 'od gsal 'dus ma byas// dam pa'i don la rtag par bsgom// dngos por gyur pa'i don bsgoms pas// de la mchog gi
dngos grub med// de las dngos po med par bsgom// dngos med mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pas// sems mthong de la dngos grub 'gyur// gzugs sogs skye 'jig gnas bral ba// thams cad dngos po med
par bsgom// dngos med dngos po'i sa bon med// ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ gang tshe dngos po med gyur pa// de tshe rnam par rtog dang
bral// de ni mi rtog ye shes te// rtog las 'das pas chos sku mthong// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyug pa sngon pos 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad sems nyid ngo bo bas// thog ma med
pa'i dbyings nyid du// sems gsal dngos grub kun gyi bdag/ des ni gang dmigs dngos grub myur// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// don
dam 'dod 'gyur rnal 'byor pas// rags dang phra ba'i rtog pa spong// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa yis// rnal 'byor de ni grol bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo mgon
gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bskyed rdzogs ting 'dzin la gnas nas// spyod pa dag la brlab par bya// grogs dang de nyid ting 'dzin gyis// dmigs med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes
gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rta mchog dpal gyi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// mdzub mos zla bstan ji bzhin du// chos rnams dngos po med gyur kyang// ming dang tshig dang yi ge yi// brda
yi sgo nas bstan par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di skad ces gsungs so// ming dang tshig dang yi ge yis// don gyis brdar byed ma rtogs par// rang
bzhin med pa'i chos rnams la// ming med tshig med ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas 'di skad ces gsungs so// gang du yod pas skye ba med// med dang rtag
chad gnyis las min// gang tshe skye ba ma grub pas// gnas dang 'gag pa'ang 'grub pa med// ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sdud par mdzad pas 'di skad ces gsungs so// skye dang
'gag dar gnas dang kun// byis pa rnams kyis 'khrul nas brtags// rnal 'byor ye shes kyis brtags na// dngos med sa bon la sogs med// ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jom pa
stobs chen zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsungs so// gang tshe sems can snang ba la// bde gshegs sprul pa cir snang yang// bsod nams thugs rje'i stobs yin te// don dam pa la snang ba med// ces gsungs
so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbu ma chen po'i ngang la mi g.yo bar bzhugs so// de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i lha mo rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba// rtag tu mnyam
nyid thugs rje'i bdag/ smon lam mchog grub rdzogs pa'i sku// mnyam nyid ngang la rab bzhengs la// rnal 'byor ma la rtag tu spyod// ces pas thams cad rags pa'i rnam par 'bar ba 'phro bar 'gyur
to// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las// bde ba chen po'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi khro bo gtso bo kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed chen pos 'khor lo

bkod pa'i tshul du rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tshul du snyoms par zhugs te/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// rags pa'i rtog pa rnam spong zhing// phyag rgya grub 'dod rnal 'byor pas// gtso bo ting 'dzin la gnas
na// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// hUM mdzad ting 'dzin la gnas na// nyi zla pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// las rnams thogs pa med par 'gyur// rnam rgyal ting 'dzin la gnas na// dri za pho
mo thabs kyis 'dul// zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dbyug sngon ting 'dzin la gnas na// me lha pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// sreg pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// gshed po ting
'dzin la gnas na// gshed po pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub par bshad// mi g.yo'i ting 'dzin la gnas na// srin po pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// rengs pa'i las rnams 'grub par
'gyur// rta mgrin ting 'dzin la gnas na// klu rgyal pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// mi thub ting 'dzin la gnas na// rlung lha pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// bsad dang
'gugs pa'i las rnams 'grub// bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin la gnas na// gnod sbyin pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// bsad pa'i las rnams 'grub par bshad// khams gsum ting 'dzin la gnas na// 'byung po pho
mo thabs kyis 'dul// rmongs pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// stobs chen ting 'dzin la gnas na// sa bdag pho mo thabs kyis btul// mnan pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// bde gshegs khro bo

ting 'dzin gyis// snying khar thig le bsgoms nas kyang// thabs dang shes rab rol gyur nas// bde ba chen po'i don rnyed nas// rtag tu mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje
phur pa las// las kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed rgyal pos srin mo rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te// 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnal 'byor phyag rgya'i bdag nyid can// sgra 'byin ting 'dzin la gnas na// rtag par de nyid gsang sngags ldan// dngos grub 'byor pa byas gyur na// lha mo bkol ba'i cho
ga 'grub// bsnyems ma'i ting 'dzin la gnas na// zhi dang lha mo dgug pa dang// dri za pho mo dgug pa 'grub// de bzhin lcags bsregs las kyang 'grub// sder mo'i ting 'dzin la gnas na// me yi las
rnams thams cad dang// me lha bu mo bkol ba dang// bsad dbral las kun grub par 'gyur// dur khrod ting 'dzin la gnas na// mnan pa'i las rnams bya ba dang// gshin rje pho mo dgug pa dang// bcud
dgug pa yang 'grub par 'gyur// gtun khung ting 'dzin la gnas na// brdung ba'i las rnams thams cad dang/ srin po pho mo dgug pa dang// smi 'bros khu ba dgug pa 'grub// gtum mo'i ting 'dzin la
gnas na// dgug pa'i las rnams bya ba dang// klu yi bu mo dgug pa 'grub// mda' bsnyems ting 'dzin la gnas na// dgug bskrad las rnams bya ba dang// rlung lha'i bu mo dgug pa dang// tshe bsring pa yi
las rnams 'grub// rlung 'byin ting 'dzin la gnas na// dgug dang myos par bya ba dang// gnod sbyin bu mo dgug pa dang// bu slong ba yang 'grub par 'gyur// gsod ma'i ting 'dzin la gnas

na// gsad dang dbral bar bya ba dang// 'byung po pho mo dgug pa dang// de bzhin gso ba'ang 'grub par 'gyur// skul byed ting 'dzin la gnas na// sangs rgyas slong bar byed pa dang// sad dang sa bdag pho
mo dgug/ shi ba slong ba de bzhin no// rnal 'byor 'di la rtag gnas na// snying khar thig le bsams nas kyang// 'og gi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// bsam gtan 'di la rtag gnas na// mtshan ma lnga'am yang

na ni/ dag pa rnam bzhi rims kyis 'byung// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las// rdo rje srin mo bka'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dpal kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed

kyi rgyal pos gnyis su med par sbyor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// rang nyid gtso bo ting 'dzin gyis// mos 'gyur yum

dang gnyis med las// so so'i khro bo'i sprul pa spro// slar la sdud pa'i bdag nyid can// gnyis su med pa'i bde ba la// snyoms zhugs rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor legs par rdzogs pa dang// slob
ma'i sdig pa legs bslang ste// shi 'phos gyur nas bum pa'i chus// sbyi bo legs bkrus dbu rgyan dang// rdo rje dril bu'i bdag po yis// legs bzhugs rigs lnga'i bdag nyid can// thabs dang shes rab

gnyis med pa'i/ nyi ma zla ba lce la reg/ nyi zla kha sbyor rab byas te// gnyis med bde ba'i dgyes pas bstim// gsang ba byang chub phur bu yis// rnam rtog rtsad nas bcod bar byed// ces gsungs so// rgyud

kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang dpal kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi

le'u 'di gsungs so/ gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// rtag tu gzhan gyi don la gnas// stegs bu khru ni nyi shu lnga// nyi shu bcu drug legs byas te// steng du sbyang ba'i ngang la gnas// thams cad rang
bzhin med par bsam// zhes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das sa chen po yongs su bzung ba'i dam tshig go/ yi ge lnga las legs byas pa'i// sa gzhi bzang po mdzes pa ste// 'od zer kha dog lnga dang ldan// rtag tu
sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas// zhes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje'i dam tshig go/ yon tan tshogs rdzogs rnal 'byor gyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// dkyil 'khor rdzogs
nas bgegs rnams bzlog khro bo'i tshul dang ldan pas 'grub// ces pa ni sa chen po bzung ba'i dam tshig go/ kha dog lnga ldan legs bsgril te// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med par// yi ge lnga

las legs byung bas// rdo rje khu tshur legs par byed// ces pa ni rdo rje thig gdab dam tshig go/ rin chen lnga'am kha dog lnga/ legs byas yi ge lnga yis brlab// dbus mthing shar lho nub byang bzhi// dkar

ser dmar ljang 'khor lo grub// rdo rje yi ge sku rnams kun// gang zag mos pa'i dbang du gsungs// gru chad ljang ku bzhi'i khyams// sgo glo khyams la sogs pa rnams// legs par tshon gyis bri bar bya// rgyun

dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la// mkhas pas rtag tu bsgoms na 'grub// byin brlabs ya mtshan sna tshogs 'byung// zhes pa ni rdo rje tshon gyi dam tshig go/ rtag tu gnod pa'i sbyor ba can// de bsal phyin na

'jug pa brtsam// ku sha la sogs sbyor ba yis// bgegs bskrad byang chub sems bskyed de// ngag gi nyes pa sbyang bar bya// a khri bor hUM/ yi ge lnga la 'jug par 'gyur// rtag tu bde ba'i don la gnas// de

nas ku sha'i dam tshig gis// bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i cho ga bya// so shing dag gi dam tshig gis// ngag gi nyes pa sbyong bar byed// tshon skud lnga'i dam tshig gis// nyon mongs pa dag srung bar byed// ces pa ni
'jug pa'i cho ga'i dam tshig go/ rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po

'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos/ yi ge 'khor lo spro ba'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par 'phro

ba zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo/ oM shrI badzra ku mA ra sarba big+ha nan nA sha ya nA sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra krod+ha hUM kA ra hUM gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM ha na ha na hUM

phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka hUM pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha

a pA ri dzi ta hUM tiSh+ta tiSh+ta hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM b+hin da b+hin da hUM phaT/ oM badzra ma hA ba la hUM s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ ces

gsungs so// 'di gsungs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yi ge'i 'phreng bar gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge 'phreng ba rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// e
ma'o stong gsum thams cad yi ge'i tshogs// yi ge'i sems nyid snang ba de// 'di la sangs rgyas thams cad dang// sems can kun yang 'di las 'byung// gang tshe tshogs rnams thams cad
kun// sems las byung rtogs de yi tshe// sems dben don mthong de ru ni// de bsgrubs gyur nas de la dmigs// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rnams// sems snang de phyir sems nyid yin// sems nyid yi

ge'i rang bzhin nyid// ci ltar sgra rnams kun brjod kyang// yi ge nyid las gzhan ma yin/ sna tshogs yi ge sgra byung ba// sgra la smra bsam brjod las 'das// de la smon lam thugs rje dang// sems can las

'phros sna tshogs sgra/ gsungs pa nyid las brjod du med// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// de ni ma skyes skye ba med// yi ge oM ni sku yin te// spros nas mchod de spar ba dang// bskyed pa'i las byed yi ge

lnga// mtshon ni rlung lnga 'byung ba'i bdag/ yi ge hUM ni thugs yin te// 'du bo myur ba rnam sdud dang// 'bar ba'i 'bebs dang ye shes lnga// mtshon no rlung lnga 'jug pa'i bdag/ a ni yig 'bru kun gyi

mchog/ don rnams ston pa'i yi ge ste// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// 'di ni nor bu dang 'drar bsam// rgyud kyi rgyal bo rdo rje phur pa las/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas

dpal kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos don thams cad grub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje las kyi le'u 'di gsungs so// zhi ba' las kyi sbyor ba ni// dngul lam
dkar po'i phur pa la// de nyid khro bor byin brlabs te// btab pas gdug rtsub zhi bar 'gyur// dngul phye 'bras chan dkar po la// 'o mar sbyar ba'i gtor ma yin// mchod na de yi dngos grub
'byung// gzhan pa'i yul du gyur ma yin// rgyas pa'i las kyi sbyor ba ni// gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la// de nyid khro bor byin brlabs te// btab pas yon tan rgyas par 'gyur// gser phye la sogs
gtor ma yin// mchod na de yi dngos grub 'byung// dbang gi las kyi sbyor ba ni// zangs sam dmar po'i shing rnams la// de nyid khro bor byin brlabs te// btab pas thams cad gsod par 'gyur// zangs
phye la sogs gtor ma yis// mchod na de yi dngos grub 'byung// gsad pa'i las kyi sbyor ba ni// lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la// de nyid khro bor byin brlabs te// btab pas thams cad gsod par
