yin// gsung mchog dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// ma chags pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// gsal ba'i 'od kyis yang dag brgyan// kha dog dmar 'dra tsan dan mdog/ me 'od bcas pa'i gru gsum la// so so'i gdan
dang bcas pa gsal// de lta bu yi gdan dag la// rta mgrin yab yum gsal ba ste// rgyab tu sngags kyi bdag po'i// de bzhin rim par gsal bar lta// mchod par 'os pa'i rdzas kyang dgod// gsung gi

dkyil 'khor dam par bya'o// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// tshad med snying rje bskyes pa dang// byang chub sems la dga' ba dang// sngon du 'gro ba'i mchog yin te// sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// khrag
'thung thugs la gnas pa ni// ye shes rtse mo mchog yin te// hUM gsum las ni 'das pa'i phyir// rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan// de'i thugs dang byin rlobs dang// bzlas brjod dang ni 'phrin las

dang// dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid dang// phun sum tshogs pa bdun po yis// drag po'i las gang grub par byed// dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi mu khyud dang// gru chad bzhi yis brgyan pa'i khyams// nyi zla ga'u
kha sbyar nang// dregs pa'i gdan la gnas par bya// me long ye shes la sogs pa'i// byang chub lnga las thams cad rdzogs// dbus su las kyi he ru ste// yab yum thabs dang shes rab gsal// shar phyogs
'khor lo'i rtsibs la ni// dri za bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// rnam rgyal yab yum gsal bar blta// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs la ni// gshin rje bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil
'khor ldan// gshed po yab yum yongs rdzogs pa'o// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs la ni// klu bdud bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// rta mgrin yab yum gsal bar bskyed// byang phyogs 'khor
lo'i rtsibs stengs na// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// stobs chen yab yum gsal bar bskyed// sgo ma la sogs de bzhin bya// ga'u'i nang du hUM bsgril bya// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so// gsal
ba'i 'od bcas me long ltar// snang ye shes zhes bya'o// gsal ba'i 'od dang bcas pa ni// mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o// chos dbyings ye shes rgyu mthun rang bzhin ni// chos dbyings ye shes bya ba
ste// 'dus pa bya ba nan tan gyi// ye shes zhes ni brjod pa yin// de ltar ye shes lnga rnams kyis// bde gshegs 'khor bcas yongs rdzogs pa'o// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// thugs las yongs su
shar ba yin// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams kyis// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs lnga// zhi dang rgyas me dang dbang dang dgug/ bsad dang bsgral dang bzlog pa'i las// srung dang bsdigs pa'i

las dang ni// bskrad dang dbye ba'i las rnams bsgrub// las kyi mtshan nyid gsal bya'o// bsgrub dang sgrub pa chen po'i dbang// ji ltar snang ba'i dkyil 'khor la// re re la yang drug drug ste// mtshan nyid
bgrang ba las 'das pas// brjod las 'das te bsam bya min// nges pa med par rgyal bas gsungs// zhes sungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po gsang ba gter zhes bya ba'i mdo las// khro bo so so'i
dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badzra kI la ya la/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan gsang chen
bdag/ rnam par rol ba'i rang bzhin can// kun mkhyen thams cad sa le'o// ma 'gags dri ma rnasam dang bral// rgyan gyi gtso bo dam pa'i mchog/ ye shes skus ni sems can don// bdag nyid gtso bo skyabs
dam pa// dkyil 'khor rnams ni gsungs lags na// lha la dbang bskur mi 'tshal lam// dbang bskur thabs ni ji ltar bgyi// lha la byin rlobs byin 'tshal lam// thabs ni ji ltar rlab par bgyi// rang
bzhin dkyil 'khor dam pa rnams// dgug cing bstim pa mi 'tshal lam// bstim pa'i thabs ni ji ltar bgyi// lha la mchod 'bul mi 'tshal lam// mchod pa'i grangs ni du zhig mchis// bstod pa'i tshul ni ji
ltar bstod// bstod pa'i grangs ni du zhig mchis// khrag 'thung rgyal po bshad du gsol// ces gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badzra kI la yas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// dbang dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir// khyod kyis zhus pa legs so legs// nga yis bstan bya legs par nyon// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil
'khor las// 'byung po srog dang 'gal ba bya// rdo rje g.yab mos g.yab nas ni// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas// de mnyes dbang bskur brtsam pa dang// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba bskul ba
yis// de yis dbang bskur rnams pa gnyis// bye brag rnams su shes rab bya'o// bdag nyid gtso bo'i khyad par la// lha mo rnams kyis bskul ba yi// thabs ni rnam pa gnyis su gsung// phyi nang gsang ba'i
dbang gsum po// bum pa bdud rtsi'i byang chub sems// dbu rgyan lus dang shes pa rgyas// ye shes rgyas pa phun sum tshogs// dbang gi 'bras bu yin par gsungs// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor rang bzhin
gsal// gsal ba'i dbyibs rnams byin brlobs phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'phros// bdag po'i sku ni gsal bar bzhag/ dbang bskur byin brlabs rim pa ni// so so'i cha yis dbye bar bya// mkhas
pas gsal ba so so ni// dbye bar bya ste dbang byin brlab// sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bltas la// rlung gi kyo bas rab bskul gsal// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan
drangs mchod// lcags kyus dbyings nas spyan drangs byon// zhags pas gzhal yas legs gzhug ste// lcags sgrog gnyis su med par bya// dril bus mnyes par bya ba yin// sems can don rnams rab grub
par// mya ngan mi 'da' brtan par bzhugs// bstim bya thabs dang bcas pa'o// bdag gi dkyil 'khor dam pa las// lha mo mang po 'thon gyur pas// rang bzhin grub pa'i gnas nyid du// mnyes nas bskul
bya gsol ba gdab// phyogs bcu'i gnas las nges par 'thon// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byams la// las dang mthun pa'i tshul brtags la// yang dag gsang ba'i gnas su 'khyil// gsang ba'i ngang
tshul bzung nas ni// rnam smin las dbang de bsams la// mchod pa'i bye brag dbul ba yin// d+hu pe dkar mo spos me thogs// nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su 'bul// gnyis med dri yis tshim nas ni// sems
can don rnams ci rgyas mdzad// puSh+pe ser mo me tog bsnams// rnam par snang mdzad de la dbul// gnyis med rgyan gyis mdzes byas la// sems can don rnams mdzes par 'byung// A lo dmar mo mar me
bsnams// 'od dpag med la mchod par bya// 'od zer stong dang ldan byas nas// sems can don rnams gsal byed pa'o// gan+d+he ljang khu dri chab bsnams// mi bskyod dam pa dbul byas pas// bde ba'i ro ldan
rang bzhin gsal// sems can don rnams bde bar mdzad// la se 'gying stabs mchod pa yis// sa yi snying po mchod byas nas// gnyis med chags pa'i rang bzhin bas// sems don la chags

bskyed mdzad// rin chen 'phreng bas de bzhin te// mdzes par gzi bskyed sems can don// rol bas de bzhin byed par 'gyur// girti sgra dbyangs snyan pa bsnyad// phyag na rdo rje mchod byas nas// gnyis med

sgra yis mnyes byas nas// sems can don mdzad sgra snyan mdzad// niti gar gyi bye brag gis// sa yi snying po de mchod pas// gnyis med ro yis mnyes gyur nas// don kun sgyu ma lta bur mdzad// ro yi lha mo'i
bshos kyis ni// spyan ras gzigs la mchod pa ni// longs spyod de bas mnyes gyur nas// sems can don rnams rang bzhin dag/ sgra yilha mo bsil snyan mchod// de bzhin sgra yis tshims byas nas// dag
pa'i zhing du bde bar bkod// re re la yang rdul rnyed du// sangs rgyas rdul bsked mchod par bya// mchod pa dam pa 'di yis ni// bde ba can du 'gro ba'i rgyu// bsod nams las kyang ye shes 'byung// dam

pa yin te rgyu 'bras gnyis// gsal ba'i dbyings mchog dam pa yin// 'di deng bye ma'i mchod pa'o// gsang ba'i lha mo rnams kyis// ma chags pad+ma'i snod nang du// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas la// thams
cad dkyil 'khor rgyal la 'bul// shes 'gyur sku gsung thugs 'tshim nas// byang chub don la nges par 'dod// nang gi mchod pa zhes bya'o// gsang ba'i mchod pa dam pa ni// byang chub sems sam reg pa
ste// spyan ras gzigs sam 'jam dpal la// gang rung las kyi dus su ni// mkhas pas mchod par bya ba yin// mnyes nas mdong grub khyad par can// dus 'di nyid du stsol bar mdzad// gsang ba'i mchod
pa dam par bya// thabs dang grangs su bcad pa'o// de bas mchod sbyin dus su ni// thams cad tshogs nas mdun bdar nas// rang bzhin gsal ba'i mgrin bsdoms nas// gsang ba gsum gyi glu blangs

te// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis bstod// hU~M/ bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yis// 'od zer 'du'aphro klong dkyil nas// khro bo khro mo rnams bzhugs pa// sku ni cir yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs// hU~M/ dbu skra kham
nag ral pa can// gyen du 'khyil bas srid brtse 'bar// mi nyams khro gnyer sdang mig ni// log par lta ba 'dul ba'i spyan// hU~M mche ba zangs yag gtsigs pa ni/ skye shi rtsa ba bcod pa'i phyir// sku
gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs la// phyag rtsa sna tshogs cir yang ston// hU~M/ thugs rje byin rlabs sprin ltar gtibs// byams pa'i 'od zer glog ltar 'khyug/ rngam pa'i sgra skad 'brug ltar sgrogs// sprul
pa'i thog thog char bzhi 'bebs// hU~M/ sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// klan ka mchog po bdud la tshol// ya gam can la dngos grub gsol// kyal ka chen po bgegs la
tshol// hU~M/ thugs rje chen po byin rlabs kyis// bdag la byin gyis rlobs mdzad cing// bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol// hUM/ 'khyil cing rgyan yang 'khyil ba
ste// sems la brjod med sku mi mnga'// sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste// bsam dang bral bas ye shadzes lags// hUM/ srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam nyid ngang gi khrol phyag 'tshal
lo// rdo rje 'du 'phro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// khros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// mi dmigs gsal ba'i ngang la gnas// rjes 'jug thams cad gsal ba'i 'od// ma bcos thugs mchog
gnas su 'khyil// thams cad bde ba'i ngang nyid de// dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lo ste// bdag po'i dbang du gsungs pa yin// sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid las// sku gsung rnams su de bskyed bya// thams
cad dkyil 'khor grangs de rnams// so so'i dbye ba ma yin te// gcig gis kunal bya ba'i phyir// ston pa'i rgyal po zhes ni bya// de yi dbang las thams cad 'byung// sku bstod sku yi khyad par te// gsung
bstod dri ma med pa yang// che ba'i yon tan thams cad dang// gnyis med sgo nas bstod pa rnams// 'di las 'byung ba mkhas pas shes// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po rdo rje gsang ba gter
zhes bya ba'i mdo las// dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang las kyi rgyal po yis// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// mi gnas ye

shes bdag nyid che// khrag 'thung rgyal po kun gyi gtso// bde ba'i lam mchog thabs mkhas pa// thugs rje cho 'phrul bsam mi khyab// dbyings mchog ngang las thams cad shar// ngang nyid chos kyi dbyings byung
yang// bag chags skyon gyis gos pa med// gsang bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// gdug pa ma lus bsgral ba la// sras kyi phur pa mi 'tshal lam// de la dkyil 'khor mi 'tshal lam// de la dbang bskur
mi 'tshal lam// sras kyi khyad par du zhig mchis/ grangs kyi rnam pa du zhig mchis// de la mchod pa mi 'tshal lam// de la bstod pa ji ltar bstod// gsod pa'i dkyil 'khor mi bzad pa// gcig gis las
rnams thams cad 'grub// de yi dkyil 'khor ji lta bu// zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan badzra kI la yas// de skad gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas// 'di ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// gdug pa bsgral ba sems
can don// sras kyi rnam pa ngas bshad kyis// las kyi rgyal po rtse gcig nyon// sras su bya ba sems 'byung ste// rang bzhin gnas pa rigs lnga'i rgyu// dbyings su thim na gsal bar shar// 'di
gzugs dbu gsum phyag drug dang// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa'i rim// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// de las mang bar ngas ma bshad// lte ba man chad sku smad ni// sngo bsangs mi bzad 'joms pa'i
sku// 'di ni sras kyi phur pa'o// de yi dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor la// ser dang dmar ba'i 'od dang bcas// de la me 'od 'bar ba 'phro// rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i

tshal// rin chen rgyan dang mchod pas 'khrigs// pad+ma gdan lnga'i dkyil 'khor la// de bzhin rgyan dang ldan par bya// gsang ba yum gyi dkyil 'khor de// thams cad kun la ldan byas te// rin chen zur brgyad
dkyil 'khor dang// yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams// de de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor me// bsil ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i 'od// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor de ltar shes// thabs chen dkyil

'khor chen po ste// phyogs dang mtshams dang steng 'og dang// bdag po bzhin du dgod par bya// nyi shu gcig gam dgu'am lnga// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa brgyad de// so so'i sras kyi dam pa rnams// rang rang ji ltar
yin par brtag/ de las 'phros pa'i sprul pa'i tshogs// shin tu 'bar bas gang bar brtag/ so so rdzas rnams dgod par bya// 'di ni sras mchog dkyil 'khor ro// so so'i byang chub sems de las// 'od
'phros byang chub sems bum pa// gang bas gnas su gsal bar bskyod// mchod bstod lung bstan des dbang bskur// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// des dbang 'grub pa'i lha nyid ni// gsang ba'i
gnas su rang bzhin grub// thams cad 'do dang lhan ne'o// ye nas dag pa'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i lha'am tshogs bcas kun// thams cad kun rdzogs tshogs dang bcas// byang chub sems kyi rim par
gsal// sku gsung thugs su gsal ba dag// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid can// so so'i rigs kyi dbang yang bskur// gdug pa sgrol ba'i sa phyogs de// byang shar mtshams su bya ba yin// mtshan ma de yang rang
bzhin grub// ye nas dag pa'i gzhal yas khang/ chos dbyings 'byung ba'i dbyings su gnas// gdug can gzhag phyir 'brub khung ste// bsod phyir rtse mo lho ru bstan// gdug phyir dug gi chag chag
gdab// dug la ngar rnams bskyed pa dang// dur khrod gnas bya ro sol byug/ sku gsung thugs ldan bang rim gsum// g.yo bskul phyir na hUM phaT dgod// 'phra men bskul phyir rtsad thad dgod// dgug gzhug
phyir na tho lcags kyu// shin tu 'khrigs par dgod pa yin// byang chub sems las byung ba yin// lha tshogs mang po dgod par bya// de yis las rnams byed pa ste// mkhas pas brtags te las
kun la// sbyar ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// de la dgod pa lha yi gzugs// dri ma drug dang rdzas rnams la// so so'i dbye ba byas na ni// so so'i mtshan ma ming du bcas// gang yin las la sbyar ba'i

dus// dus la bab pa'i skabs nyid du// dbye dang rang bzhin gsal ba dang/ rang bzhin grub pa'i lha gnyis so// dbyings las spyan drangs mchod pa dbul// de la zhu ba yang dang yang// sems mi 'khrul ba bya
ba yin// mchod la sdud dang gshegs su gsol// lhan cig gzhal yas dam pa yi// gnas su bzhugs su gsol nas ni// bsgom pa'i las rnams nyan par bsam// bzhugs la thabs ni so sor te// mgo
ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// bstim dus gnas pa rgyan mdzes med// gan kyal dag tu gnas par bya// gnon dus mdzes pa'i gdug stangs te// gsod dus gong gi
gzhug thabs so// de nas skabs kyi ting 'dzin bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'od// thams cad las rnams bya ba'i phyir// logs pa hUM gsum gzhag pa yin// de las g.yos pa'i sems 'byung
phyir// zur du phaT gsum gzhag pa yin// bsnyen dus bdag nyid mdun du ste// bsgrub pa'i dus kyang de bzhin no// gsod pa'i dus du dkyil 'khor ldan// bdag las khro bo la sogs pa'i// bye brag thams
cad gsal bltas la// sku gsung thugs kyi khyad par de// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// 'phros pas sems can don byas nas// des bskul phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba bskul// rang rang gnas su thim par
brtag/ hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing/ gdug pa ma lus 'joms phyir 'jug/ de nyid dbang dang ldan par bsam// lag gi 'du byed byin brlabs pa// lag g.yas mthil du nyi dkyil bsam// kun bzang
'od bcas hUM las bskyed// g.yon dkyil ta las zla dkyil 'khor// kun tu bzang mo a las bskyed// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// byang chub sems kyi khyad par las// zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
rnams// thabs la shes rab yod pa dang// shes rab la yang thabs nyid de// de nyid rtags su bstan pa yin// de dkyil so so'i yig 'bru gsal// sgo lnga la skyes rim par brtag/ gung mo rnam par snang mdzad
de// mthe bong mi bskyod pa yi sku// mdzub mo rin chen 'byung ldan yin// srin lag don yod grub pa yin// mtheb chung snang ba mtha' yas yin// g.yon pa'i sor mo lnga la yang// de yis yum rnam rim pas
brtags// yab yum rjes su chags pa dang// thal mo mnyam por sbyar bar byas// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug dus// sor mo cung zad bsnol bar bya// rab tu bskyod pa'i dus su ni// sor
mo rgyab tu bsnol te bsdam// de rjes yab yum byang sems kyis// 'phros te phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba bskul// drag po'i gnas skabs 'di nyid du// 'di la byin brlabs mdzad 'tshal nas// sku gsung thugs dang

ldan par mdzod// de skad brjod la phur pa brlab// lag pa'i rting ba rab phye ste// sku gsung thugs kyi 'bras bu yang// bcug la dril bar bya ba yin// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba grangs med kyi// yab yum sras dang
bcas pa rnams// zhe sdang rjes su dran pa'i sku// grangs med 'od dang bcas pas bstim// de nas yig 'bru grangs med pas// thugs kha'i yi ge gsal 'bar ba'i// byang chub sems 'od bdag bstim
pas// sku la 'od zer bsam mi khyab// de yi dbang las byung ba yin// bdag las 'od 'phros de bzhin te// de dus sor mo rgyab tu bsnol// gung mo gnyis po rab bsgrengs pas// de yi bar du phur pa

gzhug/ sku yi sku bskul sku byin brlob// shin tu brjod pa'i rang bzhin te// sku yi gnas su gsal ba'o// de rjes bdag 'od 'phros bskul nas// de nas sor mo pad 'dra bya// kha phye ba yi tshul du bya// lag rting
bar du phur ba gzung// gsung gis gsung ni gnas nas bskul// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i thugs kha nas// grangs med hUM gis bstim byas nas// gsod pa'i gdangs sgra drag po yis// stobs dang ldan par de
gyur nas// gsung gi gnas na de gnas pa'o// de nas thugs kha'i 'od phyung bas// thugs kyi rdo rje'i gnas su thim// dus der phur bu mthe bong bar// thugs kyi thugs nyid bskul gyur par// phyogs
bcu thugs kha'i 'od las ni// so so'i rang rtags mi 'dra ba// 'di nyid gnas su thim pa bya// zhe sdang ldan pa'i sems su gyur// bcom ldan phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba yis// tshogs rnams ma lus lung yang
stan// gsal 'phro hUM gi tshogs las bskyed// sku gcig ngang la dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs// dbu las rgya mdud rang bzhin thabs yin te// dbus su rgya mdud gnas pa shes rab bo// thabs dang shes

rab gnyis las yongs rdzogs pa// logs las rang bzhin khro bo chen po brgyad brgyad byung ba rang bzhin khro mo brgyad// chu srin kha nas rtse mo bton pa ni// sgo ma'i tshogs nyid las rnams byed pa ste// thugs

mchog dbyings las sprul pa byung ba'o// rtse mo zur gsum rang bzhin byung ba ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin yin phyir ro// steng 'og gnyis su gnas pa yab yum gnyis// steng 'og khro bo'i rang bzhin
no// khong stong byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin yin// de 'dra'i khro rgyal 'dus pa'i sras mchog ni// ma g.yos chos kyi dbyings las bzhengs pa'i sku// sku gsung thugs ldan drag po mi bzad

pa// gdug can log par lta ba'i sems can rnams// thugs rje'i khyad par dbyings su sgrol zhing sdud// zhi bas bsgral ba'i skabs dang mi ldan kyang// drag pos bsgral ba'i 'phrin las khyed kyis mdzod// de

ltar lung bstan gnang ba thob// phur pa rang rnamasabaskyed pa'i phyir// lce po gnag po'i dud pa bdug/ khros pa'i rgyal por bskul pa'i phyir// nyungs nag byin brlobs khro chung gis// phur pa la bstim byin

brlabs bskyed// gdug pa'i las dang ldan pa'i phyir// ra khyi khrag dang dug dang sbyar// rtse mo dbal la bdug par bya// de ni drag po'i las la shis// chos nyid dag pa'i phur pa la// tsan dan dkar pos gzhi
blangs la// a ka ru dang du ru kas// dza ti phal la sogs pas// de la bdug par bya ba yin/ ma chags pad+ma'i phur pa la// rang byung me tog dmar po yis// gzhi byas a shog la sogs pas// de la byug par

bya ba yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de la// gur gum bzang pos gzhi byas la// dri zhim spos kyi rnam pa yin// de la byug par bya ba yin// hUM/ bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yin// 'od zer 'di 'phro klong

dkyil na// khro bo khro mo rnams bzhugs pa// sku ni cir yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs// hUM/ dbu skra kham nag ral pa can// gyen du 'khyil bas 'khyil bas srid rtser 'bar// mi mnyam khro gnyer sdang mig ni// log

par lta ba 'dul ba'i spyan// hUM/ mche ba zangs yag gtsigs pa ni// skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshul// sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs las// phyag cha sna tshogs cir yang ston// hUM/ thugs rje'i byin brlabs sprin
ltar gtibs// byams pa'i 'od zer glog bzhin 'gyu// rngam pa'i sgra skad 'brug ltar sgrogs// sprul pa'i thog thog char ltar 'bebs// hUM// bdag la byin gyis brlab mdzad cing// thugs rje chen po'i byin
brlabs kyis// bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// grub par khyed kyis brlob tu gsol// hUM/ sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// klan ka chen po bdud la sko// kyal ka chen po bgegs la mdzad// yal gam

can la dngos grub gsol// hUM/ srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam nyid ngang gi khrol phyag 'tshal lo// khros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje 'du 'phro'i tshogs la phyag
'tshal bstodad// hUM/ zlum zhing 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan dbyings nas sras mchog shar// sku yi byin brlabs gsal bar shar// thugs kyi byin brlabs dkar la dag// gsung byin ye shes
sgra dang bcas// rtag par sems can don mdzad pas// rgyan rnams gsal ba'i dbyings su 'khyil// 'od zer dkar bas don mdzad pa// dag pa'i gnas su sgrol mdzad nas// gsung gi nyon
mongs 'joms pa'i sku// dbu skra ral pa lcang lor bcas// zhi ba'i don rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ gsang ba'i dbyings las thams cad shar// thabs las yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku// 'khyil ba'i 'od zer
ser po ste// ye nas rgyas pa'i sku mchog gsal// hUM/ gsang ba'i gsung ni sgra skad sgrogs// thams cad g.yo med yongs su rgyas// gnas sam chos dbyings rgyas par mdzod// bsam pa thams cad yongs rgyas
mdzod// hUM// bskal ba'i me ri'i klong dkyil nas// dmar po gcer bu ral pa can// thod pa rlon pa sbrul gyis brgyan// gdung ba'i sems nyid ldan par mdzod// hUM/ dur khrod 'bar ba'i rgyan mnga'
zhing// gsang ba'i gnas su thams cad sdud// rgyal po'i bu mo rang dbang med// 'gro dbang sdud la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM/ sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can la// ji ltar
'dul ba'i dbang mdzad nas// sku yi khyad par cir yang ston// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang gi las// des dbang 'dul ba'i sems can la// don bstan nas ni yang dag gsung// thabs mchog thugs kyis mdzad
du gsol// dgon pa'i gnas su bder gnas la// mtho bzhi phyi ru btsugs byas pa// de la skur bskyed dbang yang bskur// 'thun pa'i 'bras chan gtor ma sbyin// las rnams thams cad bsgo bar bya// drag
po'i las 'di ma grub bar// khyed kyis phyi mtshams bsrung du gsol// mthun pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la// zhal bzhes bzhin du 'phrin las mdzod// phur pa bcu rnams gsog byas la// tshon skud sna lngas

bcing bar bya// rang gi cod pan re re gdags// ma mos las mkhan bstan bya'i phyir// ban d+ha khrag dang bcas pa bsog/ tsha ba khong nas bskyed pa'i phyir// gdug pa'i dug sna gsog par bya// gang la sbyor
ba'i rdzas rnams kun// thams cad ma lus gsog par bya// de nas stong pa chen por bsgom// de las g.yos pa'i sems dang bcas// 'bras bu sku yi las rnams byed// sa bon las ni thams cad
bskyed// gcog zungs gces pa dbus su ste// rtsibs bcu steng du khro bcu 'bar// zungs dang bcas pa de mthong nas// yab yum rjes su chags pa yi// byang chub sems dbang dkar dmar las// khra thabs
yab yum tshul 'dzin pa// dkyil 'khor khyams la gnas par bya// sgo la ral can gdug byed dam// bzhin rnams gsal bar dgod par bya// dbang bskur phyir ni gsol ba gdab// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang
bskur bas// lus rdzogs 'od dang ldan par bya// dkyil 'khor gnas nas drangs la mchod// so so'i gnas su bzhugs su gsol// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas dbul// dgyes btar las

gang yin pa tsam// khri'am stong ngam brgya rtsa brgyad// bsnyen pa nyi khri chig stong bya// de ltar grangs rnams tshang ba dang// las dang sgrub pa sbyar bar bya// ting 'dzin 'od 'phros byin brlabs bskyed// sku 'phros
dgug dang gsang las sbyar// sku gsung thugs las byung ba'o// dam tshig sems ngag grub pa yi// lte bar bsam bya snying po bzlas// bdag nyid khros pa'i rang bzhin pas// sku las 'od zer 'bar ba
'khrug/ 'byung dang 'phro 'dus gtams pa'o// ces kyang de la bskyod pa med// sku yi dbang rdzogs thams cad 'dul// gsung gi dbang rdzogs bka' la nyan// thugs kyi dbang rdzogs gnyis med dang// lha
srin sde dpung bcas pa yis// thams cad bdag la gdung bar byed// chos kyi dbyings las snying po phyung// rigs las sku yi snying po nyid// gdug pa'i lus rnams 'joms par byed// gsung gi snying po dbang
phyug rnams// bka' nyan dbang du sdud par byed// 'od zer 'bar bas klu rnams 'dar// thugs kyi snying po rdo rje yis// gdug pa ma lus 'joms par mdzad// dgug dang dbang byed stobs dang ldan// grangs
tshang nyams dang ldan gyur nas// phur pa gdab pa'i las kyang bya// ral gri gdab cing brdung ba'o// gtad dang mnan pa'i las bya yin// maN+Dal 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// gtso bo'i mdun du bum pa

bzhag/ dkar la mdzes par bya ba yin/ kha rgyan byang chub shing gis bya// mgul chings steg med kha tshar can// nang du snying po ldan byas la// logs la ra ro'i mtshan ma dgod// a karu la sogs pa yi// spos
mchog rnams kyis bum pa gang// gzungs thag thugs rje'i rang bzhin te// thabs dang shes rab lag gis zung// khri'am stong ngam 'bum dag tu// sngags kyis btab ste glud bgru bya// gu gu la lus la

btags bzlas bya// gso ba'i las chen gang zhig byed pa na// dang po las la sbyor dus su// khyi'am phag dang re'u 'am// dre'u'i thod pa rab blangs la// gang yin gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// thod pa'i nang du
bcug nas su// grangs mang bzlas la dgug pa bya// de bstim rtags pa'i sa ru mnan// dang po dngos gzhi nyid la bya ba yi// spos kyi dud pas shi kha bdug/ mtshal gyi dud pas nya la bdug/ de gnyis dus su
gu gul nag pos bdug/ de las byung ba'i las can de// yang dag khrus byas gong bzhin bdug/ des ni don rnams rab grub par// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// brdung ba'i las chen byed pa na// las
la sbyar ba'i dus su ni// shin tu khros pa'i tshad dang ni// ske rtse ske 'bras rnams sngags la// glang ru g.yas par de blugs la// gzhan ma phur ba'i skye ru gdags// mtho yi dkyil du bzhag
pa'am// yang na sa yi gting du sba// phur pa dbang bskur byin brlobs la// phyogs dang mtshams su gdab par bya// de ni bgegs kyi tshogs kun gyis// gdug pa'i sbyor ba 'chad par 'gyur// lus ngag
stongs shing 'phel med de// tshangs pa'i gnas ni ma gtogs pa// nad dag gdon gyi lam bkag la// dkyil 'khor dbus su bum pa bzhag/ rdzas dang ldan par byas nas ni// snying po bye ba sa yar
bzlas// dus drug las bkru bdug pa bya// brdung ba'i 'khor lo mdo bzhir gdags// dus drug mchod pa rgyun mi bcad// de yis mnan pa yang dang yang// byas na 'bras dang bcas par 'gyur// lhog pa
'bras kyis zin pa dang// sbrul gdug phol gyis zin pa dang// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa rdzogs byas la/ khrod dang bcas pa khar bcug ste// rdo rje hUM gi 'od zer gyis// rab tu bsregs bsam gdab par bya// de
yis nad dbang gang gang gis// dbang las yongs su thar par byed// dza gad gdon gyis dbang byas la// pad+ma mdzes pa'i nang du ni// so la stag nyungs kar bsregs pa ste// khro bo gdug par rab bskyed
la// 'dzab grangs mang du bton la blugs// grangs mang thim nas de blugs bya// gdon gyis de la tshugs mi 'gyur// gang zhig gdon gyis zin pa yi// smyo zhing 'bog par byed pa la// ting 'dzin dbang yang
nod par bya// mtshon cha'i char pas gdon de bskrad// mtshan ldan mi mo gzhon pa la// byin ldan rabs chad rkang phur de// 'dzab bya dbang bskur byin brlabs nas// gang yin gzugs byas rab bkug
la// thabs kyis gzungs la shes rab mas// de la gdab par bya ba yin// de byas gnyis med byang chub sems/ lus byug rgya yis rab btab la// ba spu bu ga'i nang nas ni// gdug pa'i sku yis gang bar
bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su bcug la bzhag/ smyo 'bog nad las thar par 'gyur// phyugs la gdon gyis dbang byas nas// zho skam khrag tu 'ong ba la// ri'u lcags pa'am mthar nu ram// bse shing zho can gang
dang gang// de la gdon gyi gzugs byas la// dgug cing bstim pa gang dang gang// byas pa nyams su byung ba na// drag tu sngags bzlas thub par nges// des ni gdon bsgral las kyang grub// bdag la gnod
pa'i las ngan de// nges bar rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir// mon dang rabs chad thod pa la// bzlas pa khri phrag byas nas ni// dmigs pa'i ming rus der bcug la// gdug pa'i gnas su mnan pa'am// yang na
rus rtsal khog bcug ste// rgya mtsho'i gting du mnan pa bya// de yis las rnams thams cad 'grub// ting 'dzin mchog dang ldan pa'i mis// gang dmigs lus la nges sbyar na// de yis mi bde'i
las kun 'byung// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/ bskrad pa'i las la the tshom med// gsal ba'i ting 'dzin med pa yis// las rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur la// yun du bsgrubs kyang rtags mi 'byung// de

bas ting 'dzin nan tan bskyed// sngags rnams grangs la ma nges kyis/ zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po rdo rje gsang ba gter zhes bya ba'i mdo las// sras kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste
brgyad pa'o//// de nas las kyi rgyal po yis// bcom ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po la// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod mnyes mdzad// zhal du bltas te 'di skad gsol// kye kye bcom ldan thabs mnga'
bdag/ thabs mang mnga' bas sems can don// thogs med brgya la spyod par mdzad// gdug pa'i sems can bsgral 'tshal na// dkyil 'khor byin brlabs gsungs lags te// phur pa'i rgyu 'di ci la

bgyi// ring thung tshad 'di ji ltar lags// de la yon tan ci dang ldan// de med skyon ni ji ltar 'byung// rgyu rnams med par mi 'tshal lam// zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po yis// karma he
ru ka'i tshig gsan nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// gdug pa bsgral ba sems can don// 'di ltar byed la legs so legs// phur pa'i rgyu rnams ngas bshad kyis// rtse gcig sems kyis gus par
nyon// dug shing gdug pas bsad las 'grub// de yis rang bskyed shing mchog rnams phur pa'i rgyu ru rung par bshad// gdug pa sbrul ni gnas pa yi// shing mchog tsher ma med mod kyang// de yis bya bar
gsungs pa yin// seng ldeng smug nag gdug pa'i shing// drag po'i phur pa'i rgyu ru gsungs// stag dang don gyi gnas dag na// dag dang skyes pa'i tsher ma can// drag po phur pa'i rgyu yang yin// gnam

lcags thog gi lcags dang ni// gri dang mde'u rtags phyin pa// dgra lta ral gri mdung dag dang// khro chung sgo gzer la sogs pa// rtags phyin sra ba'i lcags rnams la// gsod pa las mkhan phur pa bya// de
dag thams cad gang dang gang// steng du sor gcig rgya mdud bya// gzhal yas nam mkha'i rang bzhin yin// rked par sor gcig rgya mdud bya// skyed shing gnas pa'i rang bzhin no// bar du rin chen zur
bskyed de// rin chen las grub rtsig pa'o// rtse mo zur gsum 'joms pa yis// phyag rgya gsal bas thams cad kyi// khro rgyal tshogs bcas bzhugs pa yi// thabs dang shes rab mthu las byung// drag po'i las
la sbyor ba yin// de yi rkyen gyis gsungs pa yin// zhi ba'i phur ba'i rgyu bstan pa// dkar la 'jam pa'i rang bzhin can// dgon pa'i gnas nas skyes pa'i shing// dkar la 'jam pa gang dang

gang// zhi ba'i phur ba'i rgyu 'di yin// byang chub shing bu dam pa ste// zhi ba'i phur pa bya bar shis// tsan dan dkar po'i shing bu ni// mchog tu zhi ba'i las la'o// 'o ma can ni gang yod pa// mngar dang bcas

pa'i shing mchog rnams// dngul lam dkar po'i rgyu rnams ni// zhi ba'i phur pa'i rgyu yin te// mgo bo rgyam dud gong ma bzhin// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// byang chub sems kyi krus bya'i phyir// rtse mo
zlum por byung ba yin// rgyas pa'i phur pa'i rgyu bstan pa// rgyal po'u gnas na skyes pa'i shing// ser po'i mdog bcas gang dang gang// rgyas pa'i phur pa'i rgyu ru gsungs// skyer ba gdug ste kha dog
dbang// rgyas pa'i phur pa yin par bshad// gser shing rgyas pa'i phur pa yin// de la sogs pa phur pa'i shing// gang dag kha dog ldan pa rnams// rgyas pa'i las la shis pa yin// gser ram ser po'i rang

bzhin la// rgyas pa'i phur pa bya ba yin// mgo bo'i rgya mdud rked rgya mdud// drag po'i skabs las shes par bya// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// thams cad byang chub sems kyis rgyas// de dbang rtse

mo zur bzhir byung// rgyas pa'i dbang gis yang dag bshad// dbang gi phur pa'i rgyu bstan pa// chos mkhan gdug pa'i gnas dag gam// gang dag skyes pa'i shing rnams la// dbang gi kha dog mi ldan yang// ji

ltar skyes pa thams cad kun// dbang gi phur pa'i rgyu yin no// mtshan pa kha dog ldan pa'i shing// tsan dan dmar po'i dri dang ldan// to mo'i rang bzhin kha dog bcas// seng shing mdzes pas dbang dang ldan// de
la sogs pa dmar po'i shing// zangs sam dmar po'i rdzas rnams la// dbag gi phur pa bya bar gsungs// mgo bo rgya bdud de bzhin te// chos dbyings ngang la thams cad dbang// des na rtse mo zla gam

mo// de dag thams cad rang bzhin ni// chos kyi dbyings las byung bas na// rtsa ba'i logs su rgya mdud bya// thams cad las gang grub pa'i phyir// rtse mo'i phyogs su dpal yang bya// de dag ting 'thung tshad

rnams ni// sor bzhi 'byung ba bzhi yi tshad// sor brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi tshad// bcu gnyis pa yi rang bzhin ni// skye mched bcu gnyis tshad du bstan// bco brgyad tshad du bstan pa ni// khams ni bco brgyad
'joms pa'i rtags// tshon gang tshad du bstan pa ni// byang chub sems mchog tshad du bstan// phyi yi rtags dang nang gi rtags// gsang ba'i rtags dang bcas par bstan// gdug pa'i shing mchog tsharata ma
can// de yi yon tan bstan pa ni// dug gis bsod ba'i las byed de// gdug pas mi 'chor las grub pa'o// de yi rang bskyed 'dra ba yi// yon tan rnams ni 'byung ba yin// gdug pa gnas
pa'i skye ba'i shing// las la phan 'dogs yod pas na// de ni drag pa'o yon tan 'byung// seng ldeng byas pa'i yon tan ni// dbang drag gnyis la shis pa yin// gdug pa'i shing ni gcan gzan gnas// de
na skyes pa'i yon tan ni// gdug pa'i las dang don mthun te// de yis gsod la lhag par myur// lcags la sogs pa'i phur pa yi// de yi phan yon bstan pa ni// dper na sta re ngar ldan gyis// nags tshal

chen po'i shing rnams la// skyes bu rtsal dang ldan pa'i mis// rtsol ba dra pos rab bcad na// chod mi chod kyi the tshom med// ngar dang mi ldan sta re yis// bcas kyang chod par mi 'gyur te// des na the tshom skye ba'i

rgyu// de dang rtags phyir lcags 'dra ste/ bsad dpas gsod pa'i las kyang 'grub// gzhan gyis mi phyin sgo gzer yin// ngar dang ldan pa khro chu ste// drag po'i las gang gnan lcags so// dkar la byang chub
sems zhi ba// 'jams pas gnod pa'i sems mi 'byung// dgon gnas skyes pa'i shing rnams kyis// gdon rnams rnam par zhi bar byed// byang chub shing las byas pa yis// ngag rtsub thams cad zhi bar
byed// tsan dan dkar po'i phur pa yis// nad rnams ma lus zhi bar byed// 'o ma dkar dang bcas pa rnams// thams cad zhi ba'i las la shis// dngul la sogs pa'i phur pa yis// mchog tu zhi ba'i las

grub po// rgyal po'i gnas skyes shing bu ni// thams cad rgyas par 'grub pa yin// skyer ba'i yon tan bstan pa ni// tshe dang longs spyod rgyas par byed// bse shing phur pa rigs rgyas byed// gser gyis byang chub
shing rgyas byed// chos mkhan gnas nas skyes pa yi// de yi phan yon bstan pa ni// thams cad dbang du 'du ba'o// tsan dan dmar po'i phur pa yis/ bu mo dbang du bya ba 'grub// mdzo mos blon po dbang du
'grub// seng shing dmangs rigs dbang du'o// zangs la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams kyis// rgyal po dbang du gyur pa yin// kha dog mdzes pa'i shing rnams kyis// gdon rnams dbang du 'du ba'o// mdor na rnam
'byor dam pa yis// ting 'dzin ma nor drod ldan zhing// byin brlabs dbang bskur ma nor te// dam tshig ma nyams thub gyur na// rgyu ni gang dang gang yin yang// bde gshegs sa bon bskyed pa 'dra// thams
cad las 'di bya bar gsungs// re zhig 'di lo gnas pa ni// mtshan ma can las gsungs pa ste// yon tan ldan par yis bshad// rnal 'byor dam pa de rnams la// dang po gzhung las 'byung bzhin bya// rdzas
rnams tshogs na the tshom med// bsham pa legs na chud mi za// legs shing dod nas dang ba skye// ma dod rtags can sems mi bde// rgyu med byas na bka' las 'gal// rnyed btsan byas na byin
brlabs med// yod btsan dod bsgom mi bde// ngan bas rtogs pa bcas gyur na// bya ba'i las rnams 'grub mi 'gyur// mdor na gzhung dang mthun par bya// phur pa'i rgyu ni byang chub sems// thabs dang
shes rab ngang nyid las// gsang ba'i gnas su rab gsal ba// rgyu yi sku ni rang bzhin bskyed// mtshan ma byang chub sems rtogs nas// mtshan mar bcas pa'i las mi dgos// mtshan ma 'joms pa zhi ba
bzang// log lta 'joms la khro dul lhag/ nyon mongs lnga 'dul yang dag bzang// mtshan ma rtogs med bsham pa gces// rtags phyin 'dod na yun rings zlos// gdong tshugs 'dod nas thud la

sbyor// rings par 'dod na rdzas la sbyor// myur 'dod ma yengs brtson 'grus bskyed// 'di ltar don la ma yengs par// rgyun du gnas par bya ba yin// yun ni lo zla tsam du bsring// grangs ni mtshan ma byung

ba'am// yang na bye ba sa yar bzlas// de yis las rnams grub par ni// rgyud 'di las ni nga yis bshad// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po rdo rje gsang ba gter zhes bya ba'i mdo las/ phur
pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang las kyi rgyal po yis// bcom ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po la// yang dag don gyis gsol ba btab// kye kye ston pa snying rje'i bdag/ las kyi dbang
nyid thams cad 'dul// dbang po sangs rgyas kun gyi yab// bde chen sprul pa 'byung gnas gsal// gdug pa bsgral ba'i las thabs la// phur pa'i rgyu rnams gsungs lags na// 'di la las mkhan mi
'tshal lam// bskul ba'i thabs ni ji ltar bgyid// 'di la gtor ma mi 'tshal lam// gtor ma'i rgyu ni gang lags na// bsngo ba'i thabs ni ji ltar bsngo// kI la ya yis bka' stsol cig/ de skad ces nigasol

ba dang// bcom ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po yis// karma he ru ka'i tshig gsan nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// ma molas mkhas ci bgyi'i tshogs// nga yi bstan pa 'di bsrungs te// legs par bshad pa
ngas bya yis// nyon cig kar ma he ru ka/ dang po byang chub sems las 'grub// gzhal yas dam pa'i gru nang du// so so'i sku ni gsal bar bskyed// rdo rje'i spyugs pas rab blangs la// rdo rje'i g.yab mos

g.yab par bya// sngon gyi dam chos rjes dran nas// rang dbang med par 'ong bar 'gyur// phyag rgya bzhi yi las bya zhing// de la mchod pa yid kyis btab// bdud rtsi zas la longs spyod pa// de las bskul bar

bya ba yin// de la gtor ma bya ba ni// bdud rtsi lnga la gzhi blangs la// sha sna lnga yang bsag par bya// rgun 'brum ma tshang sha phyes gdab// gla ba shing kun g.yo ba yi// chu yis rgyas par rab sbyar
te/ gtor ma byin la las la btang// sngon gyi zhal bzhes ji lta bar// dam bcas bzhin du lus rnams sgrubs// las dbang bskul ba'i mnga' bdag mo// sprul pa dang bcas las gyis shig/ bdag nyid chen
mo'i dus la bab// g.yog dag bcas pa'i sems dpa' yis// de 'dra'i sems kyi rab bskul te// shes pa gnas su de drongs la// dbang byed las la sbyor bar gyis// sems can thams cad gnas nas

byung// de de'i bye brag gsal byas la// tsan dan dmar po'i chu dag la// nyi ma rab tu blugs bya ste// gdong drug zhang popa khrag blugs la// de la'ang g.yo ba'i rdzas kyis spras// byin la las la gtang bar
bya// sho na mu ka'i dus la bab// pad+ma'i rigs las sprul pa'i lha/ sngon chad khas blangs dam bcas pa// dam tshig gnyan las ma 'da' bar// mthun pa'i gtor ma 'di long la// sprul pas 'khor ba'i gnas
bsgral phyir// nga yis khyed la rab bskul bas// drag po las khug dus la bab// khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams// 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gzhi gnas sa// de la dbang ba'i mnga' bdag mo// de

dbang gtor ma bya ba ni// snod kyi shal gzhi blangs la// sha sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bya// snod kyi khrag la gzhi blangs la// khrag sna tshogs pa'i rak+ta sbyar// sa bdag chen po'i dus la bab// mtsho bzhi'i gnas
nas bzhengs su gsol// 'thun pa'i gtor ma 'di 'bul gyis// khrag nad blang thabs btang ba dang// bal nad rgyu gzer dbab pa'i phyir// dam bcas bzhin du bdag bskul gyis// khas blangs bzhin du

dam la 'du// gnag pa'i las rnams mdzad du gsol// stag gi snying dang seng ge'i snying// wa yi snying dang sbyang mo'i snying// bya rgod snying dang khra yi snying// chu bya'i snying dang 'ug pa'i snying// de rnams gtor ma'i

gzhi blangs la// mchog phran snying dang nang grol dang// thod khrag klad par bcas pa dang// lhu gdum snying dang khrag tu bcas// snying dang snying rtsar bcas pas mnan// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// dur khrod
gnas su rgyug len ma// dur khrod brgyad la gnas bcas nas// stir za zhing las la sbyor// bka' gsang sprul pa'i pho nya mo// dam la sdud cing las la 'gyed// dam tshig gnyan po bdag bskul gyis// gtor

ma long las 'phrin las mdzod// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// thams cad bskul zhing las la sbyor// dur khrod rdzas la lta zhing 'gying// zhing chung bsnol zas khong snying 'byin// khrag ral khrag 'thung
dbang mo che// snying zhags lta zhing rdzas la rol// don snying 'byin zhing rgyu zhags 'dren// mgo lus gtum zhing las la sbyor// dur khrod khrag la rol cing za// zangs gris gcod cing mdangs kyang

'phrog/ mthun pa'i gtor ma 'di 'bul gyis// bsod pa'i las la myur bar ni// gdug pa bsgral ba'i las byung tshe// dam las ma 'da' 'phrin las mdzod// sems can kun gyi snying khrag dang// snying gi rtsa ba
ma nyams dang// sgal tshigs la sogs gtor ma rnams// srin mo tshogs kyi dus la bab// nga yi spyan sngar khas blangs pa// srin 'du ri la gnas bcas te// khyod kyis las rnams bya bar ni// dam tshig phob
nas dbang yang bskur// so so'i dbang rtags legs byin te// ji ltar las gnyer btang ba yi// las rnas ma lus khyed kyis sgrubs// thams cad gcig tu bya ba ni// rdzas rnams thams cad rab gtams

la// g.yo ba'i rdzas kyis kun la bkra// de nas pad+ma'i snod bkang la// nam phyed gcer bur byung nas ni// skra yang spyi bor rab bcings la// gdong la thal bas rab byugs la// rak+ta'i thig le gsum yang

bya// de nas gtor ma rab bsngos la// nga ro phyung ste las rnams bcol// drag po'i las dang zhi ba'i las// dbang dang rgyas pa'i las rnams kun// rang rang so sor sbyar bar bya// drag po'i dus su bskul bar
bya// dmigs par bya ba'i yul de ni// nyid dang sprul pas yangs par// thang cig yud la khrid la shog/ de tshe gdug pa'i gtor ma btab// gdug pa'i phur bas gdab par bya// bsdigs pa'i las rnams yang
dang yang// las gnyis sngon du 'gro ba yin// 'gro ba lha yi bye brag rnams// shes par byas la dpral ba yin// zil gnon cen po'i phyag rgya yis// mnan pas mthu med rdzu 'phrul med// lce dpog nag po'i
dud pas bdug/ zhags pas yan lag thams cad bcing// khro rgyal gnas pa'i gzhal yas brtag/ ma mo tshogs kyi rol pa yis// zhing rnams bsgrubs la gzhag pa yin// btab pa'i gnas sa gang yin
de// brtags la gsal bar shes par bya// brdungs nas 'di nyid dbus su ni// mi g.yo brtan par bzhugs su gsol// de tshe sdu bsngal nyams su myong// gnod zhing mthol ba'i las mi byed// de yis byang
sems bskyed pa yin// de la brtag pa byar mi rung// dam tshig nyams pas 'jigs pas so// ma rig las rnams byas pa yin// nga yis de 'dra'i sdug bsngal myong// rang dbang med par byung ba yin// de ltar

nyams su myong bar bya// bstan pa'i lha tshogs thams cad kun// zhal gdangs byon nas bred cing brgyal// yang dang yang du byas pa yin// de ltar byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'jigs byed
na// khams gsum gnas pa'i gdug tshogs rnams// 'jigs par the tshom med// smos kyang ci dgos de nyid do// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po yang rgyal po rdo rje gsang ba gter zhes bya
ba'i mdo las/ mkha 'a 'gro las la btang ba'i le'u stebacu pa'o//// de nas las kyi rgyal po yis// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ gsang ba'i mchod phul gsol ba btab pa/ kye kye
gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// ma bcos gdod nas lhan ne'o// sems can don yod rgyal po khyod// dpa' bo'i las tshogs gsung lags na// sngon yang dregs pa bsgral ba yi// dus chod rnams ni ji ltar
lags// de skad ces ni gsol ba dang// bcom ldan badzra kI la yas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sems can gdug pa smos ci dgos// log lta mnar med lhung ba rnams// thugs rje chen pos bzung
ba'i phyir// dri bar byed pa legs so legs// de yis dmigs rnams ngas bshad kyis// karma he ru yid kyis nyon// lta ba log pa bdun yod de// srog las nyams las nyams// don las nyams dang spyod las
nyams// mnyam las nyams dang 'dod pas nyams// log pas nyams pa bdun po la// 'di la nyams pa zhes bya ste// de bsgral na ni bde ba che// so so'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// srog las nyams pa'i mtshan
nyid ni// chos kyi mtshan nyid khog 'chang la// sems la g.yo dang bcas pa yis// pha ma drin can kyin par gsod// yon gyi phul du mkhan po gsod// chos 'chad las su slob ma gsod// 'di ni pham pa chen po
ste// mnar med dmyal ba chen por ltung// de bas bsgral ba'i dmigs cig yin// sems la chos nyid ma zhen cing// chos la yid gnyis zab yis// las ni de dang de byas kyang// nyes byas yin te dmyal

bar 'gro/ de yang thugs rjes rab gzung la// bsgral bar bya ba'i dmigs cig yin// bsam pa gting nas ma skyed pa// rang bzhin rkyen gyisadabang med de// las rnams de dang de byas kyang// nyes byas phra mo
zhes bya ste// sdig pa phra mo 'byung ba las// nyes pa chen pos mi gos so// bka' las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sems la 'dod pa'i g.yo bcas nas// rdo rje slob dpon rnam gsum po// thabs kyid 'drid

cing slu bar byed// rdo rje spun la khros gyur nas// ngan pa'i sems ni khong du bcangs// ras med spyas rnams 'dogs par byed// dang por khas blangs dam bcas shing// le lo'i dbang du btang nas ni// phyag
rgya mi bsgom sngags mi bzlos// snod kyi rim pa ma btags par// gsang ba'i rim pa thon du khyer// sbas pa'i man ngag thams cad ston// bka' las nyams pa chen po yin// pham pa chen pos mnar med
pa'i// gnas su nges par 'tshed par 'gyur// de nas thugs rjes gzung bar bya// 'di yang bsgral ba'i dmigs cig yin// dam tshig rtsa ba yan lag rnams// nyes dmigs brdzun par btsigs

nas ni// drang ba'i don du gsungs pa las// don la gsung pa ci yang med// don la go ba yongs med par// bsrung bar bya ba tha snyad yin// de skad smra ba'i rnal 'byor des// gong ma'i las rnams byas gyur
kyang// nyes byas yin te dmyal bar 'gro/ de yang bsgral ba'i dmigs cig yin// don la nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gsang ba'i dang bskur byas nas ni// dam la btags pas gsang ba bsgrags// ma rungs
pa yi ma ka 'dogs// shes rab thabs ni dbang bskur na// gzhan po yul nas bsku ba yi// 'chang ba ngan pa yin zhes gzhan du smra// gnyis med byang chub sems chen po// man ngag ma nor bar bstan
na// log pa'i don du bzung nas ni// gzhan la 'di skad zer zhes smra// yang dag don chen zab mo 'di// ma log bstan pa de shes kyang// don la go med log par khrid// skye med don la bsgrub pa la// gnyis
med byang chub sems 'di ni// rang bzhin gnas pa 'di mthong zhes// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i don bstan na// gnyis 'dzin shes rab log par 'dzin// 'di la thugs rjes ma bzhin bskyed// pham pa chen po zhes bya
ste// don las nyams pa chen po yin// de dbang mnar med chen por skye// 'di yang bsgral ba'i dmigs cig yin// spyod pa'i nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gsang ba'i don rnams gzhan la ston// ma mo mkha'
'gro bsten pa yi// rdzas rnams mngon du phyung byas nas// bdag gi dpa' mtshan des byed dang// gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par// rang bzhin mtshan ma de bzung nas// sbyor ba mngon sum rang gar

byed// gnyis med ngang bsgral rtags med par// srin po'i sbyor ba rab bzung nas// pha rol srog gcod sgrol zhes zer// gnyis med byang sems gnas kyang spangs// spyod pa the co dang du len// khros pa'i tshig
gis mthu yang smra// shes med nga mkhas nga rgyal gtong// thabs mchog gsang chen ma shes par// sems can don la log chos smras// ye nas sangs rgyas ye sangs rgyas// bsad dang bkum la sogs pas

kyang// de la gsad pa ci yod smra// log pa'i shes pas khrid byas nas// phyin ci log gi thabs la mkhas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dka' 'khor nas// phyin ci log la rtsol ba che// phyag cha sku yi rang bzhin

rnams// sngon med me long gzugs brnyan ltar// yang dag don du mi shes par// rtog pa dag la mngon par 'chel// las kyi phul du mtshan ma spyod// 'di ni ru dra dngos yin te// las kyis bsgral ba lhur yang
btsam// spyod pas nyams pa chen po ste// pham pas mnar med dmyal bar 'gro/ de yi dbang gis mngon sum par// bsgral bar byas kyang mi de la// bag chags ngan pas mi gos te// 'di yang
bsgral ba'i dmigs cig yin// mtshan ma nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa yi// rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa yin// chos kyi sgo mo bsam yas ni// nyon mongs sems can la

gnas pa// des kyang don du gsungs pa las// rgyu dang 'dra ba'i chos rnams kun// lta ba dman pa de yi dbang gis yid bsdams nas// 'bras bu'i chos lta ga la yod// de skad smra zhing phyogs char 'dzin// chos
nyid ma bcos ye gnas la// lta ba sgro skur bar bcad nas// rnal 'byor dam pa don gnas la// khyed kyis ming shes skur 'debs pa// rnal 'byor don ldan thugs dkrugs nas// des dbang nyid kyis dmyal

bar 'gro/ mtshan ma'i chos la gtsor gzung nas// 'jig rten lha 'dre thams cad rbod// 'jig rten khams 'di tham can// mthu 'gran byed pa su zhig yod// lha srin sde brgyad nga yi bran// dpang chen khrag 'thung
de nyid yin// nga ni khro bo'i rgyal po ste// khams gsum pa yi sems can kun// skad cig gis ni bsad pa yis// nga yi thogs pa med par 'ong// gzhan la 'tshe zhing khro bar byed// 'di ni mtshan mas nyams
zhes bya// rdo rje spun la 'gran yang tshol// pham pa chen pos dmyal bar 'gro/ de yang bsgral ba'i dmigs cig yin// 'dod pas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// chos la thos bsam yongs med par// tho cho'i las
rnams sna tshogs byed// nges pa'i man ngag gting med par// mthu dang rtsal drag 'dod pa'i mis// spyod pa spang blang dang du len// mtshan ma can gyi tshogs la dga'// pha rol bsdigs la g.yar gzhi
brdebs// ral pa gsigs shing mi mgo thogs// so gtsigs dmar dong sgol brdabs// sha tshil za zhing snod bkang nas// log pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa mchog/ spros dang
bcas pa'i rjes 'brangs nas// bya bar mi 'os pa yi las// sna tshogs tshang bar spyod pa des// gdong la khrag gis byugs nas ni// nga ro chen pos 'debs par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las
dgal// dam can rnams kyi tshul las 'gal// dam tshig rtsa ba yan lag bcas// don la mi srung ba 'debs srung// mtshan ma can gyi spyod pa yis// sangs rgyas bka' gzhung dam pa smad// rtag par lta ba'i
sems nyid kyis// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i zhabs 'dren bya// rnal 'byor yin par khas 'ches nas// dar 'ga' tsam yang gnas pa med// don mthong rnam 'byor rkang nas drangs// khrag gi gtor ma bshams
nas ni// khro rgyal 'khor tshogs las gyis shig/ de skad bskul na sna tshogs byed// khrag 'thung 'khor bcas thugs khral bskyed// mi sha blangs shing ma mo sbod// rnal 'byor dam can sme rtsog
byas// skye bo yongs kyis spyas btags shing// thams cad kun gyis smad pa'i sa// 'di ni 'dod pas nyams pa yin// pham pas dmyal ba chen por ltung// de bas thugs rjes gzung bar rigs// log pas

nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// chos la gnyis su bzung ba ste// sangs rgyas chos las logs nas ni// mu stegs can gyi sde la byed// sangs rgyas spyod pa bor na ni// mu stegs spyod pa sna tshogs byed// lta ba gnyis

med bor nas ni// rtag pa ther zug nyid du ni// lta zhing skyes bu zhes su smra// byang chub spyod pa bor nas ni// brtul zhugs can la rab tu dang// 'di ni log par nyams zhes bya// rab tu bsgrims te bsgral na
ni// mnar med rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro/ des na thugs rjes rab bsgral ba// 'di yang bsgral ba'i dmigs cig yin// rnal 'byor dam can gang dag gis// dge ba'i bar du gcod pa yi// dgra yi tshogs
bcas ma lus pa// nyams par gyur pa drug yod de// las kyi nyams dang mtshan mas nyams// dus kyi nyams dang 'dod pas nyams/ log pas nyams dang srog las nyams// 'di dag bsgral bar ma
byas na// rnal 'byor chos la spyad dbang med// sdig pa'i rnam smin mang po 'phel// de dag so so'i mtshan nyid ni// yang dag nyid du nga yis bshad// las kyis nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bka' la btags

pas yongs med par// dag gi sgrub sar 'ongs nas ni// ya ka che phra mang po 'dogs// sngon chad khon pa yod med par// bdag gi zas nor dbang bya'i phyir// ma nyes mi la klan ka tshol// nga yis mnyes drang
smras kyang// kha la bde shing gnad 'tshugs pa// kha drag rang tshod mi 'dzin par// bdag la dpung las klan ka tshol// bdag gis nyes pa ma byas par// thabs dang g.yo yis bdag la rgol// de bzhin bzlog
nas brlang du smra// 'di ni las kyis nyams pa yin// bdag gis bsgral bar ma dran yang// dam can yongs kyis thugs bkrug pa// rang bzhin bsgral na de dbang 'gyur// 'di yang bsgral ba'i dmigs cig
yin// mtshan mas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bdag dang 'brel ba yongs med par// bdag gi 'khor du gnas bcas nas// yun du sring ba'i thabs med par// mtshan ma ngan pas dbyen spyod de// skyon tshang

mang po 'bru byed pa// khyed la mthu dang rtsal yod dam// khyed kyis su la rtags cig phyung// shes pa'i rgyu ni ci zhig yod// gzhan gyis spya par gyur pa'i tshe// nga la 'di yi nyams yod kyis// 'di la ci yang med
zer ba// mtshan mas nyams pa zhes bya ste// 'di bsgral rnal 'byor nyams bder 'gyur// 'di yang bsgral ba'i dmigs cig yin// dus kyis nyams ba'i mtshan nyid ni// bdag dang kha phrad
yongs med par// drag po las la ba pa'i dus// de dus yongs nas ya ka gtong// 'di ni dus kyis nyams pa yin// bsgral ba'i blo nyid dus la bab// lag nas bzung la'ang mi btang bar// mngon sum spyod
pas ma bsgral bar// 'di yang bsgral ba'i dmigs cig yin// 'dod pas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// 'dod pa'i sems kyis dbyen spyos nas// shi bar shes kyang gzhan la 'phrog/ phung bar 'ong yang dkor
khang 'joms// srog la rang za sngags pa 'joms// dug tu snang yang dge 'dun dkor// bdag gi dbang du byed pa dang// thob tu 'dod nas gsang sngags dang/ mdo yed+harma la sogs pa// brkus nas gzhan

la 'tshong ba dang// spyod pa ngan pa dben spyos nas// bza' ru bsgrub pa'i yo byad rku// nor du 'dod na gang dang gang// rnal 'byor gzhung ldan 'joms shing sdud// 'di ni 'dod pas nyams pa ste// bsgral bas
rnam 'byor dam can btsun// log pas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// dang po chos kyi sgor zhugs nas// de nas gzhan pa'i tshul la zhugs// chos kyis nang byan byas nas ni// sangs rgyas kun la skur 'debs

shing// rnam 'byor kun la mi tshod che// spyod pa tho cho sna tshogs kyis// gzhan gyi sems 'gegs chos la sdang// thob tu 'dod na gsung rab rku// sngon rgyus byas nas gzhan la 'tshong// sems can kun la 'tshe
bar byed// 'di ni log pas nyams pa ste// 'di la thugs rjes ma bzung na// dmyal bsregs gnas su nges par ltung// de bas 'di la bsgral ba brtsam// srog las nyams pa'i mtshan nyi ni// tom tsho la byed
cing srog la dga'// ma dang pha dang gsod pa la// thogs pa med pa brdeg pa dang// gzhan yang gsod pa dge sdig med// srog chags kun la gtse byed cing// gal mi che la srog chags gsod// thabs kyis

sangs rgyas bstan pa smod// g.yo dang bcas pas sngags mkhan 'drid// zas su chos kyi zas la za// rku yang chos kyi zas la rku// srog gcod rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can thams cad breng brgya la nas/
mthong yang 'jigs su rung ba ste// srog las nyams ba zhes bya ste// gshags gtub gnas su nges par skye// de bas 'di la bsgral ba brtsam// de dag thams cad ma bsgral na// log pa'i spyod pa thams cad
'phel// rnal 'byor dam can sems khral che// de bas 'di bsgral rnal 'byor btsun// btul zhing tshar bcad byed cing brgyal// gsad bskrad smyos pa'i sems med byos// bstan pa gnyan la bar chad
nyung// dge ba 'phel bas sdig pa 'grib/ 'di dag ma bsgral skyon rnams ni// rnal 'byor dam can sgyid lug mang// gsang ba'i theg pa'i chos sgo 'gags// skye bo yongs kyis sbyas nas
kyang// chos la 'bras bu med ces zer// 'di 'dra'i nyes dang ya gar bcas// 'di dag bsgral ba'i yon tan ni// las rnams rdzogs pas gang dang gang// de de bsgral bar byas nas ni// dmyal ba'i gnas
su yong mi ltung// gal te ltung yang yun thung 'gyur// de nas bde ba can du 'gro/ rnal 'byor mngon par sangs rgyas 'gyur// dge ba can rnams pag yangs spyod// sems can thams cad sems bder
'gyur// de bas rnal 'byor rtsal ldan gyis// nyams su blangs te bsgral bar bya ba'o// ma bsgral rnal 'byor rang nyid nyams// dmyal bar 'tshed pa 'jigs pas bsgral// brdeg dang bsgrub dang zor

dang thun// de yi dus tshod bstan pa ni// dpyid zla gsum la brdeg pa ni// nyi shu gnyis dang bcu drug dang// bcu bzhi rnams la brdeg pa yin// shar dang de bzhin shar lho'o// dbyar zla gsum la brdeg pa

ni// brgyad dang bco lnga dus drug tu// nub byang byang shar la sogs par// kha bltas brdeg pas bya ba yin// ston zla gsum la brdeg pa ni// nyi shu bco brgyad nya gsum la// byang shar byang dang nub dag tu// kha

bltas brdeg par bya ba yin// dgun zla gsum la brdeg pa ni// bcu gsum bcu dang thams cad la// byang dang lho dang rang thad bltas// brdeg par bya ba'i las la sbyor// de yang nyi shu bdun nas mar// srog
sdud chen po las byed pas// nyi shu dgu'am gnam stong ngam// brdeg pa'i dus la bab pa yin// srog sdud rnams ni bshad par bya// lha srin sde brgyad thams cad dang// gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa

dang// gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang// lha chen rgyal po 'khor dang bcas// rgyu skar rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas// 'jig rten ma mo 'khor dang cas// phung byed gdug pa 'khor dang bcas// klu chen brgyad
po 'khor dang bcas// gza' chen brgyad po 'khor dag bcas// ma bdud mi kun 'khor dang bcas// pung byed gdug pa 'khor dang bcas// klu cen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas// gza' chen brgyad po 'khor
dang bcas// ma bdud mi kun 'khor dang bcas// bdud po nam po mi bzad rnams// de rnams srog sdud yin pas na// dus der brdeg dang bsad dang mnan// las la phan 'dogs yod bya'o// dus med
log pa bstan pa ni// dpyid zla gsum la ldog pa'i dus// bcu bdun bcu dgu pa la ni// tshes gcig nyi shu brgyad pa dang// gnam stong dag la btab gyur na// sa bdag chen po rab rgyu bas// rnal 'byor
dam pa nyid rlags 'gyur// dbyar zla gsum gyis slob pa'i dus// bcu gcig drug la bco lnga la// gdug pa'i sems can sdang sems deng// dang po'i sems sdang dran par byed// de la btab ba

rnal 'byor brlag/ ston zla gsum la ldog pa'i dus// nyi shu lnga dang gsum dang gnyis// ting ting 'khor bcas nyul// dus der brgyab na rang la ldog/ dgun zla gsum la ldog pa'i dus// nyi shu bdun dang nyi

shu dang// bco brgyad dag la brdeg pa min// drag po chen po mdog drug rgyu// 'di dag dus su las nas// rnal 'byor tshe thung bcas bzhi 'phog/ 'khor yang phung po yo byad 'bri// phyugs dang mi shis dbul

por gyur// smyo 'bog 'on dang lkugs pa 'byung// zha zhing kha mig 'chus pa yi// nad dang 'bras dang lhog rgal 'byung// ltung nad thibs dang gtum pa yi// rgyu gzer mdze nad 'byung 'gyur bas// rnal 'byor
dam pas rab brtags pas// gzabs la las 'di bya ba yin// gza' yi dus tshod bstan pa ni mig dmar phur bu gza' rnams kyis// grub pa'i nyi ma'i dus tshod la// gzhan yang sbyar nas shis pa yi// dus

la bab na brdeg pa'i las// de dag rnams kyang bya ba yin// nyi ma dros pa myos pa'i dus// nyin gung mtshan gung bdud kyi dus// der ni brdeg pa'i dus tshod yin// grub pa'i dus tshod bstan pa ni// yid yul
mngon gsum mtshan mar ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyur mthong dang// mig gsal phur bu ldeg la sogs// de lta'i mtshan ma byung ba ni// las la 'jug pa'i dus tshod yin// drag po'i rtags rnams bstan pa

ni// dang po ting 'dzin tshul gnas bya// bar du bde gshegs sku bskyed bstim// tha mar sras bskyed bzlas pa bya// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa gnyis de bzhin// de yi rtags rnams bstan pa ni// mngon du khugs dang
ling ga 'gul// mig snon nyams su byung ba dang// des der 'gas pa'i dus tshod yin// dur khrod gdug pa ma mo'i gnas// gdab pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya// rgya gram lam gyi gnas la sogs// mnan pa
la sogs tshul bzhin bya// 'di ni brdeg pa'i dus tshod yin// nub gcig khas byas phur ba gdab// de ltar bya ba'i yong ma yin// thabs dang bcas pa'i rtags rnams dang// mtshan ma thams cad rdzogs pa
dang// brdeg pa'i dus la bab pa ni// rnal 'byor pa yis shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po rdo rje gsang ba gter gsang ba gter zhes bya ba'i mdo las/ bsgral ba'i dmigs
bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas las kyi rgyal po yis// bcom ldan khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ 'di skad ces gsol to// yang zhus pa// e ma'o bcom ldan sngags kyi bdag/ e ma'o gsang chen
bdag nyid che// dpa' bo'i rgyal pos yang dag bshad// thabs kyi bdag nyid gsang chen gyis// thabs rnams gzhan rnams gsungs lags na// 'di las sa bon mi 'tshal lam// rkyen gyi
sngags rnams mi 'tshal lam// gsod pa'i sngags su gsungs pa la// las kyi sngags rnams gang dag lags// thun gyi sngags rnams gang dag lags// phan bya'i sngags rnams gang dag lags// sreg pa'i
sngags rnams gang dag lags// mnan pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags// 'di la btab pa ji ltar lags// bsnan pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags 'di gang// zhi dang rgyas pa'i
sngags 'di gang// dbang dgug bsgral ba'i sngags 'di gang// gdug par dbye ba'i sngags 'di gang// las rnams thams cad dbye ba lags// byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsngags 'di gang// thams cad las
la 'bod pa la// bod pa'i sngags cig mi 'tshal lam// sbad pa'i sngags cig mi 'tshal lam// sngags kyis bdag pos bka' bstsol cig/ de skad ces ni gsol ba dang// kI la yas karmA he ru ka'i tshig gsan
nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal lo// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ sngags rnams gsal bar ngas bshad na// sems can kun gyis yid la zung// dang por bsgrub pa rab dmigs dang// de nas gsang ba'i
rjes su 'jug/ de nas thabs dang bcas pa yis// tshangs pa'i gnas las rjes 'jug pa// gsang ba'i sku ni lhan ne'o// thabs dang bcas pa'i gtso bo bskyed// rnam par rgyal ba gshin rje gshed// rta mgrin
bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yi// so so'i sku ni gsal bar blta// sgo la sgom de bzhin te// yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor gsang dbang bskur// 'di de dkyil 'khor dam pa la// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas

mchod// gsal ba'i phyag dang rgyan rnams kun// sngar bshad rjes su 'breng ba'o// oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM// hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM// hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ !!!!!/ !!!!!/ dza hUM b+haM ho// hA hA hA hA/ hA hA hA hA/ !!!!/ !!!!/

b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ k+Sha k+Sha k+Sha k+Sha/ mA mA mA/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha hUM ka rahUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M/ oM badzar

kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsal hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha

ma hA ba la hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ti ya ba ti hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha lA si ki hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha pra ti dza hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha sta na ba ti hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hi mu ha la hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha tsaN+Da ya ti hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha shA na ya ti hUM/ oM

badzra kro d+ha rig sha ya ti hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hi ma ra na hUM/ oM badzra krod+ha tsan d+ha ma ni hUM/ hring ma kro d+ha ya dza la ma mA kar ya hUM phaT/ oM phaT ta ya dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la// mu ta mu ta/ mu ta ya mu ta

ya/ sarba nA ga b+ha ba na ni sar sar/ sarba duSh+tan d+h+ri ta ya shod+ha ni hUM phaT/ oM aH hUM swAhA/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu maM/ d+hu pe puSh+pe A lo ke gan+d+he/ lA s+ye hUM/ ma le traM/ gi rti hri/ ni rti a/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a mr-i ta swAhA/ oM

na ma sarba ta thA ga ta a nur ga badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM na ma sarba ta thA ga to kro d+ha a nu sta na dz+nyAn badzra swa b+hAb At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU tsa dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ badzra aM gu sha dza/ badzra pA sha

hUM/ badzra s+phoT baM/ badzra g+haN+Da ho/ oM shrI badzra ku mar ya ka sha hUM/ oM badzra krod+hi e ka tsa badzra hUM/ oM badzra tra d+hi ha hUM/ muM laM pyaM taM/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM dza/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya tip+ta tsakra

hUM dza/ dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza/ dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza/ dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza/ tad+ya thA rak+ShA ru ru ro ru ba ti si hUM tad+ya thA/ ru ru ro ro a shug me/ tad+ya thA ru ru ro ru ba sati tra hUM/ dza ya du hUM/ man+ti hUM/ kro d+ha ma hA bA la/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/

pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hi d+ha nas sa ma ya/ dza ti laM bod+har na/ u tsusma kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya kha thaM kha thaM/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ raM dz+wa la dz+wa la yar na hUM phaT/ oM badzra su me hUM hUM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH

e h+yi hi b+hag wan/ b+hi d+ya ra dza ya k+Sha badzra b+h+yo b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hUM/ oM pra ti dza hUM/ oM sa ma ya a mr-i ta/ argaM pra ti tsa hUM swAhA/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te shan Ti gir tu tad+ya badzra d+han to ye/ me ka ni ko na/ tsa la tsa la/ ma la

ma la/ ti li ti li swAhA/ ya ma long tsa dan be ral dza hUM phaT/ dza hUM b+h+yo snying shud shud dza hUM phaT/ ha de mo ha ya/ a ka ri sarba duSh+taM/ drid ya hUM phaT/ yag sha badzra hUM dza hUM/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha mo a ral hUM phaT/

kang ka ya par la rbad phu hUM phaT/ bi lo ki ni hUM phaT/ hi li hi li/ tsag sho bya hUM phaT/ oM bu thu me ha tha/ dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza/ dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza/ ma kang gi rbud thum/ he ka du sha rbad dun b+h+yo/ he ru dra shig rbad rbad he he b+h+yo/ he ga

la dum bu kyi khyim/ he sha tri he kha yag thum b+h+yo rbad/ he ye ga sha kha thuM b+h+yo/ chem chem gag ru rbad thuM ri li li/ kha kha ma ma tri sha lib+h+yo/ hUM phaT hUM phaT hUM phaT hUM phaT hUM phaT hUM phaT hUM phaT hUM phaT/ ma ma tra ka rag sha

kha mun tra/ snying khar ga rag mo dun b+h+yo dza/ ru ru be ro u sti sta ba to sir ka mo snying khar ka hUM b+h+yo b+h+yo dza dza/ ma mar rak+mo thum lis/ snying tsa 'dus srog phrig phrig/ sham sham khyer b+h+yo/ snying khrag tsa srog khreng breng rbad

oM dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ma hA srog tug tug khrag log/ snying rbad/ ma d+ha srog thun snying lam b+h+yo/ mA ra ya phaT/ kha run nri dza dza/ oM trig nan trig nan/ snying kha rag rbad oM su kri ba ya/ bar tsit+ta/ yo gi shar/ sa ma

ya tsit+ta oM phaT/ me ri kud ri/ thums thums rbad/ khrag ti sma ra rbad phaT/ rdul phran gyur thum sa rbad/ dza ya du man ti sha ri ni la pra ti dza dza/ khyi khrid ra khrid rol khrag 'thung ma kang kang keng keng

ka ka yag/ tsin+d+ha ma ma la la ro la khrag 'thung// kang kang keng keng keng kang ka ya/ snying zab tsi sha ma la rol khrag 'thung/ kang kang keng keng kang ka ya/ tang pa ral sti ki ki tri hUM phaT/ shag shag rgyob rgyob ya

ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya shAkya pa ra ya/ ta thA ga ta ya na mo ma shag ru ya/ k+Shu k+Shu yu tshu le tsa ta tra ba ro tsa swAhA/ tsang tse gyang gyang tse tse he du he du/ tad+ya thA an n+ya b+hu mig bak+Sha bi tse/ gu lo tsa me/ pa tak+Sha lo me/ shi ri

yak+Shu na ba ku mun ti/ dzar bar me tshad bar me tsha ta na pa pa ma te/ pa shu lang ka a ba ba su ne ha sa gab+ha k+She/ lam ma bu tsak+She/ gam ri rab su me a a a no ma ya sa re/ ba la sha ri hUM/ ni la pra ti hUM/ kyi krid hUM/

tsin+d+ha ma hUM/ snying za ba hUM/ taM ma ra la to hUM/ kau ri ha/ rtsa ri ha/ pra mo ha/ b+h+ye ta li ha/ pu ka si ha/ g+ha smar ha/ sma sha ni ha/ tsaN+Da li ha/ si ha mu ka he/ bya kri mu ka he/ sri la mu ka he/ sho na mu ka he/ kri ta mu kha he/

kang ka mu kha he/ kha kha mu kha he/ hu lu mu kha he/ ar+ya te tsa te nga tsa hUM/ a mu kha hUM/ log baM hUM/ ba rmi pa la yab ti hUM/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo be shra ba Na pya/ ma hA rA dza pya/ na mo rat+na
ku pa ra pye/ ku ha ka/ ngi pa pa te/ ta pa na ta ku pa ra/ ma ra yi sha mi da/ be sha ma Na/ ba ki shar ma/ a nu nu pa snyung ru pa na ku par ka/ tsan dra kan tsakra me ho me ha sa/ kan na

ta ku par he ma ka na ku ha ka ka tsa la tsa la/ pa tsa pa tsa/ phu lu phu lu/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM na maH sa man+ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra na na/ oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+ta na ma ra ya phaT/ kI li

kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya da ro adz+nya pa ya ste+i/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra kI la kI la ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ tip+ta tsakra tsa ha na ha na hUM phaT/ shi ra kI la ye ta hUM phaT/ ma ku ki la ye ta hUM

phaT/ pa tang kI la ye Ta hUM phaT/ da ha da ha na pa tsa pa tsa/ hu lu hu lu b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ pasmi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM laM hUM laM staM pa ni ma hA b+ha ga ban/ hri kri bi kri badzra hUM ka ra/ hUM hUM hU+oMM phaT phaT phaT/

oM badzra kI li kI la ya dza hUM baM ho/ sarba big+ha nAn kI la ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badzra hUM ka ra a/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha badzra hUM phaT/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha badzra hUM phaT/ g+hi na g+hi na badzra hUM phaT/ ha na ha na badzra hUM phaT/

b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha badzra hUM phaT/ oM tad+ya thA Ta da ya badzra hUM phaT/ ha ya ra d+hi da badzra hUM phaT/ shri kri a na ya badzra hUM phaT/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya badzra hUM phaT/ a be sha ya a be sha ya badzra hUM phaT/ b+hi

d+ha ya b+hi d+ha ya badzra hUM phaT/ da ha da ha badzra hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra hUM phaT/ ma tha ma tha/ badzra hUM phaT/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra hUM phaT/ su ru su ru badzra hUM phaT/ mu ru mu ru badzra hUM phaT/ ka ta ka ta

ye bi dza ya/ a dzi ti a par dzi te mar se na u mar ta nA ya badzra hUM phaT/ hUM ma ma pa shi ku ru ma staM nya ka re i dan te/ ma ma karma shi kraM ka ra swAhA/ oM badzra a na badzra hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ oM su ru su ru oM

rtsu sa ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM thas ta nan kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM sa ma na ti bi shud+d+he a b+hi shud+d+har hUM phaT/ oM badzra aM gu sha/ oM badzra b+han b+ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra karma kro d+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM badzra swa ta sa ma ya

hUM/ oM badzra kri ta ha na ha na da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ rba na rba na/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha yak+Sha kha kha d+ha ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badzra sha tro ye swAhA/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya ma ma chod chod/

hUM laM ba rol par sha ya/ ma ma d+he badzra ma rol par sha ya/ hUM tsit+ta mugs snying khrag 'thung/ ru pa sha snying khrag spyos/ kri shig nir shob+ha pa tri shag/ tsir tsir khas dar mugs shigs ma mun tra 'jibs/ 'jigs

tsakra ma ni snying ru sha/ dum shag tsit+ta khram/ hUM nri ta ya kI li kI la ya sarba hi shi 'da' na/ khro ta ya ma yo ta gar ba lang la dza dza/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sum b+ha hUM mi phaT/ oM badzra kI li ki la ya prating hUM ming hUM/

oM badzra kI li kI la ya shan ting hUM ming swAhA/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya pra b+ha she ming swAhA/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM dza dza/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya ba stan yan yan tsa tsa na hUM/ ma ga ma bya bar shag shag hUM phaT/ oM ru

ru pa ti sta sa ma ya hUM b+h+yo hUM a ra li dza hUMbaMho/ oM badzra sa ma ya yo gi ni pra ti dza hUM hUM/ kha kha dar ma ti ma tung ru lu ru lu hUM hUMb+h+yo b+h+yo/ ku ma da ri shu la da ri tsa mu nad ri/ kang kad ri/ kha raM yo gi ni kha hi/ sa ma ya

a mr-i ta ar+g+ham pra tI dza khA hi/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM badzra a dza li hUM/ badzra b+han d+ha hU~M/ oM badzra a be sha ma ya a/ oM badzra sa ta rA dza hUM/ oM tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ ha na ha na tip+ta tsakra hUM/ oM badzra phur bu b+ha badzra b+han+d+ha pra tha/

rak+Sha si la sogs pa yi/ ming gi rnam grangs kyis gsal la/ gsod pa'ang des shes grub pa yis/ de rjes hUM las bskyed pa'i sku// 'od 'phros nas ni de pa bkug la/ gsal ba'i dbyings nyid ltas nas ni// de

la phyi nang mchod pa dbul// sdig bshags lam stan smon lam gdab// yongs su bsngo bya mi dmigs bsgom// oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra sa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas sa bon la bskyed pa'i// bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon
nu'i sku// sku mdog dmar dang rab ldan pas// 'od zer dmar po rgyan dang ldan// phyag gis mtshon cha gzhung bzhin gsal// de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor gsal bltas la// gdug pa'i sngags la rab tu 'jug/ de
yis las rnams thams cad 'grub// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po rdo rje gsang ba gter zhes bya ba'i mdo las/ sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas las kyi rgyal
po yis// bcom ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po la// phyi nang mchod pa mnyes byas la// e ma gsang ba yum gyi dkyil 'khor na// dus gsum 'du bral med par bzhugs// gnyis med ye shes rab mchog bsgral// de
yi sngags rnams gsungs lags na// khro bo so so'i dkyil 'khor rnams// bcom ldan mgon pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan badzra kI la yas// karmA he ru'i tshigs gsan nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka'
stsal to// so so'i dkyil 'khor dam pa rnams// nga yis bshad kyis nyan par gyis// bcom ldan gnyis med bde chen gyis// dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan pa ni// dang po gzhung dang mthun pa yi// sa phyogs de

dang de dag tu// rnal 'byor dam pa der gnas la// rang gi snying khar hUM bsam ste// de las 'od 'phros sangs rgyas mthong// mchod 'bul la sogs gzhung bzhin bya// de nas shUn+ya ta yis sbyangs// de rjes

gzhal yas la sogs pa'i// rgyan dang ldan pa de mthong nas// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhi ni rnam par mdzes// nyi ma zla ba'i gdan stengs su// dbyug pa sngon po mi g.yo mgon// gzhan
gyis mi thub khams gsum rgyal// sa bon bkod la gsal bar brtag/ drod gsher las skyes yin par ni// mkhas pas brtags te shes par gyis// de nas gtso bo'i sems de yis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
rnams bkug ste// bstim pas dbang yang rdzogs par ldan// de la phyi nang mchod pas mchod// gsang ba'i don ldan yang dag bskyed// de yi las rnams brtsam par bya// hUM chen ka ra'i dkyil 'khor ni// zla
gam dmar po'i dkyil 'khor la// mdzes pa'i sku mdog gsal bar ni// sngags ni bzlas pas gsal bar 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bsam// bzlas pa'i yi ge 'bru yang dgod// shes rab gsal
ba'i yi ge yis// bum pa dmar po 'od dang bcas// de yi kha rgyan a shog na/ mgul ba dar dmar bzang pos dkris// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya bzlas// mtshan ma bzang po mthong ba dang// las la sbyar
bar bya ba yin// thabs dang bcas pa'i 'od zer gyis// dang po'i gnas nas bskul bar bya// de yis las sbyor gang la yang// sems dpa' yang dang yang du bya// lus la tsan dan dmar pos byug/ dgongs
dang tho rangs sngags mang bzlas// g.yo ba'i rdzas kyis rkyen byas nas// phur gdab gsad ba'i las bya yin// dbang sdud dgug pa'i las de bzhin// bsgrubs na 'grub par gdon mi za// rnam par rgyal ba'i
dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum mtha' ma rdo rje yis// rtsa gsum kha khyer ba yis mtshan// mtha' ma 'khor los kun nas spras// de lta'i dbus su nyi zla gsal// ro yi phung po de steng du// sa bon
gsal bas yongs rdzogs la// sgong skyes rim pa la gnas par// sku rdzogs 'od dang bcas pa ni// lhan ne gsal ba'i ngang tshul can// yongs rdzogs par ni de mthong nas// sku gsung thugs las yang dag
'phro// bde gshegs la 'khor bcas spyan drangs nas// mchod dbul phyi nang dbang yang nod// gnang ba byin nas byin gyis brlab// ye shes dkyil 'khor gnas nas drang// bstim la gsal ba'i sras mchog

la// snying po bkod de spro ba sdu yi// rim bsam 'dres shes byas la// khri phrag gnyis ni bzlas byas nas// de dus mtshan ma bzang por 'byung// dus der las la sbyar ba yin// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus

su ni// yaM las rlung lha dud kha bskyed// sha ba'i khri la bzhugs nas ni// mchod phul ye shes rlung lha dgug/ bstim la rlung gi snying po bzlas// rdza so ma btang ba yi dgab// sngon dmar zhags pas rgya gram

bcing// de stengs ma las nyi dkyil 'khor// de stengs hUM las yongs gsal bskyed// rdo rje sngon po kha bzhi pa// gsang ba'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// laM las ri rab me lces bskor// de stengs mgon po bsam bya
ba// phyag na rdo rje hUM las bskyed// de yis rlung lha rab gzir bas// rlung gi sbyor ba rgyun bcad 'gyur// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// sras mchog dam pa de dbang bskur// bzlas pa bye ba
sa yar bzlas// sras mchog 'od zer 'phro 'dus gtam// rdeg pa'i rtags rnams byung ba dang// ngar phye gzugs bya sor brgyad tshad// rkang pa'i g.yas pa'i 'og tu gzhug/ btab na lha yang brlag par
'gyur// chu bo chen po'i snar btab na// nges par gyen du ldog par byed// dbyug pa sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba la// thod pa gsum dang dbyug pas brgyan// dbus su ro yi phung
pa de// skad cig gis ni gsal bar lta// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs spyugs pa len// hUM gi rang sgra thams cad sgrogs// phyag gang dbus su bzhag pa na// ra sog g.yas pa'i dkyil dag tu// gzugs brnyan

byas la gzhag par bya// de la shes pa rab bstim la// dbus su lcags kyi phur pa la// btags la bzhag par bya ba yin// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ni hUM/ grih+na grih+na hUM// grih+na pa ya grih+na pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga

bAn/ bid+yA rA dza ya hUM phaT/ sbyor ba de yis rab sbyar bas// gang yin gnas nas dgug par byed// de nas las la sbyar nas ni// lcags kyi phur pa lnga btab na// lha yang rung ste brlag 'gyur na// gdug can
gzhan lta smos ci dgos// gshin rje gshed po'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba la// zur gsum be chon 'bar bas brgyan// de yi dbus su bsam bya ba// gro ga shing shun gang

yin la// thar nu re lcag pa yis ni// rab 'byug me tog dag dag sbyar// gzugs brnyan sor bzhi tshad du ni// de yi dbus su rab bzhag la// de yi snying kha'i gnas su ni// sa bon bsam la sku skyed de// rdo rje

chog gsum gyis bskyed// yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku de la// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang yang bskur// byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dang dang// gsang ba'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan
drang mchod// rang bzhin gnas su de bzhugs par// yongs su bltas la sngags la sbyar// sras kyi dam pa rab bskyed la// sbyin brlabs dbang yang bskur ba yin// dug dang ma rungs pas kyang byug/ bzlas
nyung sa thun yang brdeg pa yin// dug la sogs pa'i thun yang brdeg/ zhabs 'og gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsad pa'i sbyor ba byas pa yis// thang cig yud kyis de brlag 'gyur// dur khrod ras ma blags

nas ni// dug dang ma rung pa yis byug/ ma te le yi shing bu la// pad+ma'i snod du dud pa gsang// de la bse shing zho yis sbyar// dur khrod rkang gi smyu gus bris// rnga mo bong bu'i gzugs bris la// de steng 'bad

cing 'thab pa bri// de la gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas// de yi rtsig pa'i rmang du bzlas// brgya rtsa brgyad ni thim pa dang// sa brkos bcug la mi mngon bya// de yis dbye bar gdon mi za// dur khrod ro ras sam

ma lhung// de dag 'khor lo rab bris la// 'khor lo'i dbus su gzugs brnyan bri// rnga mo skye rings rtsa la dang bcas// de yi rmig pa bzhi rnams la// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed// de stengs dmigs
pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag/ bzlas pa khri phrag gcig byas la// thems pa'i 'og tu sbas gyur na// gnas las mtho bar nges par 'grub// dgug par rlung gi lcags kyus te// thang cig yud la dgug par
byed// mi g.yo mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// smug nag gru gsum gdengs pa la// rtsa mo me yi phung po 'bar// logs la pad+ma 'dab gsum pa// de yi dbus su bsam pa ni// me ri 'bar ba'i dbus su ste// nyi

ma zla ba'i 'od dang bcas// de yi steng du sa bon las// rang 'od sngags kyi gsal bar 'bar// de yi sku ni mi'u thung gzugs// shin tu ldir la khrang bag can// 'jigs pa rngam pa'i zhal gdangs shing// rkan

sgra brdabs pas bred cing brgya la// gdug pa'i sngags rnams rab tu bzlos// ye shes sems dpa'i ting 'dzin lta// seng ldeng phur pa mtshon gang ba// dbang bskur byin brlabs gu gul byugs// bzlas pa stong
phrag drug dag tu// byas pas mtshan ma bzang po mthong// las la sbyor ba shes par bya// re ba nag po gang dang gang// de la gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// ming dang rus ni snying khar gzhug/
de la shes pa rab bstim la// de la shes pa rab bstim la// khugs pa'i mtshan ma byung ba dang// de la gdab pa'i las kyang bya// de ni nges par brlag par 'gyur// gdug pa'i sems gang bcas
nas ni// snying kha'i 'od zer drag po yis// rab tu khros nas bskul ba'i tshe// lha klu gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro rnams// bdag gis bcol ba'i las rnams kun// gang yin gnas su phyin bar 'gro/ gdug
pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la// zla ba gza' yis zin dus su// mtshon gyis dbab byas sha khrag dang// 'dre 'bros thang chu de dang sbyar// me reg shing shun nang du bstim// gsang sngags khri phrag gsum
bzlas na// de bstan mod la bred cing brgya la// 'jig rten khams su byer bar 'gyur// rta mgrin rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ni// dmar nag gru gsum 'bar ba la// logs gsum zla gam gsum bya ste// thod
pa 'jigs pa gsum yang dgod// phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// dbus su rlung ni rgyal po bsam// de stengs sa bon gsal ba ltas la// 'od kyis 'khrigs pa'i 'od phung las// rang sngags sgra yis rab
bskul bas// yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku gsal 'gyur// de rjes ye shes rjes dran pas// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// bstod pas rim par byas nas ni// sras mchog zang mo'i sku mchog
la// dbang bskur byin brlabs byas nas ni// bdag nyid mdun du gnas par brtag/ snying po rang sngags bkod nas ni// bzlas pa khri phrag gcig tu bya// de nas las la myur du sbyar// khros pa'i

sems kyis blang bar ni// grog mo rgyal po'i mkhar sa blang// sdong po skam po'i thang chus sbru// gzugs brnyan sor dpyad tshad du bya// klu yi rgyal po'i ma khang gzhug la// de la dgug cing bstim pa yin// de
nas phur pa btab pa rtsam// sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'jig par 'gyur// sems can phal la lta ci smos// bum pa bzang po ltar byas na// nang du bdud rtsi lnga yang byug/ de yi nang du yig 'bru dgod// de
las bdud rtsi gang bar bsam// de ma maN+Dal pad byas la// de stengs dmigs pa de bzhag la// sngon la steng gi sgo bzhir btug/ de nas tshangs pa'i bu gnas// bdud rtsi chu rgyun blugs pa yis// lus
la dug rnams mi gnas par// 'og gi mgo las byung par bsam// de ltar yang dang yang byas la// dug rnams nges par 'joms par byed// thal chen mtshan ma gdong la gdab// thal chen nyungs
kar rab bsregs la// spyan bzlog bltas la sngags drag bzlas// de yis ser ba nges par ldog/ pad+ma'i snod du bdud rtsa lnga// de stengs sman lnga blugs nas ni// bzlas pa stong phrag brgyad cu
bya// de nas sman rnams dar khud gtum// spyi gtsug dag tu bzhag nas ni// 'jigs pa'i gnas las thar par nges// gzhan gyis mi thub dkyil 'khor ni// las ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor bri// de yi dbus su lte
ba la// ser nag gru gsum 'od dang bcas// de dbus bsam par bya ba ni// rlung gi phung po'i steng du ni// rang gi sa bon nyi zla'i steng// rang gi sngags 'od de blangs pas/ gzhan gyis mi thub sku gsal
'gyur// de las dbang byin thams cad kun// rgyas par gzhan bzhin bya ba yin// dur khrod rkang gi phur pa la// rgyud chen dag gis gdags par bya// gsal ba'i yi ge bkod bzlas bya// nyi khri bzlas pa byas

pa dang// de la mtshan ma bzang po 'byung// de nas las la sbyar bar bya// dur khrod g.yam pa g.yas phyogs la// mtshan ma ming dang bcas pa bri// rgyus chen skye nas btags la bzhag/ de la dgug gzhug byas
nas ni// khugs dang las la sbyar bar bya// de yis bsad ba yud kyis ni// mod la 'chi bar nges par 'gyur// de yi dus su bskul bya ba// phur pa dril te phyogs bcur gtad// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams
