dang// bya dmar khrag dang skye tshe dang// skyi 'brum btags te ban+d+har blug/ bdud rtsi lnga yi khu+u bas bran// gsang sngags 'bum tu bton nas ni// nya nas gnam stong bar du bsgrub// nyi phyed dgongs kyi dus su

ni// gsang sngags drag por bzlas bya zhing// dug shing gdug pa'i me btang la// tshil chen zhun mar dag dang sbyar// mchog gi rkang gis dkrug bya zhing// legs par 'dres dang phog la dkrug/ de nas drangs
dang rkang gis blangs/ gsang sngags bzlas shing ri lu bya// las kyi gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas// de yi ri lu bdug pa dang// mgul du btags na cis kyang ni// tshug par 'gyur ba ga la srid// bsrung ba'i

rim pa bcu gsum pa'o// zhes brjod pas/ phyi nang gsang ba'i dam tshig dbye ba med pa'i ngang la lhun gyis gnas par gyur to// rdo rje me lce 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byi nang gsang ba'i dam tshig nges
par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang karma kI la yas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rgyal po badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o bcom ldan thugs rje can// dpa' bo las
rnams yongs rdzogs bdag/ rjes su 'jug pa'i gang zag la// gnas la sogs pa mi 'tshal lam// de yi las rim ji ltar pas// spang blang rim pa bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pas// bcom ldan
gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ las kyi sems dpa' yang nyon cig/ rnal 'byor las kyi dang po las// gnas kyi dam pa brtag pa gcig/ de yis spang blang rim pa dang// las kyirim pa ngas
bstan gyis// rtogs shing khong du chud bar gyis// gnas ni nyams dga' bkra shis dang// byin brlabs gzhung dang ldan pa'o// de dag so so'i rim pa ni// zur brgyad la sogs rtse mangs
dang// chu bo bzhin du ma bo zhing// mnyam zhing 'o ga'i chu ltar dang// 'dug na nyams dga' blta na mdzes// nyi ma bzhin du gnas pa gces// zhabs kyis bcag pa'i gnas dag ni// bkra shis yon tan phun

sum tshogs// yang na sngar gyi nus pa can// rtags dag phyin pa mchog tu legs// phyi nang gsang ba'i gzhung ldan pa// ri bo ri bran 'dus pa'i spyi// gangs ri brag dkar 'dab chen ni// seng chen 'phra ba'i

gnas yin te// zhi ba bsgrub pa'i las la shis// phug chen dgon pa chen po'am// brag chen rdo rje gtams pa 'dra// gcan chen 'khra ba'i gnas shes bya// mngon par spyod pa bsgrub pa'i gnas// dur khrod ngam
grog gnas rnams dang// sum mdo grog gleng bzhugs pa'i gnas// dur can 'khra ba'i gnas shes bya// dbang du bsdu ba bsgrub pa'i gnas// nags tshal mang pos gtibs pa dang// shin tu btsan dang

'jigs pa'i ngos// stag gzig 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya// 'dod pa'i bsgrub pa'i gnas su shis// mtsho gling chu mdo rgya mtsho'i 'jings// chu yi gling ngam rgya mtsho'i gnas// chu gcan 'khra ba'i gnas zhes

bya// las rnams kun la de shis so// tshe dbang chen po bsgrub pa'i gnas// 'khor lo gnas la pad+ma sa// lhun sdug ri bo nags tshal ldan// rgyu 'dud skyabs drung yol ba bzhi// gnam dang sa dang bar snang

brtag/ de bzhin mtshams kyang brtag bya zhing// rab tu mnyam zhing snum bag can// chu bo dngos kyi phyogs nas 'bab// me tog la sogs dbang grub rgyu// 'di steng spang bar bya ba'i gnas// dred mo ral pa
g.yengs 'dra dang// bud med bdun chas zhugs 'dra dag// sprang po 'khar ba thogs 'dra dang// shig gog chu yis bshal 'dra dang// gcan gzan sder mos brad pa dang// ma mo rngam pa'i spar rjes sam// srin

pos drud pa'i mdung rjes dang// khros pa'i gnod sbyin spar rjes sam// lung gsum mdo dang shing gicag drung// phyi nang gnyis kyi rim par brtag/ gzhan yang spang bar bya ba'i gnas// dma' dang po ba'i mtshan

nyid dang// 'gab 'chad dmu shur dod pa dang// tsha sgo can dang lha 'dra'i sa// mi 'dod gnas de sbyang po bya/ blang bar bya ba'iganas dag ni// rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'o// ri bo 'dus pa'i rtse rnams
sam// mdangs bzang gangs ri brag chen ni// rdo rje rigs kyi bsgrub pa'i gnas// phug dang dgon pa'i ri rnams dang// nags tshal ra bas 'thibs pa'am// mdangs dkar shar du gzhol ba ni// de bzhin
rigs kyi bsgrub ba'i gnas// rin chen kha dog rnam lnga'am// rin chen zur brgyad dbyibs 'dra dang// 'bras bu sna tshogs yod pa ni// rin chen rigs kyi bsgrub ba'i gnas// tsan dan nags

dang me tog tshal// klu shing nyams dga' yid 'ong ba// me tog rnams kyis shin tu mdzes// pad+mo rigs kyi bsgrub pa'i gnas// dur khrod ngam grog bshung ba'i gnas// sum mdo grog gle rtsub pa'i dri// shin tu

mi sdug tsha sgo can// las kyi rigs kyi bsgrub pa'i gnas// gzhan yang blang bar bya ba'i gnas// me tog mang po'i gling yod dang// rin chen spungs pa 'dra ba dang// skyed mos tshal dang dpag bsam shing// ngang

pa bung pa sgra sgrogs pa// skad snyan bya ni sna tshogs sgrogs// snying po mchog gi 'bru rnams 'khrung// man mas 'khor lo pad+ma 'dra// lung pa'i dbyibs legs kha shar bltas// lung pa ran cing mdzes pa ni// bkra
shis dran gyi gnas yin no// gzhan yang blang bar bya ba'i gnas// gnam ni gri 'drar 'dug pa dag// sa yi dbyibs kyang kha 'dra la// logs gsal tsher ma can gyi shing// brag chu 'thab bar du
bsgrub// gzhan yang blang bar bya ba'i gnas// nags ni tsher ma gdug pa yod// stag gzig don dred sbrul dag rgyu// mda' yis phug gam gris gshags 'dra// srin po drag po 'joms pa'i dbyibs// sa

brkos me dpung 'bar ba 'dra// dug shing gdug pa sna tshogs skye// brag ni srin po'i mche ba 'dra// grog po ngams nag gting yang zab// stag seng 'thab pa'i kha 'dra dang// chu srin kha ni gdangs pa 'dra// lung

pa lcags ri mes tshig 'dra// rtsi shing mi reng 'gros pa 'dra// brag ni srin mo dus pa 'dra// logs ni bsad pa'i khrag rjes 'dra// sngon chad phung pa'i bcas gzhi dang// gri chags mde snying mda' dud ma yo// sa

ni mes tshig gdug pa'i chu// me dpung gru gsum ma rungs pa// ba tsha chu grang dmyal ba'i chu// gnod sbyin mang po 'du ba'i sa// srin po khros pa'i kha gdangs 'dra// dred mo ral pa gseb nang du// drag

po'i las su bya ba yin// mi shis kun tu spang ba'i gnas// rgyal po gdug pa'i 'chag sa dang// zhang blon gdug pa'i rgyun srang dang// gdug pa klu yi rgyun srang dang// za ba'i kha dang gdung ba'i rwa// skyon can rgyu

ba'i lam srang dang// sa bdag sa srin gnas pa dang// nyan 'brel ba yi gnas rnams dang// sbrul gdug phang du 'ongs ltar spang// gzhan yang blang bar bya ba'i gnas// ri ni gtso bo yab kyi tshul// g.yon na

yum bskyed khro mo'i tshul// 'khor ni khro bo bcu yi tshul// g.yas na khyi sbyang rgyug pa 'dra// g.yon na bud med bdun zhugs 'dra// mdun na bse mo bka' nod tshul// shin tu drag cing rtsub pa'i ri// khros
pa'i tshogs rnams sprin phung bzhin// de ni drag po 'joms pa'i gnas// gzhan yang blang bar bya ba'i gnas// klu dang mchod rten gtsug lag khang// sa bdag lha 'dre ma mo'i gnas// la btsas
mkhar dpa'i them 'og brgyad// gdug can bsgral ba'i gnas yin no// gzhan yang blang bar bya ba ni// sngags pa rdo rje smyos pa'i gnas// rab tu khros pa'i zur gsum dang// lha yi pho brang rmang nyid

do// gzhan yang blang bar bya ba'i gnas// dkyil 'khor grwa dang lha rten 'og/ rgyal po'i pho brang yul lha'i rtsa// nyal sa'i 'og tu dur khrod shing// chu mig mgo zlum dur gyi dkyil// mkhar gyi rmang dang yul gyi

rten// nang gi dkyil dang phyug lhas dang// gang dang mi mdza'i sa phyogs su// las rnams bya ba'i gnas yin zhes// dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin gyis bshad// gzhan yang gsang ba'i gnas dang ni// mtshan nyid nges
par bshad bya ba// chen po lngas bsdus thams cad kun// ye nas yul du gnas mod kyang// de ma rtogs pa'i gang zag rnams// mtshan ma'i las la gtsor 'dzin pa// bsgrub pa gnas yum so sor dbye// smin

ma'i dkyus ring la gsor phra// tshigs zlum la ske skabs phye// 'phra bshad ut+pal ngad ldan zhing// so dkar skra 'jam mthon mthing 'khyil// mig ni zar ma'i me tog 'dra// skra mtshamasa'akhyug pa'i dog kyang

gsal// sna bzang skye ring sems ma 'dra// lus drang nu ma'i dkyil na mtho// khong dal 'gro na 'jam pa dang// skad ni ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dra// cir yang mdzes pa'i stabs dang ldan// sbas pa'i brda dang thabs

la mkhas// phyi nang rlung khar gser bas lci// bsdig cing kun gyis drod mi lon// don la gzhol zhing rtog pa med// zla gsang dkar dmar rlung khar lci// spyi yi rigs dang mtshan du bshad// zla ba'i mdangs
ldan dkar la gsal// gtsug phud g.yas 'khyil skad kyang che// bong chung lus mdzes tshig tu mnyan// dung ltar bzhin lus g.yas su 'khyil// dung can ma zhes bya bar grags// rdo rje rigs kyi bsgrub pa'i

yum// 'phra zhing bshad la bzang ring ba// bcu gnyis nyi shu bco lnga'i bar// mi la rak+ta zags pa la// rdo rje mtshon gyis ma phog pa// sangs rgyas rin chen spyan gyi yum// skra ni mthon mthing lcang lor

bshad// srid du ring zhing 'phra la ldem// lcug phran mang po'i 'dab rgyas pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma can gyi yum// 'dod pa che la brtul zhugs che// shes pa gsal zhing byad bzhin yangs// bu mo mig yangs phyal

bam// sangs rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje'i yum// ser mo gru bzhi skra yang kham// smin tshogs che la mig kyang 'bur// 'gram brla ring la skra mtshams dma'// sha 'khol che zhing sna ba ring// ban glang can zhes bya ba
yin// sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi yum// gzhan yang 'phrin las so so yi// rigs kyi dbye ba yang gsungs pa// bzhin mdog gru gsum kha dog nag/ skra rtsub gel la khro gnyer mang// ri mo
can zhes bya bar bshad// rgyas pa bsgrub pa'i yum yin no// bzhin dbyibs sogs ka mdog kyang dmar/ mig rings so thogs rab tu dam// so la shel chags lkos ko 'phra// lus la zhim pa'i dri 'byung
la// pad+ma can zhes bya ba ste// zhi ba bsgrub pa'i las la shis// skye brgyud med cing bkra mi shis// gcig pur 'dug pa gdong gcig ma// dbang du bsdu ba'i yum yin no// yan lag thams cad mes tshig
bzhin// gtan du 'phel ba'i rgyud med ma// me reg ma yi rigs yin te// drag po'i las rnams bsgrub pa'i yum// de la sogs pa rigs kyi yum// bsam mi khyab par ston pas gsungs// yum gyi mtshan nyid
gcig la'ang// thams cad bsgrub tu rung bas na// nges pa med par yang dag bshad// da lta'i spang blang rim shes nas// rgyal po blon po bral ze'am// khyim bdag dang ni dmangs ris sam// mngon dang mi

mngon bdag po la// thugs thu bar chod ma yin par// rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir// ser sna spangs ba'i sems kyis ni// sa rin bcal te sa bslang ba'o// de'ang rim pa 'di shes bya// 'bras chan gtor ma la

sogs dang// dri zhim mchod pa'i tshogs rnams dang// rin chen sna tshogs phyer btags te// byin gyis brlab cing gtor ma sbyin// gzhan yang rdzas kyi rnam pa'am// zas dang gos dang rgyan dag dang// ga la
dad cing mos pa rnams/ byin la bden pa legs par bsgo// 'di ni sa gzhi bslang ba'o// bdag nyid sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// thabs dang shes rab rtabs bzung nas// rtse gsum 'gros kyis kun tu

bskor// khros pa hUM gi nga rgyal bya// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rdo rje gzhon nu'i bka' 'byung gis// 'di ru+u ma gnas gzhan du dengs// gal te mi 'gro 'dug gyur na// rdo rje ye shes mtshon

chen gyis// mgo lus tshal ba brgyar 'gas so// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+hani hUM// grih+na gr-ih+na hUM/ grih+nA pa ya grih+nA ba ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+ya rA dza ya hUM phaT/ lan gsum bskor te lan gsum bsgrags// de rjes

brtag par bya ba ni// dang la lto 'phye'i mtshan nyid brtag/ de bzhin phyog dang sa dgra dang// steng 'og la sogs thams cad brtag/ mtshan mas mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir// ro lnga'i mtshan ma brtag par bya// khru

gang zabs su brko byas te// de nang bdud rtsi chu yis dgang// bdag nyidaskyogs gang khyer nas ni// gom bdun bor te sngags 'di brjod// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sid+ha sid+ha hUM/ slar log bskor phyogs brtag
par bya// 'di ni sa bzhi brtag pa'o// de nas sa gzhi dbang du bya ba'i phyir// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// mi g.yo mgon du mnga' gsol te// 'og gi phyogs su gdab par bya// oM badzra krod+ha

Ar+ya a tsa la b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ sa nyid dbang du bya ba'o// gnas de bsod nams gter ldan phyir// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang// 'bru lnga spos lnga snying po lnga// ga 'u'i nang du blugs nas ni// sa gzhi gter

dang ldan par bya// gal te mtshan nyid mi ldan na// las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu brtsam// rim pa rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'od zhu rnam rtog bsregs na 'grub// de ltar min na 'di shes bya// rgyal ba'i sbyor ba'i
ting 'dzin gyis// thabs dang shes rab gnas gnyis la// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor ram yam bcas// bsregs gtor sbyang ba rim pa bzhin// 'di ni phyi yi sbyang ba'o// gzhan yang maN+Dal legs byas te// me tog
gcal bkram dri yis byug/ bskyed nas rdzogs pa'i mthar thug bar// lugs bzhin 'dzab la thug par bya// 'od zhu rnam rtog bsregs na 'grub// 'di ni nang gi sbyang ba'o// thabs dang shes rab rnams bskyed

pas// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du yis// sbyang ba'i rim pa snga ma bzhin// 'di ni gsang ba'i sbyang ba'o// 'di ni sa gzhi sbyang ba'o// lha mo sbran pa'i cho ga ni// sa gzhi lam las gser mdog can// rin

chen rgyan dang bum pas mtshan// sangs rgyas spyan gyi rang bzhin te// lcags kyus grub pa'i gnas nas dgug/ skyob pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyis// dpung bzhi bdud kyi sde btul ltar// sa dang pha rol phyin
pa la// lha mo khyod ni dpang mdzod cig/ 'di na sbran pa'i cho ga'o// rnal 'byor blo mchog mi ldan na// gnas dang cho ga la sogs pa// ldan yang 'grub par ma gsung ste// blo dang ldan pa'i mi rnams

kyis// gnas dang rdzas dang yo byad dang// cho ga la sogs ma ldan kyang// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom me/ da/ 'on kyang gnas dang cho ga dang// yo byad ldan na myur 'grub bcas// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis

gsungs// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje me lce 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gnas kyi rim pa yongs su bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang karma kI la yas/ khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badzra kI la ya la 'di skad
ces gsol to// kye ma khrag 'thung gsang ba'i bdag/ sku gsung thug kyi bdag nyid gtso// yon tan 'phrin las lhun gyis grub// ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas gtso// gnas la sogs pa gsungs lags na// re
zhig las kyi dang po bas// dkyil 'khor nyams su ji ltar len// ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rjes su
'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs bsnyan dag/ rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// mi shes rmongs pa'i 'gro ba la// mtshon pas gsal ba'i don ston phyir// tha ma'i mtshan

nyid 'dir gsungs te// brtan cing mdzes pa'i khang bu la// 'jam por zhal zhal byas pa ni// kha dog lnga yi gzugs bris la// de yang dngos grub rten du bshad// ras sam gro ga 'am shing shun nam// ta la'i

lo ma'am dur khrod ras// phyag rgya'i gzugs su bris na yang// mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du bshad// rdo dag shel rdo la sogs dang// dung ngam ba so'i rgyu la ni// phyag rgya'i gzugs su 'bur btod la// de yang
dngos grub rten du bshad// gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs la// mkhan gyis legs par blug byas te// yan lag ma nyams gzugs byas la// de yang mtshan ma'i rten du bshad// blag sha byang chub shing

la sogs// rgyu shing mnyes la gzugs byas na// de yang dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten// spyi shing mnyen pa'i rgyu rnams la// phyag rgya'i gzugs su legs byas na// de yang dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten// sa stegs
dbyibs legs mdzes pa la// rdul tshon 'dus byas rnams kyis kyang// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor byas na yang// de yang dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten// re zhig las kyi dang po bas/ sa stegs dkyil 'khor bya ba

shis// tshad ni blo yi rim pa yis// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du'am// yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad do// khru tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga'am// bcu gnyis pa'am brgyad du bya// yang na khru bzhi khru do'am// mtho gang sor

bzhi la sogs tshad// nges pa med par rgyal bas gsungs// re zhig las kyi dang po ba// dkyil 'khor 'doms gang gru bzhi la// dpangs su khru gang tshad du bya// sa zhag spos chen rnam lnga yis// khu ba bsres

nas kun tu ni// ba ko tsam du skyang nul bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi khu ba dang// pad+ma rak+tas byug byas te// rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad brjod// za gam dmar po dbang gi gzhal yas su// chags pa'i rang bzhin rak+ta'i chus

byugs pas// 'khor ba dbang sdud khrag gi 'go ma yeng// mi gnas dur khrod bdag po'i bzhugs gnas ni// shes rab yum kyi mkha' la chu bo'i rgyun ltar 'bebs// mahA rak+ta sa ma ya hUM/ lha rnams sbyor ba'i

byang chub sems// snod bcud dbang du yang dag gyur// rdo rje thig gi rgyud dag kyang// rgyus chen ras ni sgril ma'am// pad+ma'i rtsa las kha dog bsgyur// gcig kyang ye shes lnga rang bzhin// byin brlabs cho ga
rdzogs pa dang// gzugs brnyan legs par tshad bcas la// las gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya/ dgongs pa dag pas shar bltas la/ bdag nyid las ky-i lhar bskyed de// gsal ldan ma'am byin brlobs
la// rjes su chags pa tshul bzhin bskul// mkha' gsang byin brlabs sbyor ba'i brdas// dza dza zhes brjod srad bu gtang// byang sems mkha' la 'bebs pa de// steng phyogs logs su gdab

par bya// rang bzhin ye shes rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor ngo la snang 'byung phyir// nam mkha'i khams kyang gru gsum e yi gnas// bar snang khams kyang gru gsum e yi gnas// badzra dz+nyAn

maN+Dal sta shikra ma hUM/ mtshan ma can gyi rnal 'byor ngo gang la// brten nas mtshan bsgoms brgyud pas rtogs bya'i phyir// 'og gi phyogs kyang gru gsum e yi gnas// e maN+Dal sta shikra ma hUM/ brjod de tshangs

pa'i thig bzhi gdab// tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis su// bya rog rjes btsal thig btab pas// dkyil 'khor cha bzhi dag tu 'gyur// dbus dang mtha' gnyis mnyam por dbye// rgyas 'bring gang rung tshad du

bya// phyogs ma 'khrul bar pra yang brtag/ bstim dang mchod dang gshegs su gsol// gser 'bras sa las byas pa yi// kha dog lnga dang yang dag ldan// gcig kyang ye shes lnga rang bzhin// hUM sogs yig 'bru
gcig kyang lnga// bde gshegs lnga yi byin brlabs las// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du ni// dkar dang dmar dang ser dang ljang// nag po las kyi rgyu ru bstan// dbus nas dgyes shing mtha' ru gdon// hUM/

'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste// de byung rigs lnga'i ngo bor snang// sems can ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// tshon gyi las 'di bdag gis brtsam// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba sha truM hUM phaT/ rang bzhin dkyil
'khor ci 'dra ba// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor ci 'dra bar// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri bar// yan lag brgyan rdzogs sku yi rten// yig 'bru bkod ba gsung nyid

yin// phyag mtshan thugs kyi dkyil 'khoranyid// rgyal ba rnams kyi yang dag bshad/ lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhi dang bar khyams// sgo dang mu khyud ldan pa

rnams// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i rim pa gnyis// ka ba phyag rgya'i gdung bzhir sbyar// gzugs la sogs pa'i mchod pa lnga// bar snang khams su 'khrig par bya// rin chen pha gu'i kha brgyan can// dra ba dra ba phyed pa

dang// sna 'phyong las byung zer tshags// chu 'phyang shar bu bya khyung dag/ rim bzhin kha dog mdzes par bya// ta la'i skye shing tsong tsong dril// gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha 'bar// bum pa brgyad dam bcu drug
bzhag/ gzhan yang rgyan gyi khyad par dag// rol mo yid 'ong ci 'byor dang// mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang// gtor ma la sogs mdzes par bya// dbus su dregs pa'i gdan la ni// khro bdag yab yum
mtshan ma dgod// shar phyogs 'khor lo dri za'i steng// rnam par rgyal ba'i mtshan ma dgod// lho phyogs 'khor lo gshin rje'i steng// gshed po yab yum mtshan ma dgod// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i

chu bdag la// rta mgrin yab yum mtshan ma dgod// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i gnod sbyin steng// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i mtshan ma dgod// shar lho'i rtsibs steng me lha'i steng// dbyug sngon yab yum mtshan ma

dgod// lho nub rtsibs steng bden bral la// mi g.yo mgon po'i mtshan ma dgod// byang nub rlung lha'i rtsibs stengs su// gzhan gyis mi thun mtshan ma dgod// byang shar 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// dbang
bsnol pa'i gdan stengs su// khams gsum rnam rgyal mtshan ma dgod// mdun du tshangs pa'i gdan la ni// hUM kar mtshan ma dgod// rgyab tu sa bdag gdan la ni// stobs chen mtshan ma dgod par bya// shar

sgor du shud mgo can la// lho ni skye ka'i mgo can no// nub sgor drin byin mgo+aiM can la// byang sgor khra yi mgo can god// lhag par gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ni// sku yi dkyil 'khor dag la'o// gsung gi

ban+d+ha dag la bri// 'khor ni yan lag ne sug la'o// thugs kyi rang rtags phur bu la// bris la dar gyi cod pan gdags// thod pa dum bu gcig pa la// yum chen rgyas 'debs pho brang bsham// rab bskyed spyan
drangs mchod byas la// byin rlobs dkyil 'khor rim par dgod// 'di de phyir yi dkyil 'khor yin// bsgrub pa nang gi dkyil 'khor ni// gnas kyi dam pa de rnyed nas// thug thub rang dgar ma yin
phyir// bslang ba'i yul du gyur pa yi// snang ba'i dngos po yod pa la// ji ltar 'os pas mnyes byas la// de nas ngag 'jam bden pas dgrol// bdag gi dbang du gyur par bya// mi snang lha 'dre chags pa
la// ga la 'os pa'i rngan pa sbyin// sa bdag lha klu 'khor bcas la// mthun pa'i gtor ma 'di 'bul gyis// tshe rabs brgyud pa'i zhe sdang bcas// dus 'dir mthu rtsal dbyung du gsol// bdag gi las 'di
ma grub par// khyed la gnas 'di g.yar lags kyis// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi// las rnams khyed kyis mngon par bsgrub// ma grub par du gzhan du zur// de skad brjod la gtor ma gtang// gzu

dang dpang du gyur pa ni// gong du ji ltar bshad pa bzhin// brtag pa la sogs 'dir mi sbyar// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// sbyor ba'i byin gyis chag chag gdab// ro ras sam ni rgyus chen la// srad

bu legs par tshad ldan bya// ring thung dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur la// sbom phra sgo yi nyi shu cha// shin tu gsherabyas thig rnams gdab// tshangs thig gong bzhin btab pa las// phyed kyi cha las pho brang ni// rgya
mdud tshul du gdab par bya// nyi shu rtsa gcig ri mo la// ka ba brgyad dang gdung bcu gnyis// 'phrin las rnam bzhi pho brang ldan// sa tshon byin rlobs tshul bzhin bri// bar khyams sgo dang bcas pa

rnams// gong ma bzhin te khyad par du// stag dang she kan chu srin dang// zhing gi rgyal mtshan rnams kyang dgod// thod pa dum bu dgu nang du// til chen me mar kha dgu gtang// rdo rje sha chen thang mar

brdal// keng rus tshogs ni ri ltar spungs// gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi bcad// zhing gi bla re sprin ltar gtibs// zhing phran mang po'i 'phan phran 'phyang// dbang po tshangs pa'i ban+d+has brgyan// gzhan yang rgyan
gyi rim pa rnams// ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du'o// gru chad rnam pa bzhi rnams la// ban+d+ha mtshan dang bdud rtsis bkang// mchod pa'i phyir na bzhi rnams dgod// zur gsum gdug pa'i cha lugs kyis// gru
gsum me 'od 'bar 'dra ba'i// dbus su dregs pa'i gdan dag la// bcom ldan sngags kyi bdag po dgod// shar lho tshangs pa'i steng du ni// hUM ka ra yi mtshan ma dgod// byang shar tshangs pa'i bu pho'i

steng// phag gi mgo can dgod par bya// shar phyogs brgya byin steng du ni// rnam par rgyal ba'i mtshan ma dgod// g.yas su brgya byin bu pho'i steng// stag gi mgo can dgod par bya// shar lho me lha'i steng du
ni// dbyug pa sngon po'i mtshan ma dgod// g.yas su me lha'i bu pho'i steng// g.yag gi mgo can dgod par bya// lho phyogs gshin rje'i gdan la ni// gshin rje gshed po'i mtshan ma dgod// g.yas su gshin

rje'i bu pho'i steng// sha pa'i mgo can dgod par bya// lho nub srin po'i steng du ni// mi g.yo mgon po'i mtshan ma dgod// g.yas su srin po'i bu pho'i steng// gzig gi mgo can dgod par bya// nub tu klu yi

gdan stengs su// rta mgrin mtshan ma dgod par bya// g.yas su rlang lha'i yi bu pho'i steng// byi la'i mgo can dgod par bya// nub byang rlung lha'i steng du ni// gzhan gyis mi thub mtshan ma dgod// g.yas su klu
yi bu pho'i steng// spyang khu'i mgo can dgod par bya// byang phyogs gnod sbyin gdan stengs su// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i mtshan ma dgod// g.yas su gnod sbyin bu pho'i steng// seng ge'i mgo can dgod par
bya// byang shar dbang ldan gdan stengs su// khams gsum rnam rgyal mtshan ma dgod// g.yas su dbang ldan bu pho'i steng// dom gyi mgo can dgod par bya// byang nub sa bdag gdan stengs su// stobs chen

mtshan ma dgod par bya// g.yas su sa bdag bu pho'i steng// dred kyi mgo can dgod par bya// sgo ba la sogs gong ma bzhin// khro bo'i phur pa mang po kun// grwa yi phyogs su spungs te gzhag/ rdzas dang la chas
bskor te bzhag/ nang gi dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis// gsang ba phyi nang gsang ba nas// gsang ba phy-i yi dkyil 'khor ni// las rnams gong du bstan pa
las// ye nas dag pa'i gzhal yas khang// chos dbyings 'byung ba e yi dbyibs// gdug pa'i gzhigs phyir 'brub khung ste// gsod phyir rtse mo lho ru bstan// gdug phyir dug gi chag chag gdab// sku

gsung thugs ldan bar rim gsum// ngar ldan dur khrod sol bas byug/ 'gugs shing 'dren phyir hUM phaT dgod// 'phra men bskul phyir rtsang thod dang// gzhug phyir thod pa lcags kyu bri// tha dad las rnams bya
ba'i phyir// logs la hUM gsum gzhag pa yin// de la g.yo ba'i sems 'byung phyir// zur la phaT gsum gzhag pa yin// dri ma drug dang rdzas rnams la// ting 'dzin ye shes gsal ba'i phyir// shin tu gsal

zhing dod par bya// ki ra maM sa dug gis byug/ bsgral ba'i zhing bcu zhe gcod cing// yang nas yang du smin par bya// mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su ste// gan kyal dag tu

gzhag par bya// nang du gzhal yas drag po la// lha tshogs bcu gcig khros pas brtag/ rgod cing byin brlabs snga ma bzhin// kha khyer dang po dag la ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig sras kyi tshogs// shin tu drag po'i cha

lugs la// zhabs kyang drag po'i tshul du bzhugs// de yi phyi rim pho nya'i tshogs// rtsang thod dag las bskyed par bya// de yi phyi rim kha khyer la// lcags phye dang ni zangs phye dang// rdo phye dug dang khrag
snang dang// thun rdzas rim pas mtha' bskor la// gsad pa'i las mkhan rdzas su gzhag gzhan yang gnan dang bsregs pa dang// 'phang pa'u+i rdzas rnams ci 'byor bsham// gsad pa las kyi dkyil 'khor

yin// gsang ba'i nang du gsungs pa ni// rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya// chags la mos pa'i don ched du// phyi yi rigs dang so so'i rigs// pad+ma can dang dung can ma// ljon pa ma dang lcug phram// ban glang

can dang ri mo can// gdong cig reg ma la sogs pa// rigs lnga phyi yi dbang can nas// las bzhi so so dbyibs kyis brtag/ mchog dang rab dang 'bring dang mtha'// pad+ma'i ring thung yod pas so// ri lu dang

'og tha ltag ste// sran tsam gnyis kyang glang po'i klung// yang dang yang du rom mo bya// lce yis rol mo bya ba yin// gnad dgu ru ni sen mo gdags// ma mchu so yis brud par bya// de nas gnyis med sbyor ba

bya// sra dang drod dang gsher dang bskyod// byang chub sems ni spyan drangs nas// dga' dang mchog dga' rang bzhin dga'// bral ba'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin can// snyoms 'jug pho brang der zhugs nas// spyan
drang rlung gi lcags kyu ste// gzung ba rlung nyid bsam pa'o// brjod pa rus sbal lta bu ste// sems bzung thabs mkhas lcags kyu'o// de ltar byang sems rab babs nas// rang bzhin lhan cig

skyes pa 'byung// grol ba lam pa'i don ched du// rten med nang gi dkyil 'khor ni// rang lus gzhal yas 'di ltar brtag/ rkang pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// lte ba mtha' zad me dkyil 'khor ro// ro stod sa

yi dkyil 'khor ro// mgo bo rib rang bzhin te// nam mkha' kun gyi go 'byed pa'i// de las rang byung gzhal yas ni// snying khar chos kyi pho brang ni// kha dog mthing kha yi ge dgu/ phyogs bzhir yab yum yi ge

brgyad// dran rtogs bskyed pa'i yi ge gcig/ brgyad ni 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la'o// gcig ni 'khor lo'i dbus na'o// smra byed sgo dgu zhes bya'o// mgrin pa longs spyod pho brang ni// 'dab ma bcu drug sgo bzhi
ldan// 'byung ba'i yi ge bzhi yis spras// dbus su yi ge oM yin te// sku yi dngos po yi ge lnga// chags 'byed rtags 'dzin mdud pa gsum// ri rab 'bras bu bde chen gnas// 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis

te// A li gnyis kyis yongs su spras// 'bras bu byang sems yi ge haM// mi shigs pa yi snying po ste// rtag par gzhom med kha dog bltas// mtshan ma med pa'i sku zhes bya// 'byung 'jug byed pa'i sgo drug

can// sa bon kha ba lta bur gnas// sprul pa'i pho brang drug cu bzhi// kun 'byung sgo ni drug gis brgyan// ston pa de dbus oM gyi gzugs// thams cad 'byung ba'i oM zhes bya// de yi mtshan nyid brjod bya ba// kha

dog dkar po ye shes bzhi// dbus kyi ri bor 'dzin pa ste// lte ba'i mtha' la gnas zhes bya// rdo rje gsang 'jug pho brang ni// mtshon byed 'od gsal bde chen 'byung// rin po che yis brgyan pa ste// mtshon

byed sgo ni gcig pa'o// rdo rje snyoms 'jug pho brang ni// rin po che yi khang pa la// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyan dang ldan// drug cu rtsa bzhi dbus na bzhugs// brjod med brjod bral de bzhin don// ma bcos lhun gyis
grub par gnas// gzhal yas bye brag de ltar gnas// gsang ba'i gzhal yas dam pa la// kun gyi mtshan nyid rdzogs zhes bya// de la brtag cing 'phror mi gzhug/ de yang 'di ltar brtag bya ba// chos dbus
ye shes sems dpa' ste// de dbus ting 'dzin sems dpa'o// ting 'dzin hUM gi rang bzhin las// 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros gyur pas// phyi nang gzhal yas gsal byas te// srid pa gsum yang gsal byas
byas// dus gsum sangs rgyas byang chub sems// mi 'gyur ba yi 'od ces bya// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i sems bsdus nas// slar yang rim gyis hUM la thim// hUM yang rim gyis thig le'i
nang// yongs su dag pa'i don ces bya// nges par snying po'i 'bru bkod de// tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam la// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku yang bskyed// shin tu dod cung gsal bltas la// dbugs dbyung
'grogs nas g.yas nas spro// mtho gang mtho de ji srid bar// byang chub sems ni der bzung bya// gal te nang du 'jug na yang// dbugs dang 'grogs nas g.yon nas 'jug/ thig le sku la thim par
brtag/ yung dang skad cing thun la sogs// ji ltar gnas pa'i bar du brtag/ de ltar rim pa yang nas yang// sems de nges par zin pa dang// mthar ni dmigs par mi 'gyur te// gang la dmigs pa'i
sems med do// gsang ba'i rim pa yang gsungs pa// gsang ba'i pho brang dbus su ni// byang chub sems chu rab phabs nas// rdo rje chog rnam gsum gyis// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku rnams bskyed// skad cig

ma la yongs rdzogs bya// de las shin tu phra ba ste// pad+ma'i sna rtse la rdzogs bya// de las sems bsdu bstan par gzung// de la sems de bstan pa yang// dus gcig tu'am re re spro// rim pas rim par gsal
bar spro// 'phros pas de la sems gzung gzhag/ gal te de la mi gnas na// slar la nang du rim zhugs brtag/ de la nan tan bskyed byas la// sems bsdus nang nas gnas par bya// de la sems gnas
bstan pa dang// 'jig rten gsum du spros 'gyur yang// de las gzhan du mi g.yo ba'o// de las rang bzhin med brtags te// gang la'ang dmigs par med par 'gyur// de las rim pa yang gsungs

pa// rlung gis rab bskyod me spar te// yi ge yongs su zhu ba'i 'od// g.yas byung chos sku yongs bzhu nas// de 'od rtsa g.yas longs spyod la// bskor ba gsum byas yi ge bzhu// bde chen gnas su haM spros
te// phyir 'thon phyogs bcur 'phros pa las// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i byang chub sems// thams cad bsdus te steng sgor thim// a ba d+hu ti'i gnas nas byung// sam po ka ru sems gzung bya// lus sems ye
shes mi rtog skye// ston bas de lung bsgom zhes bya// de nas 'jug pa'i lam zhugs te// sprul pa'i gnas su bka' lung nos// yang dag par ni de sems gzhag/ gnyis med don gyi lung thob 'gyur// de ru ma
gnas dbus nas gshegs// chos sku'i gnas su yang dag gnas// lus rnams yang dang skye bar 'gyur// skyes nas bskal ba'i bar du gnas// chos kyi dbyings su mi gnas na// ni rim ka'i gnas su
drang// de ru sems ni gzhag par bya// de ltar yang nas yang du bya// rnam rtog med pa'i ye shes skye// 'byung bas sreg cing 'jug pas gso// gnas su byang chub sems 'od las// rnal 'byor mig gi 'od zer
gyis// g.yo med mi 'gyur 'od la blta// sangs rgyas ye shes nam mkha' 'byung// 'di yang nang gi thig le yin// don du gang la mos pa ni// rab tu 'bad de yid gzhungs na// ye shes skye bo

nges par med// ji ltar brtags pa de snang bas// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog gyur zhes// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// ces gsungs so// rdo rje me lce 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen po las/ phyi nang gsang ba'i
dkyil 'khor yongs su bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang karma kI la yas// khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zag dang po sa pa yis// 'di ni sgom zhing bsgrub pa
dang// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor mi 'tshal lam// thabs dang bcas pa'i rim pa yis// bsgom zhing bsgrub pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badzra kI la

yas// rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor bas// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom pa yang// rim pa gsum du shos par bya// dang po phyi yi rnal
'byor ni// bskyed pa'i rim pas legs 'jug bya// phun sum tshogs pa'i slob dpon gyis// byams dang snying rje sngon bstang nas// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs
pa'i// las rnams kun la 'jug pa dang// bar chod bgegs rnams bsal ba'i phyir// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams su bcad// bdag nyid snod du gyur nas ni// dam sri mnan pa'i las bya zhing// don yod

grub pa'i pho brang gdab// rnam bzhi las kyi bro brdung ngo// dur khrod bdag po ma tram ni// brjid pa'i stobs kyi mnan bar bya// khog pa gzhal yas khang du bskyed// dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen yin// phur ba
dar gyi cod pan can// khro bo bcu ru byin rlobs la// phyogs mtshams steng 'og bgegs 'dul lo// ma nor ma bcos dbyings nyid las// btsal ba med pa'i rig pa yin// stong pa chen po'i ting 'dzin du// ji

bzhin pa yi ngang la gzhag/ oM ma hA shun+ya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo las// blang dang dor ma ye mi byed// mtshams 'byor chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// kun kyang chu zla'i tshul du

bsgom// 'bras bu mtshon chen 'bar ba ni// rgyu mchog 'bras bu yi ge hUM// gnyis med mtshon pa'i lam bzang po// zung du 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yin// chos kun rtsa ba sems nyid pas// phyi nang dngos po ma
lus kun// raM gyis bsregs la yaM gyis gtor/ khaM las chu byung dag par bsam// hUM gis 'od zer rab 'bar bas// so so'i sku ru gsal bltas te// de la 'od zer 'phros pa yis// las gnyis byas nas
slar 'dus pas// rdo rje'i ra ba dra ba dang// khang par yongs su bsam par bya// de ni thun mong mtshams zhes bya// khyad par bka' yi 'khor lo ni// bdag gis de la bka' stsal nas// bgegs
kyi tshogs la yongs btab pas// dge sdig las kyi shan phye nas// dbang bskur las kyi gnyer gtad do// hUM nyid shes rab ar bsal bas// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar// e las mthing kha nam
mkha'i dbus// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor che// ra las rak+ta'i rgya mtshor gyur// su las mchog phran sa gzhir chags// de steng kam las ri rab steng/ ram las ye shes me byung ste/ las gnyis yongs su

rdzogs su rdzogs byas nas// 'bras bu'i mamatshan nyid der shes bya// de steng rten gyi dkyil 'khor ni// b+h+ruM las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang// mtha' dang dbus med mkha' dang mnyam// phyogs bcur rgya yongs

ma chad pa'i// phyi dang nang med kun tu nang// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rab tu 'bar// mdzes pa'i gru chad bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// tshad med bzhi yi sgo ldan zhing// thod pa

'bar ba'i rtsig pa la// zhing chen ka ba mchog gi gdung// mchog phran dral phyam nyi zla'i mig/ rak+ta 'bar ba'i zham chu+u 'bab// zhing gi bla re zhing chung 'phan// rgyal mtshan tsit+ta'i tog dang ni// gdug pa'i sgo

dang sgo rgyan bcas// zhing gi lhu tshigs mang po dang// dur khrod rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan// mthing nag po yi 'od dang bcas// phyi rim rin chen 'bar ba la// kha dog lnga dang yang dag ldan// de la sogs pa'i

rgyan rnams ni// gzhan las grags pa bzhin du'o// de dbus nyi zla'i pad+ma'i steng// dreg pa'o gdan dang zhing rnams bsam// 'di ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor ro// rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin rim pa yis/ chos kyi dbyings
las rang sgras bskul// cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba las// rab tu srol gi gor shar bas// rdo rje gzhon nu'i dag pa'i dbyings/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing

zhal// dang po rtse dgu me dpung bsnams// bar pa rtse lnga kha T+wAM ga/ tham ri rab phur bu 'dril// zhing gi g.yang gzhis ya ba bskor// glang chen ko rlon stag gi sham// mdo bzhi sbrul gyi chun po la// thod pa tshar

gsum 'phreng bas brgyan// thal chen zhag dang rak+ta dang// srog rtsa an tsa na yis brgyan// dbu skra khan nag ral pa can// dur khrod smug nag me ri 'khyil// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum tshul gyis bzhugs// sdang
mig bgrad pa zhe la gnon// mche ba rab tu rngam pa gtsigs// ag tshom 'bar zhing 'jigs gzugs ldan// rab tu srog gi go shar nas// gnyis med sku dang gsung thugs ldan// cha lugs gtso dang mthun
pa'am// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas g.yon dril bu ban+d+har ldan// snying gi go ru bsgom bya ba// byang chub sems kyi ngang nyid de// rang las byung ba'i ye shes mchog/ rgyal kun ba

gyis mi brnyes te// de nyid tshul ni rnam pa gnyis// rang gis bskor ni gnas pa dang/ nyon mongs don du yig 'brur gnas// dang po'i tshul ni 'di lta ste// skyon gyi dri mas ma gos pa'i// dkar po'am rang gi
mdog tu bstan// rgyu dang 'bras bur yang dag ldan// cha lugs de bzhin phyag de bzhin// g.yas g.yon dang po rang rtags rnams 'dzin// ba zhengs dang bzhugs dang stang stabs tshul// nges pa med par dag
bshad// phung po rdo rje gtam byas nas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med ltar// rnam par shes pa rdo rje bsgom// yang na yi ge oM du bsgom// gang zag rnams kyi phung po yang// dper na ras spyil nyi zer
bzhin// kun tu rtsa yis gang mod kyang// rtsa yi ngo bo gsum ma ma lnga// 'od kyi rnam pa dngas snyigs gnyis// yi ge 'bru ru gnas pa ste// dag pas nyon mongs sprin rnams 'joms// khams gsum nyon mongs
'joms pa'i mchog/ de las 'od kyis rab bskul bas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba spyan drangs nas// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang// bstod dang thugs dam rjes bskul ba// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin

rnams// srid pa rdo rje bsgrubs mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi zad pa// sku yi
dbyig tu bdag bskyed cig/ thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin brlabs 'dir stsol cig/ dbang bskur byin
brlabs nus mthur bcas// lus dang shes pa rgyas pa yis// 'bras bu mngon par shar ba dang// mkha' gsang byin brlob sbyor ba'i brda// thabs dang shes rab bsnol mar bskul// cho ga thabs kyi yan lag

bzhis// gang la 'tsham pa'i thabs su sbyar// yang na cho ga gsum gyis te// thams cad g.yas g.yon dang po ni// rdo rje ban+d+har yang dag ldan// thams cad sgrol ba'i mtha' brnyes pas// tha ma ri rab phur bu

'dril// rnam rgyal rdo rje 'khor lo bsnams// dbyug sngon rin chen me dpal bsnams// gshed po thod dbyug dgra sta'o// rdo rje zhags pa mi g.yo mgon// rta mgrin ral gri sbrul zhags te// ban+d+ha rnga yab gzhan

mi thub// rin chen dbyug to bdud rtsi 'khyil// 'khor lo mda' gzhu khams gsum rgyal// hUM chen rgyal po mda' gzhu la// stobs chen zhags pa tho ba'o// rdo rje srin mo chen mo rnams// 'jigs byed chen po ji
lta bar// g.yon na rang rtags dril bu 'dzin// shes rab lha mos lus brgyan pa'o// 'khor lo gdan la rim bzhin du// phyogs bcu phra mo 'khor bcas dgod// mdun dang rgyab kyi phyogs dang

dag tu// steng 'og khro bo 'khor bcas dgod// thugs na 'bar ba'i srog kyang bzhugs// dbu la rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsrung// kun kyang rigs dang ye shes dbye// 'phra men rnams kyi mdog dang rgya// rnam

bzhi las kyi rim pa yis// cir yang 'gyur zhing sna tshogs thogs// yang na nyid kyi rtags 'dzin pas// nges pa med par yang dag bshad// snying po yi ge hUM bcas pa'o// shar sgo pu shud mgo can la// lhor ni skye
ka'i mgo tsan dgod// nub tu srin bya'i mgo can la// byang sgor khra yi mgo can rnams// zhing chen gdan nam dmigs pa'i rten// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang// dril bu la sogs rim par ldan// pho
nya dpung tshogs nyi shu ni// gcig la'ang gsum gsum drug cur ldan// yang na sum brgya drug cur sogs// bsam mi khyab par ston pas gsungs// rang rang rtags dag byin brlabs pa// thams cad gong
dang mthun par gsungs// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas gsum nas// yi ge gsum gyi 'phro 'du yis// bdag dang 'khor ni thams cad la// srog dang dbang dang ye shes rnams// lus ngag yid la bskur bar

bya// yang na rdo rje gsum gyi lhas// byin gyis brlab par yang dag bshad// dang po ston pa chos kyi sku// khro tshogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// de las byung ba sprul pa'i sku// de bzhin gcig la kun tshang
bas// nges pa med par yang dang bshad// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// lcags kyus bde gshegs gnas nas dgug/ ye
shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// drag po'i 'phrin las rdzogs pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor dang bcas// rten dang bcas pa spyan drangs la// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang// gzugs dang gnyis su med par

bstim// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// gdan dang phyag dang bstim la sogs// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// bstod dang 'phrin las drag pos bsku// bzlas dang

dngos grub nod pa dang// bskrad dang bsdu dang bsrung ba dang// rigs mi nub dang spyod lam rnams las// la 'bras bu ci yod bshad// 'di ni phyi yi rim pa yin// nang gi rim pa yang gsungs ba// nyi shu rtsa
gcig e yi dkyil// mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas las// drag po sgrol ba'i nus par ldan// gzhal yas me 'od 'bar bar bsgom// log par lta ba bsgral ba dang// ngan sems 'chang ba mnan slad
du// 'jigs byed drag po'i dkyil 'khor la// mthing nag 'bar ba'i khro bo rnams// zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa la// phyag na dbang dra ga phur bu dril// yang na gdug pa'i mtshon cha

bsnams// kun kyang mthun par shes par bya// gsod pa las mkhan bskyed pa ni// tshad med snying rje bskyed pa dang// byang chub sems la dga' ba ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i mchog yin te// bsgrub pa pos ni nan
tan bya// khrag 'thung thugs la gnas pa ni// ye shes rtse mo mchog yin te// hUM gsum las ni 'das pa'i phyir// rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan// 'di ni gzungs dang byin rlabs dang// bzlas brjod dang ni
'phrin las dang// dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid dang// phun sum tshogs pa bdun po yis// drag po'i las kyang grub par byed// re zhig rim pa 'di bsgom bya// bcu gcig nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// bzhi bcu
gnyis sam brgya rtsa brgyad// bdun nam lnga'am bzhi'am gcig/ gnas skabs rang gi rim pas bskyed// rdzas kyi phur pa gzhal yas khang// rtse mo chos 'byung rang bzhin te// rgya mdud gnam sa gnyis bar

du// lcum zhogs rin chen zur brgyad de// nang du+u rin chen gzhal yas khang// rgyan la sogs pa gzhung bzhin bsam// nang du zhing dang nyi zla'i steng// khrag 'thung lha tshogs bsam par bya// de yang bdag
nyid thugs kha'i hUM// 'od 'phros khrag 'thung spyan drangs te// gzhal yas khang du bzhugs par bsam// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod phul nas// rten dang bcas par 'od du zhu// bdag gi zhal thim lte dbus

sbyang// yum gyi mkha' la spros pa dang// sras kyi sku ru yongs rdzogs bsam// yang na cho ga gsum las ni// zhal gsum phyag bzhi drag po'i tshul// sku stod yan chad chas rnams ni// rdo rje go cha na bzar

gsol// sbrul dang thod rlon 'phreng bas brgyan// thams cad mthun te gtso bo bzhin// lte ba man chad chas rnams ni// ut+pal sngon po'i mdog kyang 'dra// ye shes phur pa dbu gsum po// btab na lha yang rlag
par byed// g.yas kyi dang po sta gri la// 'og ma ri rab gnon tshul 'dzin// g.yon pa kha T+wAM dril bu 'dzin// 'og ma phur pa 'debs pa'i tshul// rtag pa chen por bzhugs par bsgom// byin brlabs dbang
bskur gzi bskyed la// gdan la zhugs su gsol ba gdab// spyi bo zla stengs oM dkar po// mgrin par 'dab brgyad dmar po hri// thugs khar nyi stengs phaT mthing nag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje

bsam// yang na spro bsdus byin brlab bsdu// sku gsung thugs su byin brlab pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// thugs khar yi ge 'bru gsum bsam// lte bar zur brgyad steng du+u sa// steng 'og nyi steng ha
bsgoms te// 'phros 'dus ye shes lngar ldan bsam// 'bru lngas gnas lngar byin brlab pa'o// logs gsum hUM la zur gsum phaT// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang// de yi 'phrin las rnam

gsum gyis// drag po sgrol ba'i nus ldan par// ye shes rtse gcig byin brlab pa'o// sgrol ba las kyi skabs su ni// byi na gyis brlab pa yang gsungs pa// sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo ni// re re la'ang gsum
gsum dgu/ 'phros pas lan gnyis rdzogs byas nas// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad la// drag po'i byin brlabs mdzad par bskul// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor lha
tshogs byin brlab bskul// rang rang rtags 'dzin khro bo rnams// phur pa'i sku la rab zhugs pas// rten dang rten can tshul du snang// srid gsum sgrol ba'i nus par ldan// rigs kyi khro bos byin brlabs
pa'o// gzhan yang byin gyis brlob pa ni// g.yas g.yon nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor la// dbus su kun bzang yab yum bskyed/ cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// rigs lnga yab yum rdzogs par blta// de'ang rim pa

'di lta ste// gung mo rnam par snang mdzad la// mthe bong mi bskyod pa yi sku// mdzub mo rin chen 'byung ldan te// srin lag don yod grub pa'o// mthe'u chung snang ba mtha' yas so// yum yang rim pa ji lta
bar// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med bsgom// dam tshig blang dang snyoms par 'jug/ bskyod dang byang sems 'od 'phros pas// las gnyis yongs su rdzogs byas nas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad

la// shin tu drag po'i 'phrin las bskul// sbyor ba'i byin brlabs 'od du zhu// thugs khar thim nas sku yi dbyig/ rdo rje'i lam zhugs yum gyi mkha'// tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam du// sras kyi sku la rab bzhugs
pas// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad kyi// ngo bo nyid du gyur pas brtag/ gsang ba'i dbang dang byin brlab nos// rigs lnga nyid du 'od zhu bstim// lag gi rtsol bas byin brlabs pa'o// thabs dang
shes rab gnyis bar du// ga'u'i dbus su nyungs kar bzhag/ thabs dang shes rab dag gi mthus// khro chung 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ni// shin tu dod la bsam mi khyab// bsnun pas gzugs dang gnyis su
med// shin tu rno zhing dbal dang ldan/ 'od zer 'bar bar gyur pas brtag/ thabs mchog nyi ma'i dbus su ni// ho las me dpung 'bar bar gyur// 'dre 'bros thang chu de las bsregs// bdug pas mnyes

pa'i mchod pa dbul// ho las byung ba'i dur khrod me// smug nag dkyil na bzhugs par brtag/ ra yi khrag dang gsur chen dang// pad+ma rak+ta nim pa'i lo// sdong po rkang gcig khrag gis byug/ shin tu chags shing
zhen par bsam// hUM bzhi gsal 'phro hUM bzhi'i tshogs las bskyed// sku gcig dang las dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs// dbu la rgya mdud rang bzhin thabs yin te// dbus su rgya mdud bstan
pas shes rab po// thabs dang shes rab gnyis las yongs rdzogs pa// lo brgyad rang bzhin khro bo chen po brgyad// zur brgyad 'byung ba'i rang bzhin khro mo brgyad// zur steng chu srin kha na sgo mo'i
tshogs// thugs mchog mnyam pa'i dbyings nas sprul pa 'gyed// rtse mo zur gsum rang bzhin sku gsung thugs// steng 'og gnyis su gnas pa yab yum gnyis// rgya mdud 'og mar steng 'og khro rgyal gnyis/

yab yum sprul par bcas pa'i rang bzhin no// khong stong byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// khro rgyal 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// ma g.yos rnam dag chos dbyings kyi nas bzhengs// sku gsung thugs

ldan drag po mi bzad pa// gdug can log par lta ba'i sems can rnams// thugs rjes khyad par dbyings su sgrol zhing sdud// zhi bas 'dul ba'i skal dang mi ldan yang// drag pos bsgral ba'i 'phrin las khyed

kyis mdzod// de skad brjod la thugs dam bskul// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang// 'phrin las dus kyi rim pas bya/ nang gi gsang ba zhes bya'o// gsang ba'i rim pa 'di lta ste// gnyis med gsang ba chen
po'i don// kun gyis rtogs par ga la nus// rtag dang chad pa'i rang bzhin gyis// des kyang gsang don rtogs pa min// bde chen stong pa'i rang bzhin gyis// des kyang gsang don rtogs pa min// ye shes

sku yi rim pa yis// des kyang gsang ba'i don mi rtogs// byang chub sems ni bde chen pos// des kyang rtogs par ga la nus// rtag chad mtha' ni nges spang zhing// rang bzhin steng pa'i rang bzhin can// dbu
ma'i don chen zab mo yis// der kyang rtogs par ga la nus// gsang ba dam pa las byung ba// sangs rgyas sku ni rab rgyas mdzad// snang ba ma yin mi snang min// ye shes sku ni rab gsal ba// khyad par mi
gnyis thams cad de// dag cing dang ba'i rang bzhin can// gsal ba'i don nyid de dran bya// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kun// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid yin te// de la yang dang yang// 'dris na// de
yis thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur// gdod nas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin pas// rang bzhin gyis ni de lta'o// dam pa rnams kyis dpes mtshon byas// thams cad gsangab las byung ba// rim gyis de nyid la thim

pas// sgyu ma'i lus can nyid du 'gyur// sgyu ma smig rgyu me long gzugs// chu zla rmi lam chu bur dang// dbang po gzhu yi rang bzhin dang// brag cha sgra brnyan nyer gnas pa// sgyu ma'i dpe ni brgyad rnams ni// don
ni gsum du shes par bya// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byams yang// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du bya// spyod lam dag ni thams cad du// sgyu ma'i tshul can de dang de// thams cad rjes su bya ba
yin// thog ma med pa'i dus shes nas// shes rab gsum la rab sbyangs kyang// gsang ba'i don rnams shes pa min// yang dag gsang ba'i don gsang ba// mkhas pas kyang ni mi shes te// rna brgyud gdams
pa'i lung med par// mngon sum bya bar mi nus so// don nyid gsang ba las byung ba'i// 'gro ba drug gi sems can gyis// rang dgar rnyed par mi 'gyur te// bskal ba grangs med du sbyangs pa'i// las 'phro

dang ldan bla ma'i drin// 'bad pa'i dbang gis rnyed par ga la nus// 'di la dka' thub dka' spyad min// 'di la khrus dang gtsang sbra med// 'di la brtul zhugs spyod pa med// sgyu ma'i tshul can ting 'dzin
gyis// sangs rgyas nyid du de gnas 'gyur// thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yin// rtog ge ba rnams smod byed kyang// yang dag de yis shes pa min// rang bzhin gsang ba'i don nyid de// rang lus nyid la

gnas pa ste// rtog pa dang bcas mi mthong ngo// shes dang phung byed rnam par ldan// yid lus dbang po'i gzhu dang 'dra// brgyad kyi dpe la rmongs pa yis// gsang ba'i don nyid mi mthong ngo// gsang ba'i don
nyid mi mthong ngo// gsang ba'i dam pa mchog gi lam// 'bras bu sangs rgyas skur gsal ba// sems can khams rnams de 'drar brtag/ brtan g.yo'i rang bzhin thams cad kyang// sngags kyi bdag nyid de

las men// gsang ba las rnyed rang bzhin te// 'gro ba'i gnas med de bzhin nyid// chos spyod bcu yis las mi byed// las byed sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no// dang po'i las can de dang de// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ma
dmigs na// gsang ba'i don bral 'bras bu med// sa yi rim pa de dang de// rab tu gnas pa'i skabs su yang// sgyu ma'i lus can spyod med na// byas la gsang ba'i 'bras bu med// gsang ba'i rim pa yang

gsungs ba// dang por sngags kyi rgyu nyid ni// gsal la dri ma dag pa yi// mkha' dbyings gnyis med sprol bral ldan// mchog gi snying po de brnyes nas// thog ma dang ldan me yi mthus// rab tu bskul bar de

shes la// 'phar ba nya dang chu yi tshul// de nyid mthus ni dbu ma gsal// de las rlung gi lcags kyu yis// thabs dang shes rab spyan drangs la// nyin thabs gnyis la rab gnas bya// bde ba chen po'i 'khor
lo'i gnas// gsal ba'i dbyings dang ldan par gnas// de dkyil lte ba'i bu ga ru// a dang ma las gyur pa yi// de dkyil gsang ba'i yi ge k+Sha// yid dang gnyis su med pa ste// thabs dang shes rab rang
bzhin yin// chos kyi snying por bsam bya ba// thabs dang shes rab yi ge ni// nyi zla'i dbus su bsam par bya// de bde brten 'gyur gsal ba ni// dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs zhes bya// bde ba

rgyas 'debs d+hu pe ste// mdzes pa me tog ma ru grags// 'od dang ldan dus mar me la// bde dang ldan pa'i dri chab mo// me tog dor ba dri yis dngos// de yi tshim ldan ro zhes brjod// byug pa chos nyid bde bas

reg/ yongs su rgyas byed sgra tshogs yin// gzhan pas mi 'gyur sa le ste// rgyun mi 'chad bar 'phreng par 'dod// thams cad rol pa'i pi wang ste// cir yang snang ba gar ma'o// rnam rtog mi mnga' bdud rtsi
ste// dmigs par mi gnas gtor mar bshad// dug gsum mi gnas rak+ta ste// snying po nyid de byang chub sems// mi 'bral dus na lcags kyu ma// gnyis su mi gnas zhags par brjod// de lung ldan
par lcags sgrog ste// bstan pa nyid na dril bu yin// 'di ltar gsal bar rang byung nas// bde ba rgyas par 'gyur ba yin// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mthus// yang dag gsal bar byung ba yin// de
ltar gsal bar su bsgom pa// dag pa'i zhing la gnas pa ste// 'di yang ting 'dzin rim pa yin// gsang ba'i rim pa yang gsungs pa// mgo bo dpal gyi ri bo nyid// dpag bsam shing bu yal ga'i tshul// sgo
brgyad pa thag khug par ltar// ye shes thams cad skyes par byed// sa bon kha ba lta bur gnas// skye gnas snying mgrin lte bar yang// rtsa yi dang ma dar dkar tshul// lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyams dga'
bar// gnyis med ye shes btsal bar bya// lus las ye shes chen po gnas// rtog pa thams cad spong bar bya// rang la gnas shing rang gi bskyed// de bas lus kyis mtshon par byed// gnyis med skye ba'i rgyu

dang rkyen// rnam pa gnyis su shes bya ste// re zhig rgyu la rnam pa gnyis// 'od gsal kun rdzogs byang chub sems// de bzhin rkyen kyang rnam pa gnyis// gzhung dang mthun pa'i gzungs ma dang// rdo rje pad+mar byin
brlabs ldan// rgyu rkyen rnam pa gnyis shes nas// hUM las byang chub sems 'phros te// phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i thugs kar bzhugs// ye shes bdud rtsis blang nas kyang// 'bar 'dzin dang po'i sgor zhugs
te// dkyil 'khor rim gyis bgrod nas kyang// bdag nyid yi dam lhar bskyed bsgom// yum yang 'khor lo rgyas 'debs nyid// gnyis med gsal ba'i thugs ka nas// dal nas dal ba'i 'du byed las// lte

ba'i dkyil du gshegs pa'i tshe// 'dod chags ras la mar khu'i tshul// ba ka ra ta ki tsa ri la// rdo rje sems dpa'i pho brang ni// rjes 'jug snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis// tha ma brlong ba'i bdag nyid de// dal
nas brtag cing ma skyes bsam// ngal bsod dal pa'i rim pa las// kun rdzob nor bu kun da'i tshul// rim gyis 'dres pa'i bde ba las// snyoms par zhugs pa'i pho brang rnams// gang tshe rdo rje
rtse gnas pa// de tshe pad+ma'i sna yi rtse// bzhag pas zhig cing bde bar gnas// mi dmigs pa yi bde ba 'thob// thig le rim gyis 'dres pa las// bshang sgor k+Sha yis sgo bkag ste// rtsa gsum 'dom pa'i

dkyil nyid du// gang tshe kun rdzob don dam gnyis// gzugs dang gzugs kyi tshul gyi gnas// gang tshe la bas bde rnyed pa// de tshe byang sems kun d+ha'i tshul// 'gro 'jug gnas la bzhon pa ste// rdo rje bzlas

par brjod pa nyid// 'byung ba rig po'i tshul las grub// 'jug pa de yi phyed kyi tshad// gnyis kyis gnas pa rnyed pa nyid// gang tshe bzhon pa'i bdag nyid ltar// de tshe kun d+ha'ang de ltar gnas// g.yas kyi rtsa

las 'byung ba nyid// g.yon gyi rtsa la 'jug pa nyid// dbu la gnas pa grub pa nyid// rta dang bzhon pa tha mi dad// snyoms 'jug pho brang gnas pa'i tshe// brjod pa rus sbal lta bu ste// bcu yi tshul las mgo

lus khyab// gtso bo'i dbang du smos pa dang// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa dang// ye shes bskyed pa gsum nyid ni// rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu'i tshul// kun 'dus pa las dmigs med thob// de tshe thog ma tha ma
med// dngos dang dngos po'i spyod yul min// de la dal pa'i bde 'thob pa// de nas dngos med med 'gyur te// zhi ba gcig pu mngon phyogs nas// skad cig dag las bde thob pa// de nas skad cig gnyis

par brlob// de nas gsum par brlab pa ste// thang cig chu tshod thun gcig thob// de nas zhag dang zla bas thob// rtsal dang brtson 'grus ldan pa yis// lhag ma nyid las sangs rgyas thob// lus ma spang bar
sangs rgyas nyid// de las cung zad nyams chung bas// bar ma srid pa dag la thob// la las skye ba gcig la thob// la las gnyis dang bcu tshun chad// las 'phro blangs pa nyid kyis 'grub// ces gsungs

so// rdo rje me lce 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang karma kI la yas// khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badzra kI la ya la 'di skad
ces gsungs to// kye kye dpa' bo thugs rje can// las rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdag/ khams gsum dri ma sel mdzad pa// stong pa'i stobs kyis thams cad 'dul// ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i gang zag
la// rdzas la sogs pa mi 'atsal lam// 'di la nan tan ji ltar bgyi// zhes gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po chen pos/ rdo rje yid kun bzang po la 'di skad ces gsungs
so// dang po las can rnal 'byor pas// ting 'dzin rim par bsgom pa la// rdzas dang yo byad la rten nas// rtogs par bya phyir ngas bshad kyis// las kyi sems dpa' de yang nyon// gang zag
blo yi rim pa yos// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin la// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan gyis// nges pa med par yang dag bshad// re zhig rim pa 'dir shes bya// rang bzhin ting 'dzin byang chub

sems// mtshan ma'i rdzas dang bzhir gsungs so// de la rang bzhin phur pa ni// btsal du med pa'i chos nyid la// bsgom du med pa'i 'bras bu shar// thams cad rang byung bkag pa med// rgyu dang rkyen la mi

ltos shing// spros maid rang byung lhun gyis grub// phur pa zhes ni de la bya// yul du snang ba thams cad ni// dbyings nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang// sems su snang ba thams cad ni// ma bcos rigs pa de nyid
yin// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa nyid// de yi ngang du thams cad 'dus// phur pa zhes ni de la bya// rgyu rkyen gnyis las mya ngan 'das// gdod nas ma bcos ye nas grub// dus gsum dbyer med gcig

par lta// srid pa gsum ni rang gi rkyen// khams gsum spros med dbyings su gcig/ thams cad ye nas dbyer med pas// rang byung skye med dbyings su gcig/ phur pa zhes ni de la bya// de la chos nyid phur pa
ni// chos can gang la mi gnas shing// ma bcos ngang du thams cad 'dus// phur pa zhes ni de la bya// de las sems nyid phur pa ni// skye mchod khams la mi gnas shing// rang byung ngang du thams cad

'dus// phur pa zhes ni de la bya// de la nam mkha'i phur pa ni// khadog dbyibs la mi gnas shing// khyab brdal ngang du thams cad 'dus// phur pa zhes ni de la bya// phur pa byang chub sems kyi rtags// byang
chub sems kyi phur pa yis// srid gsum 'gro ba'i bdar sha bcad// ma btab bzhin du lhun gyis rdzogs// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos rig pas btab// phur pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rtags// gzhan du gdab pa'i
gnas med do// rang rig byang chub sems la gdab// phur pa 'dzin chags mya ngan 'das// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog nyid la gdab// phur pa dngos po kun dang bral// dngos med sems kyi phur pa yis// dngos
po phyin ci log la gdab// phur pa bskye ba med pa'i don// skye med sems kyi phur pa yis// sems la btab pas rig pa shar// dbyings las btab pas lhun gyis grub// gnyis su med par brdal pa'i

ngang// khyab brdal chen po'i phur pa yis// snang srid kun la khyab par gdab/ phur pa chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// pa ni bla ma chen por bstan// phur ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// pa ni rig pa'i ye shes so// phur
ni skye ba med pa'i dbyings// pa ni 'gag pa med pa'i don// gnyis su med par phur pa'i ngang// phur ni thabs kyi rgyal po yin// pa ni shes rab yum gyi don// gnyis su med pas phur pas

bya// de la ting 'dzin phur po ni// snang srid drug cu rtsa gcig bsgom// ye shes chos nyid yon tan bsdu// sku gsung thugs ni rang bzhin 'dus// yab yum gnyis ni rang bzhin gnas// yum yang hUM 'dus ting

'dzin hUM// sems dpa' rtse dbus hUM drangs la// ye shes sna bkag srog rtse brgyad// rang snying rtsa dgu'i nang brgyud de// shangs kyi rlung brom rtse la bton// sor bzhi phar 'phros slar 'dus te// 'dus pas nyi

zla'i dbus zhu dgod// a yi tshul du gnas par bya// hUM ldan oM gyis tshur 'dus pa// srid gum 'gro ba'i rang snang zhing// phyi nang snod bcud de nyid de// sems dang yid dang rnam shes nyid// de nyid las ni
'khrul las brtags// rnam rtog bag chags spangs pa'i phyir// bdag dang phur pa'i gzhal yas khang// byang chub sems ni gsum du bshad// dang po bdag gi byang chub sems// snying kha'i pad+mas a bsam

te// phar 'phros thams cad 'od du 'gyur// a ni mar me'i rtse ltar 'bar// gzung bzla ba'i 'od ltar te// 'dzin pa'i rtse rnams shin tu dmigs// yang yang de la yid kyis bsgom// 'phro bar gyur na spros te
bsgom// bying bar gyur na bzlas pa bya// gzung 'dzin 'gags par shes pa gso// nyi ma'i 'od zer tshul lta bu'o// 'di ni phur pa'i byang chub sems// de nas sems kyi rnam pa ni// a yi tshul gyi rtse lta
bus// 'dzin pa 'gags pas shes pa gsal// a yi rang bzhin 'gags 'gyur te// a tshul mi dmigs nam mkha' bzhin// dngas shing gsal la rnyog pa med// gzugs 'dzin shes kyis 'gags gyur
na// gzhal yas byang chub sems zhes bya// gzhal yas phur pa bdag gi ni// byang chub sems ni rlung bcas pa'i// gnyid log sad pa ji bzhin du// ye shes rang bzhin skur grub pa'i// longs spyod rdzogs

skur gyur ces bya// ye shes rlung ste rlung 'od zer// snang ba 'od kyi dkyil 'khor de// gzhal yas byang chub sems zhes bya// 'od dang thig le yig 'bru dang// longs spyod dang ni sprul sku dang// cir snang ci
srid thams cad kun// nyon mongs 'joms phyir phur pa yin// de phyir ting 'dzin phur pa la// bsam gyis mi kyab mtha' yas mchog/ thams cad brjod par ga la nus// rten gyi dkyil 'khor gcig la

yang// dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs pa dang// sku gsung lhun gyis grub par bstan// de yang ji lta bu'i zhe na// stong nyid sku mchog legs pa'i don/ sangs rgyas kun gyi lus kyi dngos// de phyir sangs rgyas
kun gyi yab// chos kyi sku nyid phur pa yin// ye shes rnam pa mtshan ma'i gzugs// rigs lnga khrag 'thung la sogs pa'i// mtshan dag dpe byad yongs rdzogs pa// longs spyod rdzogs sku phur pa

yin// rgyu drug lam na gnas pa yi// nyon mongs sems kyi rnam pa dang// ngan song thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud bzung nas// 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// de phyir sangs rgyas sku
yi sras// sprul pa'i sku yang phur pa yin// gzhan yang bskyed dang rdzogs pa dang// rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pa la sogs pa// thams cad ting 'dzin phur par gsungs// byang chub sems kyi rim pa ni// bsgom
pa'i thabs las shes pa las// mtshan ma'i rdzas las byas pa min// gnas skabs dag tu gdams pa blang// gsang ba mchog gi thabs dam pas// gnyis med yum gyi mkha' la gdab// gzugs 'dzin rnam
rtog bcom nas ni// gnyis med ye shes don mtshon pas// phur pa zhes ni de la bya// gzhan yang gang zag lam pa yis// mtshan pa'i thabs la brten dgos pas// rnam bzhi las kyi phur pa yis// gser
dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa// spyi las grags pa bzhin du bshad// khyad par bye brag 'di gsungs pa// tsan dan dkar po'i shing du ni// mchog tu zhi ba'i las la shis// dgon pa'i gnas nas skyes pa'i

shing// dkar la 'jam pas gang dang gang// 'di yang zhi ba'i las la shis// gzhan yang byang chub shin bu'am// 'o ma can gyi shig dag gam// mngar dang bcas pa'i shing mchog rnams// 'di yang zhi ba'i las
la shis// dkar bas byang chub sems zhes bya// 'jam pas gnod pa'i sems mi 'byung// dgon pa'i gnas nas skyes pa yin// gnod pa thams cad zhi bar byed// byang chub sems kyis ngag rtsub zhi// tsan
dan dkar pos nad rnams zhi// 'o ma dang bcas dkar po yis// thams cad thams cad zhi bar bstan// gzhan yang rgyas pa'i phur pa ni// rgyal po'i gnas nas skyes pa'i shing// ser po'i rigs rnams gang

yang rung// 'di ni rgyas pa'i las la shis// thams cad thams cad rgyas par 'gyur// skyer pa'i kha dog ser po'i shing// tshe dang longs spyod rgyas par byed// bse shing phur pas rigs rgyas byed// gser shing
byang chub sems rgyas byed// gzhan yang ser po mtha' dag ni// tshe dang longs spyod rgyas par byed// dbang gi phur pa'i rgyu bstan pa// chos mkhan gdug pa'i gnas nas skyes// kha dog mi ldan gang yang
rung// thams cad dbang gi phur ba'i rgyu// 'dis ni thams cad dbang du sdud// tsan dan dmar mo'i phur pa yis// bu mo dbang du bya ba 'grub// mdzo mos blon po dbang du sdud// song shing dmangs rigs
dbang du sdud// zangs la sogs pa'i phur pa yis// rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ba yin// kha dog dmar po mtha' dag gis// gdon rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur// bsad pa drag po'i phur pa

ni// dug shing gdug pa can la bya// las la phan 'dogs yod pas na// de yis ngar skyed mchog tu bsngags// gdug pa sbrul gyi gnas skyes pa// shing mchog tsher ma mi ldan yang// khyad par drag po'i yon tan
'byung// seng ldeng smug nag gdug pa'i shing// dbang drag gnyis la mchog tu bsngags// stag gzig dom gyi gnas dag nas// gang dang skyes pa'i tsher ma can// gsad pa'i las la lhag par myur// khyad par

gsad pa'i rim pa ni// drag cing gtum pa thig gi lcags// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i phur par shis// 'jig cing dral ba sa yi lcags// phrag don 'joms pa'i phur par shis// sra la ngar ldan khro chu ste// nga rgyal
'joms pa'i phur pa shis// mi rta bas pa'i nus pa can// gti mug 'joms pa'i phur par shis// thams cad sdud byed phal pa'i lcags// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i phur par shis// lnga char gcig tu sdom pa

ni// drag po'i phur pa'i rgyu ru shis// gzhan yang khyad par phur pa ni// yan lag 'phel ba'i rgyun bcas phyir// sher shing phur pa'i rgyu ru shes// gdug can nus par ldan pa'i phyir// slos pa'i ru leb rwa las

bya// zhe sdang nus par ldan pa'i phyir// sngags pa nag po'i mchog phur grags// skye ba'i rgyun rnams bcad pa'i phyir// dre tol nag po'i rkang las bya// rang bzhin nus par ldan pa yi// gdug pa'i tsher ma can la

bya// sngon can phu zhing bkra mi shis// khro dgu shi ba'i 'phang la bya// spyi yi rgyu rnams gang yang rung// steng du sor gcig rgya mdud bya// gzhal yas nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyis// 'og min mtshon par byed
pa'o// sked par sor gcig rgya mdud bya// skyed cig gnas pa'i rang bzhin pas// thabs dang shes rab mtshon pa'i brda// rab tu rin chen zur brgyad de// rin chen las grub rtsig pa yis// gzhal yas khang

ni mtshon pa'o// rtse mo 'phrin las so so'i rim// dbyibs dang kha dog so sor bya// dbang drag 'dren pa'i gzugs can ni// rtse mo chu srin kha nas dbyung// chos dbyings rgyu las byung bas na// rtsa ba'i phyogs su

rgya mdud bya// las rnams gang yin 'grub pa'i phyir// rtse mo'i 'phrin las rim du bya// thams cad tshad dang ldan pa ru// shin tu dod cing legs par bya// phyi yi rtags dang nang gi rtags// gsang ba'i rtags dang
bcas par bstan// thams cad gzhung las byung ba bzhin// rdzas rnams 'tshogs nas 'grub ces bya// leg par bsag na chud mi za// legs shing dod na dang ba skye// ngan pas rtogs pa bcas gyur na// bya
ba'i las ni 'grub mi 'gyur// brnyed btsan byas na byin rlobs med// rgyur ma gsungs na bka' dang 'gal// thams cad thams cad gzhung bzhin bya// re zhig 'di la gnas pa ni// mtshan ma
can las gsungs pa ste// ma nor byang chub sems rtogs na// mtshan mar bcas pa las mi dgos// ting 'dzin ma nor drod ldan zhading// byin brlab dbang bskur ma nor la// dam tshig ma nyams gzhung thub

na// rgyu ni gang dngagang yin yang// bde gshegs sa bon bskyed pa 'dra// nges par gnyis med don rtogs cing// mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na// mtshan ma'i rten kyang rnam rtog yin// de bas 'di kun
mtshon pa tsam// yang dag don chen rtogs pa gces// mtshan ma 'joms la zhi ba bzang// log rtog 'joms la 'khro 'dul 'joms// nyon mongs lnga 'dul ye shes bzang// yon tan rgyas pa'i ting 'dzin

deng// de bas blo ldan dam pa yis// kun kyang mtshan nyid rtogs pa gces// thams cad nan tan kho nar bya// gzhan yang rdzas kyi rim pa ni// 'tsho ba zas dang rkyen bzlog sman// bar chad dgra bzlog yo byad

ni// go mdung mda' gzhu la sogs pa// bar cad bzlog ba'i rkyen du bsham// bsgrub pa'i bye brag mchod pa'i rdzas// dbang dang dkyil 'khor tshe bsgrub dang// spre'u gsod dang gdon bsgral dang// bsgrad dang
mnan dang bsreg pa dang// dbab dang 'phags dang gtum la sogs// yo byad brjod kyis mi langs bas// rang rang skabs lam shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje me lce 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen po las/ yo
byad phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas// bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor

bdag// ma bcos 'dod nas lhun gyis grub// sems can don mdzad brgyad pa'i gtso// dpa' bo las rnams gsungs lags na// rnal 'byor dang po'i sa bon yis// dmigs par bya ba'i dngos po la// nyams su blangs nas 'grub pa
la// 'di la dus tshod mi 'tshal lam// de yi rim pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol ba dang// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas/ rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to// bsnyen dang bsgrub dang zor thun bcas// de yi dus tshod ngas bstan gyi// karma he ru nyid kyis nyon// phyi nang gsang ba'i rim pa yi// dus kyi rim pa bsam mi khyab// lo dang zla ba gza' skar
tshes// ga la bzang ba'i dus der 'jug/ yang na rab bzhi dag la// zhi ba rgyas pa bsgrub pa'i dus// 'bring po bzhi'am tshes grangs bzang// slob ma dbang rnams bskur ba'i dus// tha chung bzhi 'am mar
dol// drag po'i las rnams bya ba'i dus// gzhan yang bsgrub pa'i rim pa ni// dbyar zla gsum la zhi ba ste// ston zla gsum la rgyas pa 'grub// dgun zla gsum ni dbang yin te// dpyid zla

gsum la drag po 'grub// 'di ni phyi ma'i rim pa yin// grangs dang mtshan ma rtags gsum pa'o// las su gang rung 'grub pa'i dus// gzhan yang bsgrub pa'i dus tshod ni// phag sbrul ston spyid ra ba la// rta dang

byi ba 'bring po ste// glang lug gnyis ni tha chung la'o// stag sprel dbyar dgun ra ba la// bya yos gnyis ni 'bring po la'o// khyi phag thang chu dag la 'grub// de ni le gshed zla ba'i rgyags// khyad par nyi ma'i

gshed gnyis ni// dbyar ldung 'jug dang dgun ldung 'jug/ 'di ni khyad par gsad pa yi// rab bzhi la bcu bzhi shis// 'bring po bzhi la bco lnga ste// tha chung bzhi la bcu drug go/ gzhan yang brdeg pa'i dus

tshod ni// dpyid zla gsum la brdeg pa ni// nyi shu gnyis dang bcu drug dang// bcu bzhi rnams la brdeg pa yin// shar dang shar lho la sogs blta// dbyar zla gsum la brdeg pa'i dus// brgyad dang bco lnga

dus drug tu// nub byang byang shar la sogs par// kha bltas brdeg par bya ba yin// ston zla gsum la brdeg pa ni// nyi shu bco brgyad nya gsum la// byang shar byang dang nub dag tu// kha bltas brdeg par bya ba
yin// dgun zla gsum la brdeg pa'i dus// bcu gsum bcu dang thams cad la// byang dang lho dang rang thad bltas// brdeg pa bya bar las la sbyar// de'ang nyi shu bdun nas mar// srog bsdud chen po'i las
byed pas// nyi shu dgu 'am gnam stong la// brdeg pa'i dus la bab ba yin// gzhan yang srog bsdud bshad bya ba// lha srin 'khor dang bcas pa ni// gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa dang// gnod sbyin
'khor dang bcas pa dang// lha chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang// sgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang// 'jig rten ma mo 'khor bcas dang// phung byed gdug pa thams cad dang// klu chen brgyad po thams cad
dang// gza' chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang// ma bdud mi rkun 'khor bcas dang// brtan ma bcu gnyis 'khor bcas dang// bdud mo nag mo mi bzad rnams// de rnams srog bdud yin pas na// dus
der brdeg dang bsad dang mnan// las la phan 'dogs yod par bshad// dus min nor na ldog pa'i dus// dpyid zla gsum la bzlog pa'i dus// bcu bdun bcu dgu pa dang ni// nyer gcig nyi shu brgyad pa
dag// gan ma stong dag la btab gyur na// sa bdag chen po rab brgyus pas// rnal 'byor dam pa nyid brlag 'gyur// dbyar zla gsum la ldog pa'i dus// bcu gcig drug dang nyi shu lnga// brdeg par mi bya
bdag nyid brlag/ ston zla gsum la ldog pa'i dus// nyi shu lnga dang gsum dang gnyis// ting ting ma rtse 'khor bcas nyul// dus der mi gdab ldog pa'i dus// dgun zla gsum la ldog pa'i

dus// nyi shu bdun dang nyi shu dang// bco brgyad dag la ldog pa'i dus// drag po chen po gdong drug rgyu// 'di dus drag po'i las byas na// rnal 'byor tshe thung ya khas 'phogs// 'khor yang phung la yo byad

'bri// phyugs dang nor stong dbul por 'gyur// smyo 'bog 'on dig lkugs pa dang// zha grub dbang po ma tshang dang// nad dang lhog 'bras sna tshogs 'ong// lhung nad 'thibs dang gtum pa yi// rgyu gzer mdze
nad 'byung 'gyur bas// rnal 'byor dam pas rab brtags la// thams cad nan tan kho nar bya// tshes grangs zla bar bstun pa ni// bsad pa'i las la shis pa ste// dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes bdun la// 'bring po

bcu bdun dag la ste// tha chung nyi shu bdun la shis// dbyar zla ra ba'i brgyad la shis// 'bring po bco brgyad dag la shis// tha chung nyi shu brgyad la shis// ston zlar ba'i tshes dgu la// 'bring po bcu dgu dag
la shis// tha chung nyi shu dgu la shis// dgun zla ra ba tshes bcu la// 'bring po nyi shu dag la shis// tha chung la ni gnam stong ngo// rnal 'byor dam pas rab brtags la// bzabs la las 'di bya ba
yin// gzhan yang gza' yi dus tshod ni// mig dmar phur bu gza' lag gsum// dar ba'i dus su dus la bab// gza' skar gnyis kyi mthun sbyor ni// rim pa cung zad yang smos pa// nyi ma sogs pa chu smad
'khrod// mig dmar khrum dang nam grum 'phrod// gza' lhag mon gre smin drug 'phrod// phur pa nam so rgyal la 'jebs// pa wa sangs ni mon gru dang// bre la 'phrod de gong ma bzhin// spen pa la ni sa ga

ste// 'di rnams gza' ste phyi yi dus// phan par bya ba'i las la shis// mi mthun bdud kyi nyi ma shis// mi mthun bdud kyi nyi ma ni// nyi ma lha mtshams bra nye gsum// zla ba rgyal dang chu smad gsum// mig dmar

gre dang sgrog 'phrad bdud// gza' lhag tha skar nyid la 'jig/ phur pa mgo ru phrad na 'jig/ pa wa sangs ni nam gru dang// skag dang phrad na 'jig par 'gyur// spen pa nye bzhi skag la 'jig/ 'di ni nang gi

rim pa ste// khyad par bsad pa'i las la shis// gzhan yang mi 'phrod rim pa ni// nyi ma khru?ms smad mi 'phrod do// zla bas gar mi 'phrod do// mig dmar lag tu mi 'phrod do// gza' lhag snron du mi 'phrod

do// phur pa mon gre mi 'phrod do// pa wa sangs dang chu smad du// mi 'phrod de ltar bdun rnams ni// phan bya'i las la mi bsngags so// gzhan yang 'jig par bstan pa ni// nyi ma dang ni sa ga 'jig/ zla ba dang
ni snar mar 'jig/ mig dmar mon gre phrad na 'jig/ gza' lag mon grur 'jig par bshad/ phur pa la yang snar mar 'jig/ pa wa sangs las mon grus 'jig/ spen pa la ni bzhis me
bzhis 'jig/ mi 'phrod pa dang 'jig pa dang// bdud kyi nyi ma gsang bar shis// gzhan yang skar ma gsum 'char te// rab bzhi ni mchu la gcod// 'bring po bzhi ni bre la gcod// tha chung bzhi ni sbol

gcod// zla gcig zhag ni sum cu la// tshes bzhi brgyad dang bcu gcig dang// bco lnga bco brgyad nyi shu gnyis/ nyi shu lnga dang nyi shu dgu/ tshes grangs dus tshod brgyad po la// 'jug dag 'byung ba shes pa

gces// lo chen dag dang brtsi ba ni// sa yi khams ni dpyid zla gsum// shing ni dbyar zla me ni ston// dgun ni lcags khams bsad pa'i dus// gzhan yang blo tshe 'khyams pa'i dus// sha ba'i bla ni srod la

rgyu// lug dang gnyen ni gung la ste// phag ni tho rang nyi tshe bya// nyin gung rta dang nyi shu nub// g.yag dang glang ni srod la rgyu// de dus bsad pa'i las la shis// bsgrub pa dang ni zla ba dang// dus tshod dag gis

gsod par byed// skag ni gshed po glang lug gnyis// lo dgra bya dang sprel yin te// zla ba dbyar dgun tha chung gnyis// dus tshod nam phyed yol// gsod par 'gyur te snga ma bzhin// khyi 'brug bya yi gshed

pos te// phag dang byi ba'i lo dgra nyid// zla gshed ston gyi tha chung ste// dus ni srod dang tho rangs so// gung la khyi 'brug shing khams pa// lo dgra stag dang yos bu nyid// zla gshed ston dpyid ra ba ste// dus ni

phyed dang phyed dus so// 'u la glag lug sa khams pa// lo dgra rta sbrul rnam pa gnyis// zla ba dbyar dgun ra ba gnyis// dus tshod mtshan mo rangs pa ste// mi mthun rdzas kyis 'joms gyur na// sngags kyi sbyor
ba smos ci dgos// nyi ma dros pa myos pa'i dus// nyin gung btsan la nam gung bdud// nyi ma nub ka srin po'i dus// 'di yang thun dang gdab pa'i dus// gzhan yang dus kyi rim pa ni// dang por ting 'dzin
tshul gnas bya// bar du bde gshegs ku bskyed bstim// tha ma sras bskyed bzlas pa bya// bla yi shing bcad bla rdo bcag/ bla mtsho bskams dang me bsad dang// mkhar gyi sgo bcag nyi zla nub// srog chags
bsad nas ko ba nyid// 'di byung bsgrub pa'i las la 'jug/ bya nag tshogs rnams mthong ba dang// gong dang mtshon cha bsham pa dang// dmag 'dren chu nag brug pa dang// rngon dang ri dgas shor ba

dang// gnas su ltas na bya rnams 'khor// srog chags de dang 'tsheg pa nang// ltas na dag gi sgra grags na// sgrub pa chen po'i las dag brtsam// gzhan yang rtags kyi rim pa ni// rab kyis mngon du khugs
par 'gyur// 'bring gis ling ga 'gul bar 'gyur// tha mas nyams sam rtags 'ong ste// 'bar dang 'phrog dang 'tshogs pa dang// 'od dang nyams pa rmi lam dang// 'od dang du ba la sogs

pa// rim pa dus tshod bzung zhing sbyar// gzhan yang khyad par dag gis ltas// zhib can dag dang mon pa dang// dge bshes dag tu 'ong ba dang// sha ba gla ba la sogs dang// btsan po ba glang sbrul rnams

dang// spre'u bya rgod 'brug thog glog/ mi rang khyi khrid 'od 'ong zhing// khra sbyang dag gis srog chags 'ded// 'di de dus la bab pa yin// bud med gcer bur byung ba dang// g.yag dang spyang khu dngos su

'ongs// mi rings mtshon cha khur dang nyo// zor la rlang dang sgra rnams 'byung// 'di de las kyi sbyor ka bya// gzhan yang tshub ma bu yug dang// kha char bud med cho ngas 'debs// skyes pa mang po na ba dang// byis
pa gcer bus 'debs pa dang// nam mkha' sngon por mthong ba dang// glog dang 'od la mdog med dang// rang gi mdog nyams skad mdangs 'chag/ 'di byung dam tshig gso ba'i dus// rgya mtsho dag la gru

brgal dang// rdzing mnan me tog shing rtsi lnga// khrag dang sgyu ma'i longs spyod dang// gdab chad dang grog po byung// nyi ma thang la lhung ba dang// nam mkha' ral dang rgya mtsho lud// snang srid mun nag me chen
'bar// 'di dus las kyi mtha' la gzud// gzhan yang las kyi rim pa yi// bsam mi khyab pas ston par gsungs/ sngags dang ting 'dzin deng ldang zhing// rtogs dang man ngang ldan gyur na// rnal 'byor dus
la nges pa med// ces gsungs so// rdo rje me lce 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen po las// bsnyen bsgrub la sogs ba'i dus rim par phye ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang kar ma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das
khrag 'thung chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan rnam par dag/ don dam ngo bo ma bcos sku// e ma bcom ldan sngags kyi bdag/ gsang chen gsang ba'i bdag nyid can// 'di bsgrub pa yi

gang zag la// bskyed dang spyan drang byin brlabs dang// bsgrub dang bsad dang thun dang zor// bsreg dang btab dang mnan dang bsrung// zhi rgyas la sogs 'phrin las la// gsang ba'i drag sngags mi 'tshal

lam// bod rbad bsad pa la sogs pa// sngags rnams ji ltar shes par bgyi// zhes gsol pa dang/ khrag 'thung badzra kI la yas/ rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po la 'di skad cesabaka' stsal to// gang zag dang po

sa pa yis// yang dag don rtogs 'dod pa dang// las kyi bya ba rdzogs bya'i phyir// phyi nang bsnyen bsgrub rim pa dang// zab mo'i sngags rnams ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ dag po'i yi ge thams
cad ni// ming med brjod pa rnams dang bral// tshig dang sgra yi spyod yul men// dmigs med gdod nas dag pa ste// sems can las dang smon lam dang// thugs rje'i byin brlabs stobs dag

gis// de yi dbang gis 'di gsal 'byung// a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ ta tha da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ral wa/ sha Sha sa hak+Sha/
de ni thog ma'i yi ge ste// sngags rnams 'byung ba'i sa bon yin// nga dang bdag tu gdags pa'i dbang// 'khor ba'i gzugs su btags pa las// de lus yi ge a la rten// a las yi ge sde dang

bcas/ thabs dang shes rab yi ge byung// de la yi ge'i tshogs zhes bya// yi ge'i tshogs la sde tshan dgu/ sgra yi yi ges yongs la brgyan// de ni ming gi tshogs zhes bya// A li la sogs sde tshan gyis// kA li

sogs pa'i sde la brgyan// de ni tshig gi tshogags zhes bya// de la sngags kyi tshogs rnams 'byung// oM badzra kI li kI la sarba big+han baM hUM phaT/ tip+ta tsa tsakra ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM/ oM badzra krod+ha

ma ha ba la hUM/ oM badzra krod+ha ni la daN+Da hUM/ oM badzra krod+ha ya man+ta ka hUM/ oM badzra krod+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU phaT/ oM badzra krod+ha ha ya gr-i hUM phaT/ oM badzra krod+ha a pa ra dzi ta hUM/ oM badzra krod+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ oM badzra krod+ha trai

lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ oM badzra krod+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hi la k+Shi ya bya hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hi lA se ki hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+hi ta tri bya ta hUM// oM badzra kro d+hi ta na pa ti hUM// oM badzra kro d+hi mu ha la hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hi dza ya ti hUM/ oM

badzra kro d+hi k+Sha ya bya ti hU/ oM badzra krod+hi ta ba ya be hUM/ oMbadzra d+hi stir ma ni hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hi tsun d+he mu ne hUM/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ aM aM aM/ oM oM oM/ oM e h+ya hi b+ha ga ban/ ma hA ka ru ni ka tri

sha ho/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stoM/ dza hUM baM ho/ tad+ya thA rak+Sha ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me hUM/ tad+ya thA rak+Sha ru ru ro ru a ga shug me hUM/ tad+ya thA rak+Sha ru ru ro ru ba to sihUM/ tad+ya thA rak+Sha ru ru ro ru ba sto sta hUM/ dza ya du hUM/

man+ti hUM/ sha ri hUM/ ni la pu ti hUM/ su tri ba ra hUM/ yo gi sho ri hU~M/ bar tsi ta hUM/ ya ma tsit+ta hUM/ oM laM hUM laM staM ba nan/ mo hag ya/ b+ha ga ban shri kri bi kri/ badzra hUM ka ra hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ badzra kI la kI la ya/

dza hUM baM ho/ sarba big+nan/ badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ badzra hUM kA ra hUM phaT/ badzra hUM ka ra hUM phaT/ badzra hUM kA ra hUM a/ hUM pa ra byi Ta tan hUM phaT/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ gr-i Na gr-i Na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na

hUM phaT/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ ta tha ya ta tha ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ya ha ta na hU~M/ shri krin a na ya hUM phaT// dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ a be sha ya a be sha ya hUM phaT/ b+hin+d+ha ya b+hin+d+ha ya hUM phaT/ ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da

ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ ka ta ka te ya/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a dzi Ti te a pa dzi ti ya/ ma ra s+ya na pra mar ta na ya hUM/ hUM hUM ma ma ba shiM ku

ru/ ma taM nya ka ra/ i na Na di ti/ ma ma karma shri traM ka re ya/ sarba a na ya hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA ya tang tha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra yak+sha krod+ha kha hi kha hi ha ha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM oM badzra kI li kI la ya kha thaM kha thaM kha thaM hUM hUM hUM

phaT phaT phaT/ raM dz+wa la sa ran hUM phaT/ oM badzra su me truM hUM swa ma staM/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ ri shu ni ta ki tsa ti bi tsa ti hu ya hu ya hUM phaT/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ku lan bi sho ta ya b+hi ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra sa

to rwa dza hUM/ oM ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hUM/ oM phaT mi ri kun+d+ha li/ thams thums rbad/ khrag ti sma ra ya phaT/ rdul phran nyur thums rbad/ khyi khrid ra khrid rol khrag 'thung kang kang/ keng keng kang kang ya/ tang par la to sha la

kyi spyang hi ti phaT/ shag shag rgyob rgyob ya ya/ oM tri ni bag mar thun/ pa la hri yak+Sha ni gar lan par man/ phra ma ri hi li dza dza/ haM ma hA ka li haM phaT dza/ spar sha tri tri hUM yak+Sha ya phaT/ oM hi li rak+sha tri sha ku ru hUM/
