tri sha ku ru hUM/ ba ri sad nya/ tristaM sha ba ri hUM/ karti pa ra ya traM/ ya ma hri d+hidun hUM ka ra la bi sha hUM/ badzra sa d+hu hUM/ oM tri tri pu ka hi/ badzra sa tir ya ma ra du na tha/ oM tha pa ri rba na hUM/ i paM b+h+yo/ te paM b+h+yo/ e paMb+h+yo/

he pa b+h+yo/ sin tsa na ra ra b+h+yo/ ma karma sha ri b+h+yo/ nr-i T+r-i N+r-i T+r-i baM shan ku ru ti pa sha hUM/ hri phi kam/ kha tr-i/ shaMtr-i/ khaM hra thang/ thi badzra badzra pu hUM/ ha ha ha ha/ kraM laM traM/ d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri/ d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri/ d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri

d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ oM badzra sa ma yo gi ni pra ti dza hUM hUM/ oM ro ru pa ti sta sa ma ya hUM b+h+yo hUM/ e a ra li ki la baM ho/ kha kha dur ti ma tung nga/ ru lu ru lu hUM

hUM b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ku ma da r-i/ shu la ri/ tsa mun d+hi da ri/ kang rka da ri/ kha raM yo gi ni khA hi sa ma ya a mr-i tA argaM pra tri dza khA hi/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya badzra karma gro d+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya che ge mo la

ba shaM ku ru swAhA/ puSh+tiM ku ru/ shan+ti ng+ku ru/ sum+b+ha ni ku ru mi swA hA// gardza gardza hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT// da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ hUM lu hUM lu hUM phaT/ tiSh+ta tiSh+ta hUM phaT/ tshin+d+ha tshi n+d+ha hUM

phaT/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+haphaT/ phoT phoTahUM phaT/ gzhan yang bsgrub pa so so yi// sngags kyi rim pa brjod mi lang// gnas skabs dang dag las shes par bya'o// de 'dra'i gdams pa yod pa'i mis// gdug pa'i sngags
ni rab tu 'jug/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje me lce 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen po las/ snying po sngags kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang badzra kI la yas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la
'di skad ces gsol to// 'di bsgrub pa yi gang zag la// rang rang rtags kyi phyag rgya yis// las rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang// de yi yon tan ji ltar lags// 'di skad gsol ba gsan nas
kyang// khrag 'thung chen pos bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor las la bsgrub la// phyag rgya sbyor ba shin tu gces// ngas bshad gus pas yid kyis nyon// gzugs brnyan las kyi dkyil 'khor du// bsnyen pa yongs

su rdzogs pa dang// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i blo can gyis// khros pa'i sems su rab gnas te// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga 'phyar// g.yon pa rdo rje phur pa 'debs pa'i tshul// zhabs gnyis bgrad de gsang sngags
bzlas// khrag 'thung rgyal po'i phyag rgya yis// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas la sogs kun// brgyal bar 'dod na brgyad bar byed// 'chi bar 'dod na 'chi bar byed// khams
gsum pa rnams smos ci dgos// yum gyi mtshan ma de bzung nas// g.yas nas dril bu bsnams te 'khyud// g.yon na dung khrag stobs pa'i tshul// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas mnyes nas
dbang du sdud// khams gsum pa rnams smos ci dgos// rkang gnyis mthil sprad thur du btsug/ g.yas pa sta re sdebs pa'i tshul// g.yon pa phur pa 'debs pa'i tshul// bcu thabs zur gyis mnan cing

blta// 'di ni sras mchog chen po'i rgya// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang 'ching 'gyur na// khams gsum skye bo smos ci dgos// lag gnyis thal sbyar gyen du bsgreng// rkang pa mthil
sbyar thur du btsugs// 'gying zhing rol pas gar byed pa// hUM kar yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'gugs 'gyur na// rgyal po'am bu mo la sogs kun// khri'am

brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// 'gugs par 'gyur te tha tshom med// g.yon pa khro mdzub snying khar sbyar// g.yas pa lcags kyu ltar byas nas// spyan bzlog g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum la// rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag

rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di btab na// rlung chen chu chen 'brug la sogs// gang yang bzlog par gdon mi za// g.yon pa khro mdzub snying khar bsgreng// g.yas pa be chon brdeg pa'i tshul// g.yon brkyang
tshul gyis gnas pa ni// dbyug pa sngon po'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rdo rje'i brag kyang 'joms par nus// bsad pa'i las la lhag par 'jebs// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa

las// gung mo gnyis ni rtse mo sprad// rdo rje rtse gcig tshul du byas// mdzub mo rgyab kyi phyogs su dkri// mthe bong gzhibs te mdun du gzhag/ kha yi tshul du byas pa dang// gshin rje zhabs gnyis langs nas
bkug/ gshin rje gshed po'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dgug par rang dbang med par 'ong// gsod pa'i las la lhag par 'jebs// dbye dang 'thab la the tshom
med// bskrad pas 'jig rten gzhan du 'gro/ lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong gis// srin lag mthe chung sen mo bsnan// gung mo mdzub mo gzhibs te brkyang// ral gri shugs nas 'byin pa'i tshul// g.yas pa

brkyang pa g.yon pa bskum// mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// lha klu gnod sbyin ma mo rnams// gang bsgom las rnams bran bzhin byed// log 'dren tshogs rnams skrod 'dod

na// srin lag rtse la ri lu dag/ bstan pa tsam gyis 'phros par 'gyur// lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings// mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sprel// mdzub mo gzhibs te bsgreng ba la// lan gsum g.yas nas mgo

la bskor// dpral ba'i steng du gzhag par bya// g.yas pa'i rkang pa sgyid khung bskum// g.yon pa rkang mthil btsug pa ni// rdo rje rta yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dug gis zin pa 'joms

par byed// ser ba la sogs bzlog pa dang// 'jigs pa kun las thar par byed// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las// rgyab sprad mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud// mdzub mo rtse sprad zhags pa'i tshul// rkang pa g.yas
pa'i sor mo gzugs// g.yon pa drang por byas pa ni// gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bde gshegs sras dang bcas pa rnams// las la bskul zhing gdan la
'bebs// gdon rnams thams cad gzir bar byed// ma rungs pa rnams gnon par nus// lag pa gnyis kyi the bong gis// mthe chung gnyis kyi sen mo mnan// lhag ma gsum ni sgreng nas ni// so sor dpung

mgor bsgreng ba ni// rka pa drang por mgo gang bar// pus mo bag tsam bskum pa na// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems
can don dngas las bskul// gdug tshogs bskyed dang bgegs chen 'byer// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las// mdzub gnyis bsgreng ste mkhrig ma bsnol// rkang pa g.yas g.yon bgrad byas pa// khams
gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas gdan las 'gre/ gdug pa log pa smos ci dgos// g.yon pa khu tshur snying khar gzhag/ g.yas pa sta gri phyar nas

brdeg/ g.yas brkyang g.yon pa cung zad bskum// stobs po che yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// than pa byung na char 'bebs shing// char ches na yang gcod par byed// rgyal ba'i las la yud
kyis chog/ las rnams skad cig gcig gis 'grub// khro mo'i mtshan ma bzung nas ni// g.yas 'khyud g.yon du gtso la stob// khro mo rnams kyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya bcings byas
la// las rnams thams cad thogs med 'gyur// gzhan yang las rnams so so yi// phyag rgya'i rim pa bshad bya ba// lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas ni// rgyab spras mthe chung gnyis la 'khyud// mdzub gnyis

rgyab sprad bsgreng byas la// lag pa lcags kyu ltar byas la// 'gugs shing 'dren pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis ni thal mo sbyar// gung mo rtse sprad mthe chung brkyang// mdzub srin gnyis ni rgyab tu
bsnol// mthe bong gzhibs la drag tu dril// 'di ni phur ba pa dril ba'i rgya// mtheb mdzub bar du phur pa bzung// gyen du gsor la las bskul// 'di ni phur pa gsor ba'i rgya// sor mo rnams ni sbrel la
bsdam// tshigs ni zur tsam nang du dgug/ mthe bong gnyis kyang gzhibs byas la// mdun rgyab byas pa'i phyag rgya yin// sor mornams ni rgyab tu bsnol// kun kyang brkyang ste kha spub la// gzugs la dbab

pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa mdzub bsgreng khu tshur bcangs// sku ru bzhag la rkang pas bgra da/ lag g.yas pa zhags pa 'phen// g.yon pa phur pa 'debs pa la// g.yas kyi rdo rje tho bas ba sdigs// 'di ni
phur pa gdab pa'i rgya// lag g.yon khu tshur bcangs pa las// mdzub mos lcags kyu snying kar bzung/ g.yas pa'-i ral gris dum bur gtub// gzugs phung bshig pa'-i phyag rgya yis// sor mo rnams ni bsnol

te bsdam// gung mo bzhi ba la phur pa bzung// tshe lung chen po'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs pa la// g.yas pa de bzhin steng du bzhag/ spyi yi steng du bzhag pa ni// stan du bsrung ba'i phyag rgya

yin// rkang pa g.yon pas snying khar mnan// g.yas pa bgrad pa'i sdang mig lta// lag gnyis mche ba'i tshul du bya// kI la ya yi sngags rjes la// mA ra ya dang bra be sha// phaT ces khong dral bcud ston

pa// bcings pa'i lcags sgrog dgrol ba'i rgya// gong ma'i phyag rgya de nyid la// gyen du gsor ba'i tshul byed pa// 'di ni zhal du btab rgyal ba'i// lag g.yon ban+d+ha thogs pa'i tshul// g.yas kyi mtheb mdzub
gnyis po yis// bsdus kyin ri lur 'bul byed pa// 'di ni sbyin sreg las kyi rgya/ lag gnyis snyim pa 'dzed pa las/ bcus nas 'thor ba'i tshul byed pa/ 'di ni zor du 'phang ba'i rgya/ g.yas g.yon thal mo

sbyar ba las// mthe bong gnyis ni gyen du bsgreng/ mthe'u chung thur du brkyang byas te// gung mo thad kar srin lag dag/ rdo rje'i rgya gram tshul du byas// 'di ni mnan pa las kyi rgya// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang pa
la// g.yas pa steng du pad+ma'i tshul// 'di ni gtor ma bsngo ba'i rgya// de las sogs pa'i las rnams dang// ma mo las mkhan la sogs pa// bsam gyis mi khyab phyag rgya rnams// gzhan las

grags pa bzhin du byas// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje me lce 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen po las/ phyag rgya rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba
mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma dpa' bo mthu brnyes pa'i// mkha' 'dra sngags kyi ngo bo nyid// las kun yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdag/ 'di ni nyams su len pa'i mis// bsgrub pa'i rim
pa ji ltar bgyi// de ni rnam grangs du zhig mchis// kI la ya yis bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos thams cad rdzogs longs spyod pa'i bdag nyid
de// ut+pal cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags brkyang ste// the tshom yongs su bcom pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rjes su 'jug pa'i gang zag dang// bsnyen pa las su rung ba'i mis// bsgrub

pa'i thabs rnams rtogs pa gces// bsgrub pa sbyi dang bye brag gnyis// gang yin ngo yis zin par byas// rtsa ba bsgrub dang yan lag bsgrub// khyad par nyid lag la sogs rnams// bye brag yongs su shes par

bya// dang po phyi nang gsang ba gsum// de yang rim pa 'di shes bya// bsgrub pa'i yan lag sum cu drug/ nges don thabs kyis 'khrul pa drang// lha dbral gnas nas dgug pa dang/ dbab cing byad dang smyo ru

gzhug/ nges par bsgral dang zhal du btab// drag po'i 'phrin las nub bdun btud// re re la'ang sngags dang mchod// pho nya rdzas dang ting nge 'dzin// dmod mo gzhag pa drug tu 'gyur// dam tshig chen po'i
dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sho na mu ka'i dus la bab// bdag nyid chen po'i dus la bab// sa bdag chen mo'i dus la
bab// mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rtogs shing grogs dang bral bar gyis// phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// zung

zhig chings shig rnam par sdom// rings par khug la smrar chu gcig/ lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// nga yi dbang du gyur nas ni// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par

gyis// de dag rim pa ji lta bar// smyol thang phrom 'da' du+u ra// dbab pa yungs kar 'dre gsod yin// byad du gzhug pa tshon sna lnga// dbral brgya tshil gu gul shis// brdung ba phur pa tho ba ste// stob pa ho ma
gzar yis bya// de dag ting 'dzin smod mo yang// skabs kyi rim pa shes par gyis// 'di ni zhi dang rgyas pa dang// dbang dang mngon spyod la sogs pa// las thams cad la shes pa ste// dam pa'i

ngang dang ldan pa yis// skabs kyi rim pa 'dir shes bya// gzhan yang rim pa'i 'khor lo ni// thabs kyi rim pa bzhi ru gsungs// dang la 'khor lo phyi ma ni// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad 'khor lo la// yi ge gnyis dang
ldan par bya// de 'og dgug pa'i 'khor lo ni// nyi shu rak+ta ni ma pa'o// 'khor lo sngags kyi rgyu ru gsungs// yi ge bcu gcig rnam par ldan// 'od zer spros pas de bkug bstim// de ni dgug pa'i 'khor

lo'o// bkug nas bsad pa'i rim pa ni// rtsibs brgyad pa yi 'khor lo la// ske tshe thar ni bong nga gnag/ spyang tsher ldong ros re lcag pa// spyang dug kyi lce me reg khrag/ de ni gnyis ka rgyu ru gsungs// yi ge
bcu bdun g.yon nas bskor// rnam snang thugs gnyis yang gsum brkyang// lhag ma zung du gnas pa'o// de las 'od 'phros dmigs pa bsgral// gnyis sdom drag po'i 'khor lo ni// bsad pa'i 'khor lo
rtsibs mchan la// hUM phaT mi ldan brgyad du gsungs// de rgyu gong ma dag dang 'thun// gzhan yang ma thub spogs pa'i thabs// 'khor lo'i rim pa yang gsungs pa// dgug pa'i 'khor lo gdab brgyad la// yi

ge nang du mgo bstan te// rgyu yang de bzhin gong ma ste// ma grub spogs pa'i 'khor lo yin// dang po bsnyen bsgrub las rung nas// drag po'i las la sbyor 'dod pas/ dur khrod dag gam shing drug dang// klu yi
gnas sam 'byung po'i srang// mar gyi brgyad nas gnam stong du// dang po sgo bzhi bden pa bdar// de nas las mkhan gtor ma gtang// bsgo ba'i las gnyer gtad pa dang// bdag nyid lus kyang gcer

bur bya/ skra yang spyi bor bcing bya ste// lus la thal ba chen po byug/ rang gi gdong yang rgya sol dang// rang byung me tog dag gis mdzes// kha yang lho phyogs dag tu blta// gnyis sdom 'khor lo bri bar bya// de

dus lha yi nga rgyal dang// gsang ba'i snying por ldan par bya// bris nas yi ge dgug bstim dang// mchod pa dbul ba rdzogs par bya// bstod dang 'phrin las drag por ro// grub pa'i nyi ma tha ma la// bcu gnyis
rdzas dang gzugs byas te// bsgral ba'i zhing btsu zhe gcad cing// dgug cing btab ba drag po bya// drag po'i lto bar de bcug la// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i zhal du brdzang// gdon mi za ba'i las la
'jug/ grub pa'i rtags dag byung ba dang// gsal ba gsum gyi las la 'jug/ de yi rim pa de shes bya// yan lag so sor bsgrub 'dod na// rim pa'i 'di ltar shes par bya// phun sum tshogs pa'i slob
dpon gyis// gzhung las 'byung ba'i gnas dag tu// dgos pa'i yo byad rab bsogs la// rang rang las la 'jug pa ni// rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// mthing nag gru gsum rgyan dang

chas// 'khor lo'i rgyan dang nyi zla'i gdan// drag po'i gdan rnams ji lta bar// bskyed nas rdzogs pa'i mthar thug bya// byin gyis brlob cing dbang yang bskur// ji ltar gsal ba'i rim shes nas// khri phrag
gsum mam ci rigs par// rtags gsum drod tshad thob pa'i mis// las gnyis brtsams pa'i dus la bab// rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba'i lte ba la// rlung gi snying po de nyid bskyed// ye shes dgug bstim mchod pa

dbul// ba ya be yi snying po bzlas// so ma btab pa'i ga'u ru// sngon dmar zhags pas rgya gram bcings// steng du nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor bcas// de steng hUM las rdo rjer gyur// de dbus me dpung 'bar ba'i

dbus// mgon po phyag na rdo rje nyid// gsal bas rlung lha rab gzir bas// rlung gi sbyor ba rgyun chad 'gyur// drag po'i rgyun las bya ba'i shing// skur bskyed byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// bzlas pa nyi khri

bdun 'bum lam// bye ba sa yar bskyal nas ni// 'od zer 'phro 'du sbyor ba yi// rtags dang mtshan ma byung ba dang// sobargyad brjen pa'i ling ga bya// g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis mnan byas la// phur pa'i sbyor ba
byas pa yis// lha la sogs pa smos ci dgos// chu la btab na gyen la bzlog/ shwa la btab na 'gyur bar nges// rlung la btab nas rgyun chad 'gyur// gshin rje gshed po'i dkyil 'khor ni// mthing nag
'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// zur la be chon dag gis mtshan// dmigs par bya ba'i gzugs dag ni// g.yo ba dag la gzugs byas la// gdug pa'i rdzas kyis de la byug/ mtshan chen dag gis rab spras
la// gzugs ni sor bzhi'i tshad du bya// ma rungs rdzas kyis de la byug/ dmigs pa'i gnas su gan rkyal gzhag/ de yi snying khar bdag po'i sku// cho ga gsum gyi sbyor bas bskyed// byin gyis brlab cing
dbang bskur la// ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug gzhug dang// mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya// bzlas pa'i sbyor ba rab 'bad de// skabs su thun gyi sbyor ba bya// de ltar las su rung ba dang// bsad pa'i

sbyor ba rdzogs par bya// thang cig yud la de brlag 'gyur// gal te dbye bar 'dod pa na// dur khrod dag gi ras ma la// gong gi rdzas kyis 'thab par bya// tshil chen dag gi dud pas ni// pad+ma ban+d+ha'i snod du

bsag/ gu gul chu dang rab sbyar ram// pad+ma'i rak+ta dag dang sdar// rnga mo bong bu dag gis gzugs// dur khrod rkang gi smyug gis bris// shin tu 'thab cing mi mdza' gzugs// byas la gsang sngags 'bum du
bzlas// rtsig pa'i rmang ngam them pa'i 'og/ sbas te gsang sngags brgyar bzlas na// gang 'dod las ni gdon mi za// gal te gnad nas bskrad 'dod na// sa la ma lhung shing lo la// gab pa'i
'khor lo rdzogs par bri// rlung gi steng du rnga mo gzhag/ dmigs pa'i dngos po de bskyon la// bzlas thim gong gi sar sbas na// gang 'dod gnas de nges par 'pho// gal te dgug pa'i las byed na// las la
sbyor ba snga ma bzhin// byas te rlung gi lcags kyus dgug/ thang cig yud la the tshom med// rta mgrin rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum dmar nag dkyil 'khor du// zla gam gsum gyis mtha' bskor
te// ri rab bum pa gsum bkod la// phyi rim pad+mas mdzes par bya// dbus su chu bdag bsam par bya// steng du sngags kyi bdag po bskyed// cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa dang// mdun du las kyi sems dpa'
bskyed// bzlas pa khri phrag bdun du bya// de nas las la sbyor 'dod na// mi rtag pa las gzugs byas te// me reg khrag gis sbyangs pa'i gzugs// sor brgyad tshad la 'dod par bya// ltos 'gro dag gi khar

bcug la// yongs su smin pa'i las dag bya// de nas las rnams rdzogs pa dang// sangs rgyas nyid kyang gdan la 'dre// dug gi sbyor ba bzlog pa na// rin chen rgyu las byung ba yi// bum pa bdud rtsis dgang

byas la// nang du gdan dang yig 'bru bsam// gzhung dang bkol ba'i ting 'dzin bya// 'dab brgyad steng du dmigs la gzhag/ dang por pho brang so sor gtug/ 'od zhu tshangs pa'i bu ga nas// bdud rtsi chu yis
rab bkrus nas// bsdus shing bsreg ste mi gnas par// yang nas yang du smon par bya// tha ma de 'og dag nas 'thon// shin tu dag cing dri bral bar// bsams te las rnams de la bya// gdon mi za bar
bzlog par 'gyur// gal te ser ba bzlog pa na// gdong la thal ba'i mtshan ma gdab// g.yo ba'i tsas dang rab bsregs la// spyan bzlog gsang sngags drag par bzlas// sdigs mdzub bcas la rdzas kyis

brab// de yis 'grub par the tshom med// gal te bsrung bar 'dod pa'i mis// pad+ma'i snod du bdud rtsi blugs// sman lnga dang dang rab sbyar bas// bskyed nas rdzogs pa'o mthar thug bya// bzlas pa 'bum phrag
brgyad du bya// sman rnams gang gi spyi gtsug tu// btags nas 'jigs pa brgyad las thar// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum ljang nag 'bar ba la// tha ma gdug pa'i mtshon chas bskor// de
nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng// nyi zla dag gi gdan stengs su// cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// yongs su rdzogs par lhar bkod de// dgug gzhig mchod dang bstod pa dang// gsang bdag gi phur pa
la// rdzas kyi sku ru rab ltas te// byin gyis brlab pa rdzogs pa dang// bzlas pa khri phrag bcu ru bya// dmigs par bya ba'i ling kha ni// yab yum byang chub sems dag gis// stag gi pags pa
dag la bri// gnas kyang gong ma nyid bzhin te// las rnams gong bzhin rdzogs byas nas// brlag par de la the tshom med// gal te gnas nas bskyal 'dod na// dur khrod zhing gi ras ma la// gsang ba'i

'khor lo rdzogs par bya// sha ba dag gi rgyab tu bskyod// bskrad pa dag gi gsang sngags ni// khri phrag lnga'am bcu bzlas te// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyod pa yis// kun gyis las rnams yongs byas na// gshin
rje'i gnas su bskyal la btang// dur khrod dag gi dbus su gnas// gnas las 'pho bar the tshom med// gal te gdon dag ma rungs pa// bskrad dang bsrung bar 'dod pa'i mis// 'dre 'bros thang chu sbyar ba
la// gsang ba'i man tra yongs rdzogs bya// khro ba'i sems su rab gnas te// dur khrod me la bsregs pa yi// dud pas gdon dang 'byung po// mu stegs lha dang ma rungs pa// gdug pa brgyal bar the tshom
med// 'di dgug pa yi mchog yin no// dbyug pa sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba la// thod pa gsum dang dbyug pas brgyan// dbus su dur khrod dag gi tshogs// steng du sngags kyi
bdag po bskyed// zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs pa dang// rkang brdabs ljags 'dril spyug pa len// hUM gi sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// de yi mdun du bsam bya ba// gang du dmigs pa'i dngos po de// ra sog
dag la gzugs byas la// yongs su smin par byas nas ni// gan rkyal dag tu bzhag pa ni/ lcags thag dag gis skye nas gdags// rkang pa brgyad pa'i sbyor ba yis// gang yin gnas nas dgug par
bya// las kyi rim pa yongs rdzogs na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// mi g.yo mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum smug nag 'bar ba la// rtse mo me dpung 'bar bar bya// logs la pad+ma 'dab mas
brgyan// dbus su me yi gdan dag la// nyi zla'i steng du sa bon las// sngags kyi bdag po rdzogs par bskyed// mi thung byis pa'i gzugs 'dra la// shin tu 'jigs pa rngam gzugs can// bskyed nas rdzogs
pa'i mthar thug bya// mdun du las kyi sems dpar bskyed// bzlas pa khri phrag drug tu bya// mtshan ma mthong nas las la sbyar// re ba dag la gzugs brnyan bya// ming dang rus ni gnas su gzhug/ yongs su
smin pa'i las byas te// las kyi 'khor lo rdzogs par bya// zla ba gza' yis zin dus su// mtshon gyis bsad pa'i sha khrag dang// 'dre 'bros thang chu rab bsres la// dur khrod ras ma dag tu gtum// gsang
sngags khri phrag gsum bzlas na// thams cad bred cing brgyal bar 'gyur// gzhan gyis mi thub dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje rgya gram lte ba la// ser nag rgya gram lte ba la// dbus su sngags kyi bdag

po bskyed// dur khrod rkang ngam mtshan ldan la// phur pa sor brgyad tshad du bya// rgyus chen dag gis ra rab sbrel// gnas su gsal ba'i yi ge dgod// nyi khri bdun 'bum bzlas pa bya// mtshan bdun bzlas nas
las la sbyar// dur khord g.yas pa sdong po la// gzugs dang ming rus bcas par bya// lcags thag btags te rab gtod la// gong bzhin yongs su smin par bya// dkyil 'khor rnams gsum 'khor dang
bcas// shin tu drag par sngags pa yis// rang dbang med par 'gugs par byed// de nas de bzhin rdzogs par bya// gal te gnod dang ma rungs pa// yongs su gnod pa'i las byed pa// gong ma nyid kyi nang
logs su/ me reg thang chus gzugs bris te// gong ma'i sbyor ba'i rdzogs byas nas// rgya gram lam du de mnan na// thams cad kun las rgyal bar 'gyur// 'di ni las kyi mchog ces bya// khams gsum rnam
rgyal dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum rab tu mi bzad pa// sor bzhin zabs su brko byas te// rab tu 'bar ba'i me ris bskor// nang du sngags kyi bdag po bskyed// yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang// mtshan

dang ldan pa'i mchog phur la// bzlas pa khri phrag bdun du bya// de nas mtshan ma mthong ba dang// bcu gnyis rdzas la ling ga bya// ming rus gang yin gnas su bzhag/ yongs su smin par gyur pa dang// shin tu

tshad dang ldan pa la// brdab dang gtub dang rdungs dang stab// kun la yongs su rdzogs par bya// 'di ni las rnams 'grub pa yin// hUM chen ka ra'i dkyil 'khor ni// zla kham dmar po'i dkyil 'khor du// cho
ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// sngags kyi bdag po bskyed par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// bzlas pa'i yi ge brjod par gsal// bum pa dmar po'i mdon can la// a shog nad 'am 'bras bu can// kha
rgyan dmar po'i gzungs thag gdags// thams cad bcud dang ldan pa la// bzlas pa 'bum dang nyi khri bya// mtshan ma bzang po mthong ba dang// drag po'i las sbyar bar bya// lus la tsan dan dmar po
byug/ srod dang tho rangs bzlas par byas// nyungs kar rdzas kyis rab sbyangs la// las rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya// gsad nas dgug dang dbang du sdud// thams cad thams cad 'grub par

'gyur// stobs po che yi dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje rgya gram lte ba la// gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba bri// phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad dang// rdo rje ra ba'i bar du bri// nang du sngags kyi bdag po nyid// cho ga gsum gyi
sbyor ba yis// bskyed nas rdzogs pa'i mthar thug bya// mdun du las kyi sems dpa' ni// seng ldeng phur pa dag las bskyed// sngo dmar dag gis sbrel te bzlas/ gsang sngags khri phrag bdun
du'o// skabs su bsdigs shing thun yang brdeg/ mtshan ma mthong nas las la sbyar// spra tshil dag la gzugs byas la// ming rus dur khrod mtshal gyis bri// rang gi gnas su de bcug la// dus bzhir dgug

cing bstim byas la// mtshan ma bzang po byung ba dang// las kyi 'khor lo rdzogs par bya// de yis 'grub par the tshom med// bsad pa'i rim pa yang gsungs pa// gang zhig gdug pa ma rungs pa// sangs rgyas
bstan la gnod pa la// bsgrub pa'i las kyis mi 'dul na// 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor du// dam can gnad la bor byas te// rtsa ba rab log thun gyis bsad// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sum brtsegs
la// phying nang rgyal la dag gis byug/ nang du lha phur bskyed byas te// kha khyer las la sras mchog dgod// phyi rim bar dag 'og ma la// thun gyi rdzas dang bshos bu dgod// dbus su ling ga gzhag par
bya// mchod dang las kyi gzhung nyid la// lugs su 'dzab la thug pa dang// sngags drug go rim tshul bzhin drangs// rtags dang mtshan ma zin pa dang// dam can sngags gsum sbrel bzlas// gal te las la ma

chud na// mgo gnon bcun sngags btags la bzlas// rtags dang mtshan ma byung ba dang// drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya'o// sngags stod stong stong bzlas nas kyang// sngags smad brgya brgya bzlas par bya// de

nas zor sngags lnga brgya bzlas// brgya stong lnga brgya rdzogs pa dang// nyi shu rtsa gcig thun rnams blug/ drag po'i 'phrin las nub bdun btud// gdab cing gtubs te zhal du bstab// tha ma mnan sregs 'phang

dang gsum// las kyi 'khor lo rdzogs par bya// shin tu gsang ba'i las rnams ni// las kyi sbyor ba lto 'brel te// sngan ma'i sbyor ba ji lta bar// dkyil 'khor phyi rim gru bzhi la// srog chags gzugs dang

rdzas rnams ni// kun gzhi nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// bskang ba lug gi gzugs dag kyang// de bzhin mchod par bya ba'i rdzas// bshos bu nyi shu rtsa gcig la// mda' bkra nyi shu rtsa gcig gzugs// gzhan yang bse

phor nang du dmar du// mtheb kyu nyi shu rtsa gcig la// rak+ta'i thig le re re bya// rnyan dang gla ba sprel dang khwa// gzhan yang srog chags thams cad kyi// snying dang sha dang khrag rnams bsog/ kha khyer phur pa rtsa

gcig la// re re'i snying po khrag gis bri// stobs ldan hri yis zil mnan la// bsgrub pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum// gang yin las la 'jug par bya// lo gcig zla ba bcu gnyis kyi// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngo
la// las kyi bya ba rdzogs par bya// khyad par dpyid zla tha chung ngam// yang na rang re'i zla ba la// 'jug dang bsad pa'i las rnams bya// las ngan dmigs pa'i dngos po de// tshe rabs snga ma'i

las 'phro 'am// 'jig rten 'di ni lha gnyan 'go/ dge tshogs phra mo'i nus mthu yis// yong zhing mtha' la ma chud na// bsgrub pa gsang ba'i las 'di ni// shin tu spags la bya bar gsungs// nyin mo pho rnams
gtem bya zhing// mtshan mo'i cha la mo rnams gtem// rtags dang mtshan ma brtags byas la// zor kyang de bzhin mnan te bsad// gdab pa la sogs las kyi mtha'// kun kyang snga ma'i sbyor ba bzhin// 'di ni
shin tu gsang ba'i las// nyi shu rtsa gcig grangs nges pa'am// rang rang mthun pa'i gzugs su bya// dbang po brgya byin shi bar gsungs// gsang ba'i rim pa yang gsungs pa// thems las bzlog pa'i dkyil
'khor ni// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba la// las dang bya ba mtshan nyid dang// kha dog rdzas dang rgyan la sogs// yongs su bya ba rdzogs byas te// bcu gnyis rdzas la gzugs byas na// lan gnyis byas te

snga ma bzhin// rdzas dang lha dang sngags dag dang// gsang ba la sogs rim pa bzhin// las kyi 'khor lo lto bzlog la// las byed bcud la bor ba yin// de yi rim pa'ang 'di lta ste// rdzas kyang sgyu nas bzlog
pa dang// dgod pa'i rim pa'ang de bzhin no// gzhan yang lha yi rim pa'ang// lho 'khor bzlog dang gi rim bzlog/ bzhugs thabs bzlog dang phyag mtshan bzlog/ gsang ba thams dang shes rab
bzlog/ kun kyang drag po'i cha lugs la// shin tu khros shing 'bar bar brtag/ yi ge bco lnga'i bdag nyid ni// snga ma bzhin du sor bzhag la// de nas las kyi rim pa gnyis// ye shes grangs kyis yar mar

bzlog/ lnga ma'i las kyis rdzogs byas nas// tha ma'i las la go rim bzlog/ gtum pa man chad gzhung dang bsnyag/ 'di ni spyi dang bye brag dang// khyad par bye brag sbags pa yi// bsgrub pa'i yan lag bzhi
ru gsungs// shin tu gsang ba'i sbyor ba 'di// snod ngan rnams la bstan gyur na// mnar med dmyal ba'i gnas su 'tshod// de bas shin tu nan tan bya// gsang ba'i gsang bar bstan pa ni// yang dang dag
don la sbyor 'dod pas// dang po rin chen 'od de las// gcig pa drangs nas gsang ba'i 'od// de 'od 'bar bas rab drangs nas// gnyis pa'i dbang las yang dag gsal// stong pa ma yin 'di dag
sbyang// 'khor lo ye shes bla na med// gsal ba 'di nyid rab gang mthong// 'di ni gsal ba dang po'o// dang po'i rim pa gcig dang gnyis// yang dag gnyis las rdo rje bsgom// rdo rje dbus su sku
gsung thugs// de dbus sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i gzhi// sa bon las ni yongs su rdzogs// bsod nams 'bras bu 'grub par brtag/ de dkyil sgo nga las skyes par// bsgrub dang bsgrub pa chen
po'i dbang// yongs rdzogs bltas la ting 'dzin bya// de nas rin chen 'od de las// yang dang yang du byung gyur pas// rin chen 'bar bas yongs gang bas// rtog can rnam bsregs bde ba che// mnyam nyi ye
shes sa nas 'phags// 'di ni bstan pa gnyis pa'o// de nas gsang las pad rdzogs pas// de las 'od 'phros 'jig rten gang// ji ltar brtags pa'i der snang bas// gang du yang ni g.yo ba med// so
sor rtogs pas bstan rgyu med// 'di ni gzung bya gsum pa'o// de las 'od 'phros yang dag bskyed// brtan 'gyur gsal ba'i rang bzhin can// bde chen 'od las thams cad bskyed// nyi ma gnas su brtan
par gsal// thams cad dkyil 'khor lhan ne'o// bzung ba brtan pa'i bzhi pa'o// de bzhin 'od las rdo rje rdzogs// de de las gnyis thams cad gsal// yongs gsal brtan pa'i rang bzhin
can// lus gnyis yongs su gsal gang ba'o// de 'phros las byas sangs rgyas dngos// thams cad de las byung bzhin 'phro// zhi rgyas dbang drag stobs bzhi pa'o// de yi dbang gis gsal ba las// rang
mthong zhi ba'i las kyis min// dges pa dbang la grangs pa min// tshe dang dbang dang rgyas pa min// log lta sgrol ba'i drag po min// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rab tu bsngags pa'i zhi rgyas
bzhi// 'di ltar 'phrin las rnam bzhi ni// rnal 'byor pa yis nyams su blang// thams cad de las 'byung ba min// mi gnas pas na zhi ba'i mchog/ ye shes phun sum tshogs pas brgyan// rang rig mchog thob
gsang ba'i dbang// mi gnas mya ngan 'das drag po// rig pa mchog gi sa bon gyis// thams cad rdzogs pa de la bya// gcig rdzogs gsal ba'i me long ltar// snang ba thams cad gsal med pa// mgon po
chen pos mnyam nyid gsal// thams cad so sor mnyam nyid rtogs// thabs chad gnyis dang 'di zhes pa// brtag cing gsal bar grub rgyu med// de de gsal las rang bzhin shar// thar med 'khor ba'i
'obs nas gnas// gal te 'khor ba las brgal yang// mya ngan 'das pa'i 'khor bar gnas// 'di med lam la bgrod mi srid// dka' ba med pa'i lam mchog bgrod// thabs kyi nang na dam pa yis// 'di
ni sangs rgyas thabs dam pa// 'di 'grub 'khor bar yongs mi ltung// 'di la 'bad de nyams su blang// 'di ni yang dag phur pa ste// 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs dang// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med
dang// phung po khams dang skye mchod dang// 'di ltar grags shing snang ba rnams// thams cad dbyings su 'dus pa'i phyir// de phyin phur pa chos kyi dbyings// phyi nang kun gyi chos rnams kun// ngo
bo nyid kyis mya ngan 'das// de phyir chos nyid 'od gsal ni// dus gsum rtag tu 'dus ma byas// rang bzhin chos nyid phur pa yin// de bsgrub pa yis thabs dag tu// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa
dang// don dam kun rdzob la sogs pa// mchod dang bzlas dang bstod pa dang// dam tshig dbang dang 'phrin pas dang// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor la sogs las// rang bzhin phur pa bsgrub pa yi// thabs su

rgyal bas gsungs par zad// tshig tu brjod bral sku mi mnga'// sgra las 'das pa'i chos nyid yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje me lce 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bsgrub pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis
pa'o//// de nas yang karma kI la yas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma sngags kyi bdag nyid che// kye ma 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel// kye ma yon tan mchog
'gyur bdag/ kye ma gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa// 'di ni don rnams lhur len pa'i// gang zag dang po'i sa pa la// rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ma mchis sam// 'di yi bye brag ji ltar lags// zhes gsol ba
dang// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ las yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di bsgrub pa yi gang zag
gis// las kyi bya ba lhur len na// rgyun gyi ting 'dzin rim pa rnams// yang dag nyid du ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ dang po tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim pa
las// rten gyi dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de dbus bdag po'i sku bsams te// las rnams thams cad brtsam par

bya// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// rnam bzhi'i tshul du sku bskyed de// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// khro chen hUM ka ra ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus sngo'i
mdog/ dang po rdo rje dril bu dang// tha ma phur bu 'dzin pa ni// kun kyang mthun par shes par bya// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi bar pa ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis su brtan pa'o// rnam rgyal sngo ser dkar ba'i

mdog/ dang po rdo rje dril bu dang// tha ma phur pa 'dzin pa ni// kun kyang mthun par shes par bya// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi bar pa ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis su bstan pa'o// dbyug sngon sngon dmar ljang ba'i
zhal// gshin rje ljang nag sngo ba'i zhal// mi g.yo ljang sngon smug pa'i zhal// rta mgrin dkar sngo dmar ba'i zhal// dpal chen dmar ser dkar ba'i zhal// bdud rtsi dkar smug pa'i
zhal// khams gsum dkar sngo ljang ser zhal// stobs chen g.yas dmar du du dka'i zhal// dbu dang phyag zhabs kun kyang 'dra// sprul pa lcam dral g.yas g.yon bzhin// phyag mtshan bar ma de bzhin

te// 'di ni rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang mchod pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyi nag gsang ba mchod pa'i tshogs// tshul bzhin bshams te byin gyis
brlab// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// phyag rgya bzhi yis spyan drangs byon/ bstim nas gnyis su med pa la// bdag nyid gtso bo'i thugs ka la nas// 'do kyi tshul du rab 'thon te// rnam par
smin pa'i cha gzung nas// lha mo'i tshogs dang mgrin sdebs te// las dang mthun pa'i tshul rtags la// mchod pa'i bye brag dbul ba yin// d+hu pe dkar mo spos me thogs// nam mkha'i snying po nyid la
dbul// gnyis med dri yis tshim nas ni// sems can don rnams yongs rdzogs bsam// puSh+pe ser mo me tog thogs// rnam par snang mdzad nyid la dbul// a lo dmar mo mar me bsnams// sa yi snying po'i
gnas su dbul// gan+d+he ljang khu dri chab bsnams// mi bskyod pa yi gnas su dbul// la se dkar mo me long bsnams// sa yi snying po mnyes bar byed// rin chen dpal 'phreng mdzes pa yis// rnam par snang

mdzad gdugs su gyur// girti sgra dbyangs ldan pa yis// phyag na rdo rje mchod par mnyes// nirti gar gyi bye brag rnams// byams pa me tri mchod pas mnyes// ro yi lha mo zhal zas bsnams// spyan ras gzigs
la mchod byas pas// longs spyod bde dang mnyes 'gyur nas// tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bsam// re re'ang bye ba rdul snyed du// bsamasate mchod pa phul pa yis// rten dang rten can gnyis

ka thim// dag pa'i zhing du 'gro ba'i rgyus// rgyu dang 'bras bur gnyis ldan pas// yang dag nyid de gdon mi za// 'di ni phyi yi rim par gsungs// nang gi mchod pa dam pa ni// nga bdag bral ba'i ban+d+ha
ru// bdud rtsi lnga yi bcud gtam ste// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// raM las me 'od 'bar ba las// a las 'chi med ban+d+ha bsam// gzhal yas 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa'i// steng nas gdan lnga gnas pa

las// dam rdzas lnga dang sha lnga las// rgyal ba'i gdan lnga sems can lnga// de steng chog gsum las ni// gtso bo yab yum rab bskyed la// bar snang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje las ni hUM gis mtshan// de
las bskul ba'i 'od zer gyis// ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug gzhug bstim// mchod dang bstod pa la sogs dang// ting nge 'dzin nam dngos grub bya// mkha' gsang byin brlab sbyor ba'i
brdas// bskul nas sbyor ba'i byin brlabs kun// yum gyi gnas nas phyogs bcur 'phros// don gnyis byas nas rgyal ba'i bcud// bsdus te sku lnga nyid la bstim// 'do zhu byang chub sems su gyur// rlung
gis me sbar rim par bzhu// thabs dang shes rab cha las grub// bdud rtsi byang chub sems kyi dngos// yig 'bru gsum gyis kha bcad la// rgyal ba spyan drangs mchod pa dang// mkha' 'gro las mkhan rnams
la sbyin// 'di de nang gi mchod pa yin// drag po'i mchod pa rnam pa gnyis// gzhung la grags ba bzhin du'o// gsang ba dam pa'i mchon pa ni// yab yum yongs su rdzogs pa las// gong gi rjes su shes pa
ste// spyan ras gzigs dbang mchod pa'am// lus dang shes pa rgyas par bsam// de ni dngos grub myur ba yin// de nas bdag nyid gsum gyis sbyang// yi ge gzugs su gyur pa las// bdag po'i gnas
su thim par brtag/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang bzlas brjod rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// bdag po'i bdun du sras kyi tshogs// yongs su gsal bar ltas pa las// rnam gsum rten gyi dkyil

'khor la// yi ge 'phreng ba rnam pa gsum// kha dog las kyi skabs kyis shes// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba gsum// gang yin las la rab tu 'bad// spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis// lcags kyi tsha tsha brdabs pa

ltar// shin tu phra ba'i bzlas pa bya// bsdus nas don gyi gnas su bstim// shin tu yi ge'i 'phreng ba bstim// de nas rten dang bdag po bstim// shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su bsgom// ngag nas gong ma'i rim

pa gsos// dang po'i sa la snyegs pa dang// rim pa ji bzhin yang dang yang// tha mar 'od gsal bde ba che// 'di ni bstan pa dang po ste// dub par gyur na bzlas pa bya// bzlas pa nang gi rim pa ni// me ltar

'bar ba'i bzlas pa ste// gtso bo dbang du byas pa dang// 'khor gyi dbang du byas pa'o// dang po'i rim pa gang zhe na// bskyed nas rdzogs pa'i mthar thug la// shin tu 'phros pa ji bzhin pas// gnas nas ni

gtso bo'i sku// khro mo rim pa grangs med 'phros// lcags kyu thogs pa'i gzugs can des// rang grub a la brten pa'i hUM// de ni rgyu dang rkyen yang des// des bsags dngas snyigs rnam pa gnyis// mtshan ma
gnyis kyi gnas nas drang// gtibs te shin tu mtshan ldan pa// gtso bo'i dbang du byas pa'o// gnyis pa'i rim pa yang gsungs pa// bdag nyid gnas nas de nyid spro// so so'i cha 'dzin de phog pas// phyag
mtshan sna tshogs dag gi las// srin bu me khyer ji lta bar// blo yis brtags te gnyis med 'gyur// shin tu rdzogs par gyur pa dang// gsal ba gsum la sogs pa yis// las rnams yongs su
rdzogs par bya// gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa ni// bdag dang ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor ni// tshogs dang bzlas pa'i bar du ste// mtshan dang dpe byad rnam par gsal// de las yun rings gnas pa gces// rdo
rje bdag po'i thugs kha ru// sems dpa' gsum brtsegs gsal byas la// brtan par 'phro 'du'i rim par bya// gnas gsum dag nas 'bru gsum ni// ye nas rang grub tshul du gnas// khams gsum
sems can thams cad kun// sku gsung thugs gnas sa bon nyid// 'khor ba ye nas sku gsung thugs// 'byung ba nyid las 'phro bas te// gzhi mo nyid hUM las 'phro nyid// bzhi mo nyid kyi snying khar
gnas// g.yas nas 'byung ba sor bzhi bzlas// de nas sna rtser gsal ba ste// de la rgyun du bzlas pa bya// de nas 'jug pa g.yon pa nas// sor bzhi ba slobs nas gzhi por thim// gnas pa nyid la gsal

bar blta// yang na bzhi po las 'phros te// rim pa sngar bzhin sna rtser gnas// phar 'phros khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsal// sgo nas byung ste gsum yang gsal// slar yang zhi zhing 'khyil ba ni// rta rnga'i nyag tsam
bzlas pa bya// 'jug pa'i tshul gnas bdag nyid bsdud// de nas ye shes sems dpa' bsdu// ting 'dzin bsdus nas bzhi por gnas// rigs lnga ye shes lnga nyid ni// rlung nyid yin te thig le'i tshul// zhabs

kyu thim nas na ro'ang thim// thig le'i tsa na'i 'bru tsam las// gnyis med byang chub sems su 'gyur// yun rings de las bzlas pa ni// rdo rje bzlas pa zhes su gsungs// rdo rje gnyis med ye shes te// bzlas

pa 'byung dang 'jug pa nyid// de gnyis las ni bde rnyed pa// des na rdo rje bzlas pa bya'o// yang na rdo rje bzlas pa ni// rdo rje 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings// yang nas yang du de slob pa// de ni bzlas pa'i mchog

yin te// gnyis med ye shes ngo bo nyid// rdo rje bzlas pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni bzlas brjod ting 'dzin no// zhes gsungs so// de nas bsgrub pa'i rgyun gyis ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas

las byas te// 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor la// dril te bsgrub pa'i sdegs su bshad// dus bzhi'i cho ga gzhung bsrang la// tshogs dang mchod pa la sogs kyis// mchod dang pho nya la sogs kyi// phyag rgya

bzhi dang ldan par bya// bzlas pa rab tu 'bad byas ste// smad tshong ma yi ldum ra nas// nyungs kar rgyal po hor bskyed la// kha sbyar dbus su dril nas su// stong stong tshang nas brdeg par bya// sgrol ba'i rdzas
mchod dam pa ste// rten 'brel nus ba'i rdzas mchog gis// btab na shin tu mchog tu 'gyur// dang po shin tu 'phros pa las// 'gug pa'i yi ge gdags par bya// de nas gzugs la dbab

pa'i phyir// snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// yi ge dza ni gzhag par bya// 'od zer lcags kyus drangs nas ni// gzugs sam ri mo thim par bya// phyag rgya bzhi pa'i rang bzhin gyis// dgug cing bsdam dang

mgu bar bya// de ltar gzugs la phob pa dang// tshon sna lnga yi skud pa'am// skud pa nag pos bcings nas kyang// dgug cing bstim pa rnams byas te// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin cing// yan lag 'khum
mi nus par bsam// de ltar smin par gyur pa dang// gzir cing dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// dmigs par bya ba'i yul rnams la// dkar nag gnyis kyis mtshams su yang// byang chub sems kyi rtse gtad
de// phur pa'i ri rab phyag rgya yis// shin tu 'khub mi nus par bya// 'go ba'i lha dag dbral ba'i phyir// me tog sngon po la sogs pa'i// dug gi gtor ma za ru gzhug/ 'brel ba'i rdzas mchog dam pa
rnams// rten 'brel nus par ldan pa yis// thams cad byer cing 'bros par 'gyur// gal te dam pa'i sgor zhugs nas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i nus pa yis// bcing ba'i lcags sgrog yod na yang// bdag nyid
man ngag gdeng ldan pas// mche ba'i phyag rgyas snying dral te// sngags kyi bdag po spyan drangs la// ye shes gsal bstim mchod pa dbul// bstod pa byas te 'phrin las bskul// bka' bsgo bdag la bzhugs

par brtag/ de nas sdig pa 'thol ba'i las// thang phro ma dang ni da ru ra// myos pa'i chu yis tshim par bya// gu gul tshil chen la sogs pas// gdug pas sdigs pa mthol ba dang// myos shing smra ba'i nus ldan
bsam// shin tu smin par gyur pa dang// 'bros kyi sa mthar mnan gzir bya// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul 'phrog pa dang// yan lag 'khum mi nus par bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag gdab pa rgyun gyi ting

nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// las rnams gang dang gang gis yang// bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs pa na// gdab pa'i sngags kyi 'phreng ba yang// bsnyen dag bsgrub pa las rung nas// rtags dang drod tshad zin pa'i
mis// gdug pa'i sngags chen bzlas byas la// gnas su rtsa dang sbrags te gdab// gser skyems btang zhing bden bas bsgo// rak+ta phyar zhing dam can bod// dgug cing smin par bya ba gces// gsal ba
rnam gsum byas nas ni// gso ba rnam pa gsum yang bya/ bdag nyid gso dang phur pa gso// gzas pa po dang de bzhin gso// de yang rnam pa gnyis yin te// gtso bo'i phur pa btab pa dang// 'khor gyi phur pa
gdab pa'o// dang po gtso bo'i bdag nyid la// nus pa thob cing dbang nos nas// byin brlabs dag dang ldan par bya// nyid kyi cha las byung ba yis// sras kyi phur pa ra blangs la// bstod dang
byin gyis brlab pa dang// 'phrin las drag tu bskul byas te// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob la// rigs 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gdug cing gnod pa'i
dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams// khro bo chen po'o byin brlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang// lus ngag rdul du bshig nas

kyang// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// nyi shu rtsa gcig kI la ya// rab tu gsor zhing bzlas nas kyang// kI la ya dang che ge mo// dkar nag mtshams dang hUM phaT mtha'// bco brgyad bzlas te dril byas
nas// srog gi go ru shar ba dang// snying gi go ru kI la ya// rtsa ba'i sngags dang las kyi sngags// sgrog pa'i sngags gsum bzlas pa yis// lhan gyi btab pas kun gzhi yi// byang chub sems las a ru
gyur// a ni sems kyi rang bzhin te// 'di ni til gyi 'bras bur gnas// de ni kun gzhi'i bdag nyid yin// 'od de khrag gi sbas pa yin// gtum pas nyon mongs can gyis yid// phur pas khrag gi sbal pa
bsregs// 'od de phur pa'i dbal la 'dus// yi ge a yi rang bzhin gyur// dngas ma'i lus dang dngas ma'i sems// bsad cing gnas pa ma yin te// a ni phur pa'i dbal la 'dus// zil pa'i tshul du

gnas pa las// ri rab steng nas hUM ka ras// dam tshig tshul gyis bdag la bstim// lus dang shes pa rgyas par 'gyur// de ni tshe lung nges pa'o// de nas rten kyang blar phul nas// de nyid de la thim par

brtags// byang chub sems kyi phur pa des// log pa'i shes pa rten sbyangs nas// yi ge a ru gsal spro thim// de nyid byang chub sems kyi khrus// de yang go rim bzlog pa yis// gnyis ka yongs su rdzogs par

shar// de nas gnyis par gyur pa yi// 'khor gyi rim pas gdab pa ni// dang por rim pa ji lta bar// thams cad kun la de bzhin no// bran dang pho nya dka' nyan tshogs// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon

chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa'i// mngon spyod 'phrin las myur du mdzod// rang rang sngags dang phur pa yis// gnas su rtsa ba dang sbrags gdab// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad la// phyogs mtshams khro mo

rnams kyis gdab// dge sdig bag chags sa bon las// steng 'og khro bo'i phur pas gdab// gnas dang rtsa yi rten la yang// khra thabs rnams kyi phur pas gdab// de yang rim pa ji lta bar// mig dang rna ba sna
dang lce// lus ni chags byed lte ba ste// g.yas na yid kyi rnam shes rgyu/ g.yon na nyon mongs can gyi yid// dbus na kun gzhi'i rnam shes te// gsum ni snying kha dag na gnas// gdul bya gnyen
po'i tshul du ni// rnam par rgyal dang dbyug sngon can// gshin rje gshed dang mi g.yo mgon// bdud rtsi 'khyil dang 'dod pa'i rgyal// rta mgrin khams gsum rnam rgyal dang// hUM ka ra dang stobs po

che// phra thabs rnams kyide bzhin gnas// gzhan yang gdab pa'i rim pa ni// byung tshor rgyu ba'i gnas rnams su// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i phur pa gdab// yan lag lnga ni gyur pa'am// nyon mongs skye ba'i gnas

rnams su// sras mchog lnga yi phur pa gdab// rtsa ba'i sngags dang las kyi sngags// mgo gnon gnad dang ming du bcas// kun kyang lnga lnga shes par bya// de nas yang gtub pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs
so// gsang ba'i dbyibs kyi dbus dag tu// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas kyang// gzugs brnyan dag ni byas pa la// bkug nas de yi gzugs nyid la// rdo rje phur pa bshad pas// de yi tshogs brgyad
dag par spyad// btab pa'i rdzas mtshog lhag ma la// mtshon cha chen sngon po 'bar ba yi// ral gri la sogs mtshon cha lngas// gzugs brnyan phye mar gtub pa'am// yang na dum bu gsum dag tu// rno ba'i

mtshon gyis gtub par bya// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga
yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// g.yon gyis mnan la g.yas kyis gtub// khro bo stobs kyi rgyal po yis// khrom mtshon char du phab nas kyang// lus la phog nas zhig par bsam// don gyi gzung 'dzin rgyal mo

bra// ma rig mun pa bral byas te// rigs nges sras su gyur par bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang brab pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// gang zhig gdug pa ma rungs pa// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'tshe
byed cing// lu gu rgyud la 'gal byed cing// las gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa yis// nan thur las rnams yang gsungs pa// phra thabs rnams dang sras mchog rnams// dam can ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyis// steng

nas mtshon cha'i char du babs// nad ngan gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// kha rlangs bu yug tshub mar 'khyil// gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung// nga la bar chad byed pa

rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byos// thun rdzas rnams dang mtshon cha yis// char tu bab ste zhig par bsam// las kyi sngags la steng 'og nyid// sgrog pa'i sngags su ldan par byed// 'di ni brab pa'i
las su 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang brdung ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// khro bo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// zhe sdang chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// phur pa'i khro bo rdzogs byas

la// rdo rje tho bas bsgom byas shing// g.yon pas rke nas bzung bya zhing// g.yas pa rdo rje tho bas brdeg/ yum gyi mkha' yi gting dag tu// dngos po gyur pa'i gnas chen la// rdul phran bzhin du brdungs byas
na// sha khrag khams gsum gang bar dmigs// rdo rje tshig tu bskul ba ni// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dbal snying bsregs nas// lus ngag rdul

phran bzhin du lhog/ khro mo 'bar ma'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdung byas nas lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya// tad tha a tad tha ya kha thaM hUM phaT// gsang ba'i mkha' dang 'jigs byed zhal// mthing nag
'bar ba'i gnas gsum du// rim pa bzhin du thabs rnams dang// cho ga'i yan lag shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// denas yang bstab pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'o dkyil 'khor
chen po ru// bcom ldan sngags kyi bdag po rnams// shin tu gsal zhing zhal gdangs par// ril bu bsdus nas dbyings su mchod// nam mkha'i khro mo kha gdangs su// thugs rjes 'gro kun yid la
bstab// ngas bstab khyed kyis yud la rol// rol pas dges pa'i rkan sgra sgrogs// rol pa'i lcags kyu 'bar ba yis// gnyis med zhal du+u ra bsdus la// ye shes khong gi me chen gyis// rab tu zo la myur du
bsregs// las la 'bras bu yod ces bya// ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin du// smon pa'i byang chub lam du zhugs// mtshan ma'i bag chags der sbyangs so// dbyings la sro zhing a la bstim// zhes gsungs so// de

nas shes pa gnas kyi phyi mo dang sprad pa spar ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// zhing du sbyangs pa'i sems can de// gsang ba'i lam nas mthon pa'am// sngon gyi tshul du phyir bton nas// bag chags
rnams kyag byang byas nas// rnam shes gser zhun lta bu de// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng bzhag nas// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag gis bskyod// hUM hUM zhes rab tu bsdus pas// mi dmigs dbyings su phaT kyis

'phangs// rigs nges rgyal ba'i sras su bkod// mi ltung sems can don gyi phyir// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// mi 'khor sems can don gyi phyir// ngan song sgo gsum shin tu bcad// rnam shes chos kyi
skur gnas bsam// de nas cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// gzugs sku gnyis su rdzogs bya ba// dbang bskur nus dang ldan par bya// 'gro ba'i don la bskul ba ni// hUM/ rgyal ba'i sras po gnyis med gtso// bde chen
byang chub sems la byung// 'jig rten khams mang ji snyed na// nyon mongs lngas gzir sems can gyi// don rnams ma lus khyed kyis gyis// de skad brjod la phyir bton te// zhing khams rnams su

las la btang// bdag la sgrig pa mi gos shing// gcig nyid tshe yi dngos grub thob// de phyir thabs kyi khyad par mchog/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje me lce 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin rim
par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma sangs rgyas kun gyi yab chen po// thabs chen ma
'gas kun gyi gtso// las rnams rdzogs par gsungs lags na// rnal 'byor las mthar 'byin pa la// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor mi 'tshal lam// 'di yi rim pa gang ltar lags// de skad ces ni gsol ba
dang// bcom ldan sngags kyi bdag po yis// 'gro mgon las kyi sems dpa' la// 'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to// nyams pa'i mtshan nyid bdun rnams dang// ngan song gsum dang bcu po'am// yang na

rim pa 'di lta bar// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar te gcig/ phrag dog rlung ltar 'tshub ste gnyis// 'dod chags shing ltar spungs te gsum// gti mug ri ltar spungs te bzhi// nga rgyal bse ltar khengs te lnga// ser sna

rtsi ltar 'byar te drug/ gtum khro khro chu 'dra ste bdun// gsod gcod srin po 'dra ste brgyad// 'phrog rlom rkun po 'dra ste dgu/ chos log khang dpon byed dang bcu// 'di lta bu yi gang zag la// zhi bas smras kyang
mi 'dul bas// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor lhag par gces// yang dag nyid du ngas bstan gyis// las kyi sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// bdag nyid chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni// brag dmar chol bzang 'dra ba

dang// khang ral dben sar song nas ni// las kyi bya ba rdzogs par bya// khra thabs rnams kyang de bzhin gnas// gzhan yang gdab pa'i rim pa ni// byung tshor rgyu ba'i gnas rnams su// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i
phur pa gdab// yan lag lnga ni gyur pa'am// nyon mongs skye ba'i gnas rnams su// sras mchog lnga yi phur pa gdab// rtsa ba'i sngags dang las kyi sngags// gom gnon gnad dang ming du bcas// kun kyang

lnga lngar shes par bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// yongs su rdzogs pa'i las byas te// dbus su mthing nag gru gsum la// mtha' ma ro yi phung po dgod// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma la// ma tshangs

shan phye btab byas la// tsit+ta 'ug pa'i sha tshil dang// seng ge stag dang bya rgod dang// skyung ka'i sha dang tshil bur bcag/ g.yo ba rdzas kyis rab spras te// de yi dus drug mchod pa'am// dus ni bzhi'am gnyis
su mchod// 'phrin las yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir// dang po tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang// sa dgu non pa'i ting 'dzin bya// khrag 'thung yab yum gsal ba dang// shar du dpal ldan re ma

ti// bong bu dag gi steng du bskyed// zhal gcig phyag kyang bzhi pa ste// g.yas gnyis ral gri lcags kyu la// g.yon pa thod pa tri shul la/ ro nye mdzes pa'i rgyan chas can// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba

la// ral pa ser nag gyen du brdzes// sku stod zhing chen g.yang gzhi la// sku smad re lde'i rgyan chas can// g.yas kyi snyan cha seng ge byas// g.yon pa sbrul gyi gdeng kha can// khrag zhag thig les lus brgyan

cing// mche ba btsigs shing 'jigs gzugs can// phyin phyogs zhon nas nang du blta// rgyan rnams spyi dang mthun par bsakayed// gzhan ma rnams kyang de 'drar brtags// re ma dze ni lho ru ste// re ma dzu ni

nub tu'o// re ma ti ni byang du'o// rta skya lcags kyi phag pa dang// rdzu 'phrul rnga mo'i steng du bskyed// dmar nag dkar mo dmar ser dang// rim pa bzhin du+u shes par bya// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis

te// g.yas pa zla ba'i ru mtshon la// g.yon pa tri shul rtse gsum mo// de bzhin rdo rje lcags kyu dang// mdung dang zhags pa bsnams pa ste// rgyan dang cha lugs gong bzhin bskyed// sgo bzhi dag tu bsgom pa

ni// shar du rus sbal nag po'i steng// dkar mo nyi zla'i spyan gcig ma// dbu la rus sbal go cog can// g.yas pa lcags kyu g.yon tsit+ta// lho sgor sbrul nag mgo gsum ste// sngon mo g.yu yi ral pa can//
rus sbal go cog dag dang ldan// g.yas zhags g.yon pa zangs kyi sgra// nub sgor phag mo sum grus te// dmar mo khyung gshog g.yag rgod mgo/ g.yas pa bse yi tho ba ste// g.yon pa me sgron bsnams

pa'o// byang sgor lcags kyi spyang mo'i steng// ljang nag spyang mgo dril bus brgyan// lag gnyis dril bus dges mdzad ma'o// hUM e k+Sha k+Sha k+Sha k+Sha/ yaM b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo// oM shrI badzra ku ma ra yag sha hUM a/ badzra krod+hi e

ka tsa badzra hUM/ tad+ya thA ru ru ro ru tsa pa la hUM/ tad+ya thA ru ru ro ru a shug me hUM/ tad+ya thA ru ru ro ru ba ti sta hUM/ tad+ya thA ru ru ro ru ba to si hUM/ de rnams sku gsung thugs bltas la// dam tshig tshul bzhin bsgrag par

bya// ma ma sam ya rag bag sha hUM/ rang bzhin grub pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// so so'i gnas nas spyan drangs te// gnyis su med par gyur par bya// bstim dang bzhugs su gsol ba dang// phyag 'tshal ba dang

gsol ba gdab// de la dmar gyi ar+g+ha dang// me tog nag po'i mchod pas mchod// bdud rtsi mchod cing dngos grub blang// ma ma trig nan re ti tsa ba la trag rag sha kha mun tra ba dun dun dza hri/ gtso bo'i snying

khar hUM phaT dgod// ma mo'i snying kha rang snying po// sras la gsod pa'i snying po dgod// rtags dang mtshan ma zin pa dang// seng ldeng phur pa lnga bshams la// lha mo bzhi dang gtso bo'i sku// lte ba
man chad gdug pa'i lus// sngo bsangs 'jigs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// ming gi yi ge dang po yis// yul dang yul can de bskyed la// dgug bstim byas la nyes pa bsgo// mchod la gnas sam gshed du

bsgo// rang dbang med par bkug pa de// lha mo nyid kyi phyag tu gtad// ma ma trag sha kha mun tra/ snying kha rag rag rag mo dun dun b+h+yo b+h+yo dza dza/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ ru ru re be hUM ti stab/ d+hi rag mo snying kha rag mo hUM

b+h+yo b+h+yo dza dza/ 'phrin las rnams kyang bcom bya zhing// rbad pa yang dang yang du bya// rag mo thums lis snying rtsa 'dus// srog phrig phrig/ sham sham khyer b+h+yo/ snying khrag rtsa srog breng breng rbad/ oM dza la hUM phaT/ ma

trog tug tug khra long snying rbud/ ma hA srog thun/ snying la ma b+h+yo/ ma ra ya phaT/ kha thun ni dza dza/ stongs byed lha dang phral nas ni// mtshan ma byung nas phur pas gdab// dug dang me tog rnams dang ni// khrag dug

rnams kyi thun yang brdeg/ mthing nag dar gyi g.yab mo bya// oM badzra kI li kI li ya/ ta d+ya thA ru ru ro ru tsa pa la thums rbad ma ma pa shi ku ru ma thaM nya ka ra in n+d+ha tim ma karma shri kram ka re ya che ge mo'i snying

khrag spyos shig/ kha rag bod+hi tsit+ta la mA ra ya hUM phaT// sngags bzlas nag mo 'bum sde'i 'khor yongs su bskor nas chings 'debs// rgod dang za zhing rol pa dang// rngam pa'i sgra 'byin spyug glu len// mtshon cha
sna tshogs 'debs shing rol// de byas skad cig de nyid la// nad dang rims dang dug dang mtshon// myur du 'bab cing de gsod 'gyur// gtub dang brdung dang bstab pa bya// mthar gyi las rnams gang

yin kyang// gcig gam yang na rdzogs par bya// gtubs pa'i phyi ma khrag ra sbyar// khrag thun snying rtsa ma lus rnams// sdong po skad cig gtun nang du// g.yo ba'i rdzas kyis rab spras la// nan thur las la shin

tu 'bab// ma ma rang gi snying khrag gis thums rbad/ thang mu le thang mu le tsit+ta rbad/ tsa thang tsa thang rbad rbad/ muM sni muM sni tsit+ta naN/ rag mo ni rag mo ni kha lo tsit+ta rbad rbad/ dug sni dug sni kha lo tsit+ta rbad rbad/ kyi

kha lo kyi kha lo tsit+ta rbad rbad/ tsa ti tsa ti tsa ti rbad/ nir ti nir ti mugs mugs/ thums thums subs sti sti tsit+ta rbad rbad/ kha 'dar yed yed/ thums thums rbad rbad/ se kha lo mu kha lo phaT rbad/ 'bum mam
bdun 'bum bzlas nas ni// thun lam bsal la 'phang ba dang// bsreg dang mnan dang sna glan dang// las gzhug yongs su rdzogs par bcad// ces gsungs so// sho na mu ka'i dkyil 'khor ni// dur khrod
dben pa'i sa phyogs sam// 'phar spyang sha la stod 'dra'i ri// de ru las rnams rdzogs par bya// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi legs byas la// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// bsgrub pa'i yo byad thams

cad dang// stag dang spyang khu 'phar ba dang// seng ge dom la sogs pa dang// gcan gzan sna tshogs snying dang sha// tsan dan dmar po'i bdud rtsi dang// sha sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bshams// ban+d+har sbyar te

mchod par bstab// dang po tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi nas// las su rung ba'i rim pa rnams// gong ma dag las shes par bya// mA mA mA mA/ dza ya du hUM/ man ti hUM/ sha ri hUM/ ni la pus ti hUM/ thabs dang shes rab
mthu las ni// shar du 'jigs byed dkar mo la// lho ru 'gugs byed sor mo'o// nub tu rgyug byed dmar mo ste// byang du za byed ljang khu'o// seng ge stag dang wa spyang mgo/ lcags kyu la sogs 'dzin

rgyug/ g.yon na phur pa 'dril bar byed// kun kyang 'jigs pa'i rgyan chos can// shin tu rngam zhing rgyug pa'i brtags// byang shar la sogs mtshams rnams su// spyang ki dang ni khyi la sogs// bzhi bzhis yan
lag zhing za bar brtags// dza hUM baM ho rnam bzhi las// sgo bzhir ral can bzhi rnams ni// spyi las grags pa bzhin du'o// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa las// lcags kyu la sogs sbyor ba yis// dgug

gzhug thim dang gnyis med bya// bstim zhing gnyis med rab bzhugs la// phyag dang gdan la sogs pas mchod// spyang khu'u sha la gzhi blangs la// sha sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang// sna tshogs khrag la gzhi
blangs la// khrag sna tshogs pa'i rak+ta sbyar// mdun du gnas par de brtags la// me tog dmar po la sogs pa'i// dmar ba'i rdzags rnams kun gyis mchod// de nas 'phrin las bskul ba ni// sho na mu ka'i

dus la bab// pad+ma'i rigs las sprul pa'i lha// mthu rtsal byung ba'i dus la bab// zangs kyi wa mo chen mo ni// spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// mig ni nyi ma'i 'od bas 'tsher// mche ba rdo rje gtams pa

'dra// sder mo lcags kyu zhun ma 'dra// rnga ma dril zhags sdog pa 'dra// skad ni 'brug pas nges par che// bang ni glog bas nges par mgyogs// de lta bu yi wa mo la// zangs kyi mi mo chen mo zhon// dbu brgya mo

la spyan stong ma// g.yas na lcags kyu la sogs thogs// g.yon gyi phyag na phur pa 'dril// pad+ma'i rigs kyi sprul pa ste// lcags kyi spyang brgyad sprul par 'gyed// dpal gyi khyi brgyad las la gtong// lcags

kyus zung la phur pas thob// sngon chad khas blangs ji bzhin du// dam tshig gnyan las mi 'da' bar// mthun pa'i gtor ma 'di long la// sprul pas 'khor ba'i gnas bsgral phyir// nga yis khyed la rab bskul
bas// srog snying dam las ma 'da' bar// drag po'i las rnams grub par mdzod// oM dza ya du man ti sha ri ni la pu ti dzA dzA dzA dzA thums thums rbad khrag ti sma ra phaT rbad/ gtso bo la sogs rim
gsum ni// yig 'bru dgod pa snga ma bzhin// bzlas pa'i rim pa bya ba yin// de ltar byas pas mtshan ma 'byung// de nas las la sbyar ba na// bcu gnyis rdzas las gzugs byas te// me tog dmar po yang

dag ldan// dkyil 'khor rim pa ji lta bar// ming rus bris la gzugs brnyan la// pho dang mo yi gshag phye la// rang rang gnas su chud par bya// dgug dang bstim dang bral ba dang// 'thun rdzas byin la bsgo
bya zhing// gnas bzhin bskyal lam gshed du bsgo// de nas zangs kyi phur pa'am// dmar las byas pa'i rim pa las// rang rang rigs kyi sku ltar te// snying po dgod cing bzlas byas la// sprog pa'i sngags

dang ldan byas las// mtshan ma byung nas gnas ltar gdab// oM badzra kI li kI la ya dza ya du rag tsit+ta smer thums ma thA ma thA badzra che ge mo'i dbang po rnams thal bar lhog shog/ man ti dza mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rtsa ba
bzhi dang sham bu bzhi// rim pa bzhin du sbyar byas pas// brdab dang gtub dang brdeg dang 'phang/ las kyi shab bu shes par bya// thun gyi skabs su nyin mtshan gnyis// ya dang b+h+yo yis gsal bar
trang// mthar gyis las rnams kun kyang drang// 'di bzhin rim pa gsal bltas te// las kyi rim pa rdzogs byas na// sangs rgyas nyid dkyang gdan las 'gro/ log par lta ba'i sems can rnams// thang
cig yud kyis brlag par byed// ces gsungs so// sa bdag chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni// shin tu drag pa'i gnas dag gam// sa phug khang stong la sogs su// las kyi bya ba rdzogs byas te// rtags dang drod

tshad zin pa'i mis// dang po dkyil 'khor mngon bzhengs la// pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi dang ldan// dbus su 'jigs byed drag por bya// 'dab ma re la gru gsum re// yang na zla gam dag tu bya// 'o ma sbrang rtsi mar

khu dang// mngal khrag rag ta la sogs bsog/ wa dang spyang khu'i snying khrag dang// sha la sogs pa thams cad kun// mchod dang rten pa'i rdzas su dgod// dur khrod dmar mo'i thod pa dang// mchod pa'i yo byad
rab bsags la// bskyed nas rdzogs pa'i mthar thug bya// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byin brlabs las// ku tsu ku tsu rnam bzhi las// rang rang gdan la gsal bar 'thon// 'phro 'du 'od du zhu ba las// su tri pa
ra la sogs bzhis// so so'i sku ru gsal 'thon te// shar du pad+ma 'dab ma la// ya byin zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// sngon mo lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// de bzhin 'dab ma gsum po la// lho ru bse byin
dmar po la// zhags pa dang ni phur bu ldan// nub tu phag byin ljang mo la// lcags sgrog dang ni phur par ldan// byang du de bzhin ser mo la// dril bu phur par ldan par bskyed// kun kyang sbrul gyi
ral pa can// bse khrab sku la gsol bar brtag/ shin tu 'jigs shing zhal gdangs la// ljags 'dril tshems kyang 'dar bar brtag/ de ltar bskyed nas spyan drangs dang// bzhugs su gsol dang phyag
btsal dang// dam bca' mchod pa dbul ba dang// 'phrin las bcol ba rnam pa bdun// las kyi rim pa yongs shes nas// bzlas pa'i thabs gsum gsal bar bya// oM su tri pa ra ya/ bar tsit+ta ya// yo gi shwa

ra ya/ ya ma tsit+ta ya/ mtha' yi sngags dang sbyar ba yi// rtags dang mtshan ma 'byung bar nges// de nas bsad pa'i las rnams brtsam// brda mi phrad pa'i thod pa ru// ling kha mtshan dang ldan par bya// rten skyob skye

dang dbral bar bya// las rnams thams cad 'dra bar bshad// kun man d+ha ri dzA dzA/ shu la d+ha ri dzA dzA/ tsa mun d+ha ri dzA dzA/ kang kad+ha ri dzA dzA/ gnas skabs de dang de ru bzlas// khyi khrid ra khrid ro la khrag/ 'thung

kAng kAng keng keng ka ya/ snying za ba'i tsit+ta ma la ro la khrag 'thung kAng kAng keng kang keng ka ya hang par la ho/ sha kying spyang ti hi hUM phaT/ ro la khrag 'thung kAng kAng keng keng kAng ka ya/ tsi pi ri tsakra pA a sa ma

ya tshal pA a nri tri mA ra ya aM gu sha dza dza dza dza/ nA ga mA ra ya tshal pa tshal pa a nri tri mA ra ya aM gu sha dzA dzA dzA dzA/ shu shur ga tshal pa a nri tri mA ra ya aMku sha dzA dzA dzA dzA/ a be sha tshal pa anri tri mA ya ra aM gu sha

dzA dzA dzA dzA/ che ge mo mA' ra ya rma rma ra rma rbad rbad/ oM tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha daha/ da ha da ha/ tib ta tsakra/ badzra sa twa sa ma ya dza dza hUM hUM/ che ge mo la a be sha ya a be sha ya oM oM/ dgra ni mA ra ya/ yA mA snying

yA snying yA mA khrag tshal pa baM ril shag pa dam pa dum bu mar ya hUM phaT// oM badzra mud ka ra mu ti gran/ ka pI ra tsa ya hUM phaT rbad// oM pra be sha ya rbad phaT/ a be sha ya a a hUM phaT// hUM phaT mo ri kun d+ha li

baM thums rbad/ khrag ti smar phaT rbad/ oM stan stan rbad rbad/ rban rbud rban rbud/ tsit+ta snying shos pa ya/ phri li li li phri li li li/ shag shag/ rgyob rgyob/ ya ya badzra ma hA yag sha dun ya/ mA ra ya tod pa mA ra

ya thun ya/ ta kri ni la tod pa mA ra ya thun ya/ k+Shu la ri mA ra ya thun ya/ rtsi'u ri mA ra ya thun ya/ a phra tri tri mA ra ya thun ya/ nA ga mA ra ya k+Shu la ri mA ra thun ya// che ge mo'i snying la tod pa/ rnam shes mA ra ya tod
pa/ gzugs phung mA ra tod pa/ 'khor bcas mA ra tod pa/ rag rag sha mA ya tod pa/ de ltar bzlas pa'i sngags rnams kun// rim pas ma nor shes bya ste// thod pa gnyis la las rim gyis// sgo dang phugs kyi
gnad du bya// gong 'og man ngag rab sdebs te// las kyi sku mdog gnas skabs sbyar// dkyil 'khor gnyis dang gsum du'am// bsgrub pa'i rim pas phye ba yin// gcig tu dril dang rkyang pa
dang// btus pa'i rim pa rnam gsum las// gang yin ngo yis zin par bya// gdab dang gtub pa la sogs pa'i// las rnams kun kyang de'adrar brtag/ tha ma'o las la 'jug pa na// thun gyi rim pa yang

gsungs la// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ ro la khrag 'thung cin+d+ha ma tang par la sho shal kyi spyang ka tang ka te ya/ dza ye bi dza ya/ a tsit+ti a pa ra tsi ta ya/ ma ra sa sra ma rta na ya/ che ge mo'i yan lag don snying mA ra ya

hUM phaT/ khrag dang nyungs kar tsha dang ni// rdo nag la sogs thun rdzas rnams// spyi dang bye brag shes par bya// mthar gyis las rnams rdzogs par bya// zhes gsungs so// me lce 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen po las/ khyad
par gyi las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bsta pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang karma kI la yas/ bcom ldan 'das mnga' bdag yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol
to// gang zag dang po'i sa ba yis// las kyi bya ba rdzogs byed na// sbyin sreg rim pa mi 'tshal lam// grangs kyi rim pa du zhig mchis// 'di skad ces ni gsol pa dang// gsang mchog bdag pos bka' stsal
pa// 'di ni rjes su bsgrub pa yi// snod dang ldan pa'i gang zag la// 'phrin las yongs su rdzogs pa yi// sbyin sreg rim pa ngas bstan gyis// las kyi sems dpa' de yang nyon// las kyi sngon du 'gro ba

dang// 'phrin las yongs su rdzogs pa dang// las rnams mtha' ru 'don pa'i phyir// de phyir las 'di mchog tu bsngags// de yi rim pa rnam gnyis te// spyi dang bye brag dag tu dbye// de'ang rnam pa gnyis yin

te// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag go/ dang po spyi yi rim pa bzhi// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang gi las// mngon spyod drag po'i rim pa'o// rang rang mtshan nyid 'dir gsungs pa// zhi bar gyur pa'i thab khung ni// zlum po gru

gang tshad du bya// khyed ni thur du bru ba yin// kha khyer la ni sor bzhi tshad// dang po rdo rje ra ba ste// phyi rim dag la 'khor lo'o// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// ral gri la sogs rim pa bzhin// rim pa rim par

dbus su dgod// dkar dang ser dang dmar dang nag/ kha dog rim bzhin shes par bya// yab shing ron pa'am 'dab ma can// rtse mo las byung chag gang ba// chu ru mdzub gang yod pa la// tsan dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi

dang// dri zhim chu gtsang zhi la'o// bud shing dkar po dri zhim pa// ji ltar 'tsham pa'i rim pa'o// snga drol sogs dus bzhi ru// phyogs bzhi dag tu kha bltas la// mchod pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad g.yon// de
bzhin bsreg rdzas g.yas su shis// zhi ba dmar la rgyas bzho// dbang la ut+pal las drang shing// drag po tsher ma can gyi shing// re re sna grangs dbul bar bya// spos kyi rnam pa mang po dang// tsan

dan dmar po'i 'o mar bcas// sbrang rtsi mngar dang ldan pa'am// dngul phye 'bras chan dkar po rnams// zhi bar gyur pa'i gtor ma ste// las kyi dus su sbyar bar bya// de bzhin gtor ma mang po rnams// las
mkhan phyogs skyong la yang sbyin// rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyis// snga ma'i las rnams yongs rdzogs nas// bgegs bskrad bsang zhing 'od zer spro// dngul la sogs pa'i snod nang du// dgon pa'i gnas

nas me blangs la// bsang shing yaM dang dz+wa la raM// brjod de bud shing dag la'o// ku shas stan byad lhor bstan na// rim pa gnyis las bsgyur bar bya// drag po las ni phyir bstan no// dgang blugs gnyis dang

ldan byas la// paM las sna tshogs 'dab brgyad dbus// rnam par rgyal ba'am gtso bo'i sku// cho ga gsum las lhar bskyed de// mchod bstod 'od du zhu ba las// yi ge gnyis las gu d+he dang// lcags kyur gyur
te 'od du thim// yab yum gnyis su yongs gyur nas// zhal gsum phyag drug ldir ba'i gzugs// dang po gnyis ni rigs ma 'khyud// bar ma gu d+he ze'u 'bru la// tha ma mchod sbyin bgrang 'phreng 'dzin// ral

pa'i thor tshugs dag dang ldan// yum yang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// dril bu lcags kyu bsnams nas 'khyud// sku mdog las dang sbyar bya zhing// thugs khar hUM dang dza bsams la// bskrad cing bsang dang
mchod bstod bya// de nas ye shes sems dpa' dgug/ las bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya// rang gi sngags la mtha' btags la// lnga gnyis gsum dang gcig po yis// phyi nang gsang ba'i rdzas rnams
dbul// nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya dang stong// rab 'bring tha ma'i rim pa yis// ye shes dkyil 'khor mu yis gshegs// thim nas bstod dang gshegs su gsol// de nas rtsa ba'i rim pa nyid// las gnyis byas te
gzhung la 'jug/ rdo rje cho ga gsum gyis bskyed// spyan drangs mchod dang bstod pa rnams// las gnyis gong bzhin rdzogs byas nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor mu yis gshegs// 'khor gyi lha tshogs mchod
pa'am// 'khor gsum yongs su dag par bya// mtha' yi las la 'bad bya zhing// las la 'bras bu yod ces bya// kun kyang de bzhin shes par gyis// zhes bya ba 'di ni zhi ba'i las yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de

nas yang rgyas pa'i las yongs su sdus pa 'di gsungs so// rgyas par gyur pa'i thab khung ni// gru gsum pa la gru bzhin bya// dbus su khru do sor bzhi 'gyed// kha khyer sor bzhi mnyam por bya'o// phyi rol sor
bzhi bor ba la// 'khor lo dag gi 'phreng ba bya// dang po rdo rjer bas bskor// yaM shing srid du khru gang la// sdom ni gong dang mthun pa la// dbus kyi cha las byung ba'i shing// zho mar ldong ros

la sogs spangs// rgyas par gyur pa'i las la shis// bud shing ser po las byas pa'i// ji ltar 'tsham pa'i tshad du bya// kha ba'i ro ldan ser po'i rdzas// gser phye 'bru rnams ser po la// gtor ma byas te
rgyas par dbul// 'bras chen ser po rab bsgyur la// las mkhan byin la 'phrin las bcaul// las rnams gong bzhin rdzogs byas la// gshin rje gshed du rab bsgoms te// rgyas pa'i lha tshogs spyan drangs

la// dang ba'i sems kyis mchod sbyin bya// zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyas pa'i las bsdus pa'o// de nas yang dbang gi las bsdu ba 'di gsungs so// dbang du bya ba'i thab khung ni// rgya la sor ni bcu bzhi ste// kha khyer

de yi phyed kyi tshad// zla gam dbyibs la sor bcu brko// kha khyer dag la lcags kyu btang// de yi phyi ma zhags pa'o// yam shing sor lnga 'dab mar bcas// sboms su chags gang yod pa la// bdud rtsi dag la

sbangs te dbul// bud shing kha dog dmar po las// ji ltar 'tshams pa'i thabs su byas// skyur zhing mngar ba'i rdzas rnams dang// zangs phye 'bru rnams dmar po la// gtor ma byas te dbang la dbul// rdo rje

lta ni rnam bsgoms te// dbang gi lha tshogs spyan drangs la// mchod de dbang du gyur bar bya// zhes bya ba 'di ni dbang gi las bsdus pa'o// de nas yang drag po'i las yongs su bsdu ba 'di gsungs so// khros
par gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba la// ngos rere sor ni nyi shu bya// kha khyer sor gsum phyir bkyed la// zheng dang dpangs ni mnyam por byed// de yi phyir rim so gsum

dang// thod pa rdo rje rtse gsum dang// mda' gzhu mdung rtse gsum pa spel// de yi phyi rim rtsang gis bskor// lcags thag dag gis rab bskor la// ral gri'am rgya gram mtshan ma dgod// yam shing sor bzhi

gong gi phyed// rtse mo las byung gdug pa'i shing// dur khrod sol ba ming rus dang// lan tshwa dang ni tsha ba'i zas// thabs chen rnam par spangs byas la// mngon spyod las la dbul bar bya// bud shing tshe ma can gyi

shing// nag po'am gdug pa'i shing la bya// nag po tsha zhing rtsub pa la// lcags phye 'bru nag sha khrag las// sbyar ba'o gtor ma drag shul spyad// dug rdzas la sogs g.yas su dgod// g.yon du me tog nag po
gzhag/ zhe sdang las kyis 'chel ba rnams// bsad pa'i las ni rdzogs byas nas// bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom// drag po gyur pa'i lha rnams la// zhe sdang chen po'i sbyin sreg gis// thams cad mi
dmigs gyur par brtag/ ces bya ba 'di ni drag po'i las bsdud pa'o// de nas yang lhun gyis grub pa'i las yongs su rdzogs pa 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// dregs
par byed pa'i sems can rnams// sna tshogs las kyis zhi bar bya// bkra shis zhi ba'i gnas dag tu// bkra shis mtshan ldan yum mchog bzung// dkar la zlum pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje 'od zer 'phro bas

brgyan// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la// phur pa zlum po drug btab ste// zhi ba'i lha tshogs spyan drangs la// snying rje byams pa'i mchod sbyin bya// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gti mug las kyis
'chel ba rnams// zhi bar gyur pa'i dbyings su rol// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// 'phongs par gyur pa'i 'gro gang la// sna tshogs las kyi sems par bya// tsan dan nags tshal la sogs

par// rgyas par gyur pa'i yum bzung ste// ser po gru bzhi dkyil 'khor la// dri chen chu skyen dag gis brgyan// gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la// phur pa zur bzhi bzhi btab ste// rgyas pa'i lha tshogs spyan
yang drang// dang pa'i sems kyis mchod sbyin bya// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// nga rgyal las kyis 'chel ba rnams// rgyas par gyur pa'i dbyings su rol// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// chags

par gyur pa'i sems can rnams// dbang du bya ba sbyang bar gsungs// zla mtshan can nam chu gling du// dbang du bya ba'i gzungs ma btsal// zla gam dmar po'i dkyil 'khor la// 'od zer 'phro ba'i rgyan gyis

brgyan// zangs sam dmar po'i shing rnams la// phur pa zla gam lnga byas te// dmar smug 'phro ba'i lha tshogs rnams// rdo rje spyugs pas spyan drangs te// dga' chags yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// ya yi tshogs kyi
dkyil 'khor du// 'dod chags las kyis 'chel ba rnams// dbang du bsdus pas dbyings su rol// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu gdug pa'i sems can la// drag shul spyod pas sbyar byas
te// rkang gcig can nam dur khrod du// rigs ngan sme sha can la sogs// me reg ma yi gzugs ma gzung// nag po gru gsum dkyil 'khor la// rtsang thod mang pos kha la brgyan// lcags sam nag po'i shing

rnams la// rtse mo zur gsum gsum btab ste// mthing nag 'khrugs pa'i lha tshogs rnams// dregs pa 'dul phyir spyan drangs te// btang snyoms khros pa'i sbyin sreg bya// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// zhe
sdang las kyis 'chel ba rnams// brlag par gyur pas dbyings su+u rol// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rtsa ba las kyis bsregs pa 'di gsungs so// rnam bzhi las rnams yongs rdzogs nas// las kyi tha ma
cha gcig tsam// rdzogs par bya phyir yang gsungs pa// gsod pa drag po'i dkyil 'khor du// gdug pa can gyi shing bu la// tshil chen dag dang ldan byas nas// lus nag khros pa'i lhor bltas
te// skra yang spyi bor bcings byas te// lus la mtshan ma rnam gsum gdab// nga ro drag tu bton nas ni// bka' dang bden pas legs bsgom la// me yis las gzhung bsnyag pa'am// yang na bsdus te rtsa
ba'i lha// spar dang bskyed pa byas nas ni// ye shes dgug ste de la bstim// las kyi mtha' 'am rdzogs pa ru// gdab dang gtub pa'i las byas la// brdung dang stabs te dbyings la rol// sngags kyi mtha'
dang bcas pa yis// mngon par dbang po bltar yi pas// ril bu bsdus te zhal du dbul// rang byung 'bar ba'i me chen gyis// bzhu nas bdud rtsir gyur pa yis// 'khor lo'i lha la mchod pa 'bul// rgyal
ba thams cad mnyes mchod 'bul// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// de nas 'khor gyi las mkhan la// gong ma bzhin du mchod par 'bul// gshegs nas bsdu dang dbyings su rol// las kyi
mtha' dang ldan par bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang yan lag gi 'khor du bsregasapa phyi gsungs te// rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dug shingad gdug pa'i shing bu la// de la me 'khor sbar
bsregs pa ni// zhi lpags dag gi gdan la 'jug/ khros pa'i sems dang bcas pa yis// gong ma nyid la gzugs bris la// las rnams rdzogs nas mer bsregs na// sangs rgyas nyid kyang gdan la

'gre/ gshin rje gshed po'i dkyil 'khor du// zhe sdang gting nas rab bskyed la// gzugs brnyan gong dang mthun par bya// khrag dug bsres la mtshan ma bri// drag po'i las rnams byas na ni// gdug pa'i shing
la me spar la// rab tu phung pa'i gnas su bsregs// skad cig nyid la brlags par 'gyur// rta mgrin rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du// mthing nag gru gsum nag po bya// khros pas shin tu nan tan bskyed// khros
pas lhor bstan skra yang brdzes// lus nag thal ba'i mtshan mas byug/ nyi shu rtsa gcig lha tshogs rnams// rim pa gnyis su gsal byas te// so so'i grangs dang mthun pa yis// dus tshod ma nor shes byas
te// bsregs na tshangs pa'i tshe yang 'chi// bdud rtsa 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dur khrod ras dang mi khrag dang// gu gul la sogs rdzas rnams la// ming rus bcas par gzugs byas la// las
rnams yongs su rdzogs nas ni// gtum po'i me la bsregs pa na// lha yang brlag par the tshom med// dbyug pa sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba la// rang byung me reg thang chus byug/
gdug pa ga'u kha sbyor du// shing shun gzugs byas der bcug la// bzlas pa'i grangs rnams tshang gyur na// las rdzogs las chen rgya gram du// bse yi me la gtums bsregs na// skad cig
yud la the tshom med// mi g.yo mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// gling bzhi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba la// dmigs pa'i rdzas dang mi rtag// rtag nag bdud rtsis rab sprus la// shin tu dod la rdzogs par bya// sa

bdag med pa'i sa phyogs su// 'o ma can gyi shing bu la// bsregs na 'grub par the tshom med// dpal ldan rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ rta nag khrag dang dug tu sbyar// shing shun gzugs bri dud pas bdug/ sngo
dmar byad du bcug nas ni// dum bu gsum tu rab gtubs te// shin tu dri nga'i me spar te// gcig ni khrag 'thung 'khor bcas la// gcig ni 'phra men rnams la dbul// gcig ni dam can rnams la
dbul// 'dis ni gdug pa'i sems can rnams// skad cig yud kyis brlag par 'gyur// khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor du// gsod pa'i dbyibs la rgya sol byug/ dri ma drug la gzugs byas te// dur
khrod ras la ming rus bri// gang yin rang gi gnas su sba// me reg gtun du gzugs bzhag ste// mtshan ma mthong nas las rnams bya// snyigs mar bcas pa'i sbyin sreg gis// sangs rgyas nyid kyang gdan
las 'gre/ hUM chen 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dug gi chu yis chag chag gdab// dur khrod me reg ras ma la// gzugs byas las rnams rdzogs par bya// las su rung ba'i rtags mthong nas// dur khrod
gnas su der song nas// dug shing dag la me spar te// bsregs na skad cig gcig la 'grub// stobs po che yi dkyil 'khor du// gong gi rdzas la gzugs byas te// dug dang sme khrag rnams kyis byug/ thun

mtshams bzhir ni sngags bzlas te// las kyi skabs la bab pa dang// dur khrod shing bu'i me bus te// gong gi rdzas la bsgres te bsregs khams// gsum gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs// thang cig yud la 'chi bar
'gyur// 'di rnams rang res las kyis sam// 'di sdom rtsa ba bsgyur bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rang rang gi khyad par gyis bsregs pa 'di gsungs so// bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor
du// mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba la// me reg dag la ldan par bya// bdud rtsi lnga yis 'thas par bya// dur khrod gdan la 'dug nas ni// dri chen dag gis lus la byug/ gdong la thig le rnam gsum

gdab// bzlas pa bya zhing thun rnams brdeg/ mtshan ma dum bur gtubs nas ni// mi shis shing la me spar te// bum bu re dang klad pa dang// tsit+ta mi dbang sha phye dang// grir bas da sha khrag byang chub
sems// mchod pa gsum dang sbyar te bsregs// 'di byas las la thogs pa med// dbang po brgya byin shi bar bstan// sho na mu kha'i dkyil 'khor du// dmigs par bya ba'i dngos po

ste// spra tshil dag la gzugs byas la// mtshan ma ming du bcas bar bya// bsgrub pa rdzogs nas las 'di brtsam// dug shing gdug pa'i me bus te// gong ma dag dang bsre ba'i rdzas// tsa ra rta dang byi ba
dang// chu bya'i snying dang gtor mar sbyar// grangs 'bum bsregs na lha yang 'chi// sa bdag chen mo'i dkyil 'khor du// dur khrod dag gi ras ma la// dmigs pa'i gzugs bya gong ma bzhin// bzlas brjod
yongs su rdzogs pa dang// gdug pa'i shing ngam seng ldeng la// dug dang mtshal gyis byug byas te// nam gyi gung ngam nyin gung la// rang rang grangs dang mthun par bsreg/ 'di yis bsam pa

myur 'grub cing// gdug can brlag par the tshom med// bsgrub pa gang dang gang la yang// mthar gyis las la nan tan bskyed// gcig gam yang na gsum rdzogs bya// thun mong spyi dang khyad par ro// phyi nang
gsang ba'i rim pa yis// las kun yongs su rdzogs pa yin// 'di ni thabs kyi rgyal po ste// kun gyis shes par ga la rung// bla ma gnyes na bdud rtsi long// de yis las mthar phyin par 'gyur// zhes
